They are a skilled commander of Barbarous and Daemons and is a master of drawing out their strengths, sometimes leading the troops, but they are also devoted to the training of young Diablos. They have a broad perspective on the expansion of Barbarous as a whole. Therefore, they are not only at odds with Humanoids but also often engage in strategic bargaining and political dealings.

When transformed into the daemon form, they expose their true ferociousness and destroy their enemies with their fighting instincts.

For the Daemon form of this monster, see Diablo Captain (Daemon Form).

abilities.title: ‚óØTough Skin
abilities.description: Whenever it receives physical or magical damage of the bludgeoning type, it is reduced by -3 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight II
abilities.description: Receives a +2 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited 2 Actions
abilities.description:
The monster can perform two Major Actions in one round. However, this is limited to one weapon melee attack and one [‚ñ∫Daemonic Eyes III] once each.

It cannot use [üó®Cleave II] for that melee attack.

abilities.title: üó®Cleave II
abilities.description: It attacks with a weapon up to 5 characters within the skirmish in which it resides.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Daemonic Eyes III/Can't
abilities.description:
With a sharp look in its eyes, it makes shriveling enemies.

With "Range/Area: 2 (30m) / Target", select any number of targets and deal 10 curse fixed damage each. Afterward, Diablo's HP is restored by the sum of all applied damage dealt to the targets.

Using this ability consumes 4 points of MP per character targeted.

abilities.title: ‚óØBarbarous and Daemons Strengthening
abilities.description: All Barbarous and Daemon monsters except for the Diablo Captain within "Range: Self" and "Target: All Areas (30m Radius) / All" receive a +2 bonus on all action checks except Evasion checks, and the physical and magic damage they cause is increased by +2 points.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift
abilities.description:
The character changes into the daemon form with Minor Actions or during Combat Preparation. For the data, see Diablo Captain (Daemon Form). HP and MP are restored to their maximum values, and all effects of magic, etc., are negated. In the turn in which this unique skill is performed, only the Head section of the Daemon Form is treated as having completed the Major Action, and the Right Side and Left Side sections can make it this turn.

[‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift] cannot be used for 3 hours immediately after the [‚ñ∫Humanification] was used. Also, [‚ñ∫Humanification] cannot be used for 1 hour immediately after [‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift] was used.

allmonsters.description: This is the Daemon form of the Diablo Lieutenant (Human Form).

abilities.title: ‚óØTough Skin
abilities.description: Whenever it receives physical or magical damage of the Bludgeoning type, the damage is reduced by 3 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited 2 Actions
abilities.description: The monster can perform two Major Actions in one round. However, the monster must choose two different actions from the melee attack, [‚ñ∫Daemonic Eyes II] or [‚ñ∫Spray of Evil].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Daemonic Eyes II/Can't
abilities.description:
With a sharp look in its eyes, it makes shriveling enemies.

With "Range/Area: 1 (10m)/Target", select any number of targets and deal each of them 3 curse fixed damage.

Afterward, Diablo's HP is restored by the sum of all applied damage dealt to the targets.

Using this ability consumes 3 points of MP per character targeted.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Evil Spray/14 (21)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
With "Range: Self" and "Target: 2-3 areas (10m Radius)", it releases a cursed spray and deals 2d+11 curse magic damage to the target.

This effect can exclude any character from the target except itself. It never removes itself, but the resistance is always treated as a success.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description:
Receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

If the Body section falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

abilities.title: üó®Cleave II
abilities.description: It attacks with a weapon up to 5 characters within the skirmish in which it resides.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Humanification
abilities.description:
It changes to the Human form. For data on the Human form, refer to Diablo Lieutenant (Human Form). If the Body section has suffered HP or MP damage or has been affected by magic or other effects, these are carried over to the Human form. If its HP is less than 0, it immediately falls unconscious.

[‚ñ∫Humanification] cannot be used for 1 hour immediately after [‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift] was used. Also, [‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift] cannot be used for 3 hours immediately after the [‚ñ∫Humanification] was used.

allmonsters.description:
This is a more experienced and mighty Diablo. While Diablos are elite Barbarous who are expected to lead the Barbarous, these lieutenants are often assistants or rangers rather than corps commanders.

They will appear as servants of the more powerful Diablos if the former. If the latter, they will often lead a small number of powerful Barbarous to raid Humanoid settlements.

Their human and Daemon forms are not comparable to that of Cadets. In particular, the Daemon form is covered with poisonous gas so foul that it can even hurt the lieutenant themself.

For the Daemon form of this monster, see Diablo Lieutenant (Daemon Form).

abilities.title: ‚óØTough Skin
abilities.description: Whenever it receives physical or magical damage of the Bludgeoning type, the damage is reduced by 3 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: Receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited 2 Actions
abilities.description:
The monster can perform two Major Actions in one round. However, this is limited to one weapon melee attack and one [‚ñ∫Daemonic Eyes II] once each.

It cannot use [üó®Cleave II] for that melee attack.

abilities.title: üó®Cleave II
abilities.description: It attacks with a weapon up to 5 characters within the skirmish in which it resides.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Daemonic Eyes II/Can't
abilities.description:
With a sharp look in its eyes, it makes shriveling enemies.

With "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Target", select any number of targets and deal each of them 3 curse fixed damage.

Afterward, Diablo's HP is restored by the sum of all applied damage dealt to the targets.

Using this ability consumes 3 points of MP per character targeted.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift
abilities.description:
The character changes into the daemon form with Minor Actions or during Combat Preparation. For the data, see Diablo Lieutenant (Daemon Form). HP and MP are restored to their maximum values, and all effects of magic, etc., are negated. In the turn in which this unique skill is performed, only the Body section of the Daemon Form is treated as having completed the Major Action, and the Head section can make it this turn.

[‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift] cannot be used for 3 hours immediately after the [‚ñ∫Humanification] was used. Also, [‚ñ∫Humanification] cannot be used for 1 hour immediately after [‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Daemonshift] was used.

allmonsters.description:
A Diadema is a construct that resembles a small Shallow Abyss. It appears as a sphere of blurred blackness, approximately 50 cm in size.

Using Summoning Arts to a limited extent, it attacks by temporarily manifesting a body part, such as Daemon's arms, from its center.

Today, it is recognized as a failed or residual product of Daemon research during the Magic Civilization Period.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttitude Control
abilities.description: It cannot fall prone under any effect.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: This Magitech is designed as an installed trap that dampens the mana of an object that has been stepped into. It has a spherical body with four short legs.

abilities.title: ‚óØMana Diffusion
abilities.description: Whenever a character within "All Areas (Radius 30m)" of this monster's center performs an action that consumes MP, the amount of MP consumed is increased by +1 point. When doubled by [Metamagic/**] or a similar effect, the original MP consumption is increased by +1 point and then doubled.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Maximum Disturbance/11 (18)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
With "Range: Caster" and "Target: all areas (30m radius) / All," creates an area that inhibits the use of mana. Whenever the target performs an action that consumes MP, it takes the same amount of fixed damage to its HP.

This effect is a curse type and lasts only for 10 seconds (1 round). Also, this unique skill cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description:
This is a large false dragon, white-scaled, that inhabits the cold regions of the Alframe continent. It is about 3 meters long, with small forelimbs and hindlimbs for body support and a long tail for balance.

It has an organ that produces cold air in the body and can exhale it.

Their meat is edible and can be frozen and brought home using its cooling organs, making them the desired target for hunting.

For the mount version of this creature, see Dinos (mount).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Freezing Breath/5 (12)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Spits mass of cold air with "Range/Area: 2 (20m) / Shot" at "Target: 1 Character", dealing 2d+2 Water/Ice magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description:
Dinos' height prevents enemies from attacking their heads. The Head section receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks.

When the Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

allmonsters.description:
Direach is a fairy in the form of a one-eyed giant. It has only one arm and one leg each, and its arm protrudes forward from its chest. From the top of the head to the back, black feathers roots grow together like a mane.

They are the guardians of the realm of the fairies and warn those who approach them with a loud and awe-inspiring voice. They wield a single- armed weapon, a club, a flail, or an axe without mercy if not heeded.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Exclusive Spell [Sandstorm]
abilities.description: Casts exclusive Fairy Magic [Sandstorm] (see below).

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic] and [Rune Master].

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description:
If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +10 points.

Exclusive Spell: Sandstorm

abilities.title: Casting Time: 1 Major Action
abilities.description:
A sandy storm blows within the area. The targeted character is dealt Power 20 + Magic Power magic damage, falls prone, and is blinded. If a monster has multiple sections and not all are targets, the monster will not fall prone or be blinded regardless of whether resistance is successful.

A character whose perception is Magic will not be blinded. Blindness can be removed by wiping the eyes with a Minor Action, but the character must not be holding any weapon or item other than "Stance: 1HW" in their hand. This effect is Earth-type and Wind-type.

allmonsters.description:
This species of Dolphin grows to around 3m long and is highly intelligent, able to speak its own language. While Dolphins often live in groups out in the seas and open ocean, they will rarely come to the coast and attempt to make contact with Humanoids.

For the mount version of this animal, see Dolphin (mount).

abilities.title: ‚óØUnderwater
abilities.description: It cannot move outside of the water and cannot act outside of the water, but it does not suffer any restrictions or penalties for actions in the water.

allmonsters.description:
Domovoy is a fairy of gentle disposition and has the appearance of an old man covered in thick body hair, including a long gray beard.

They hide in fireplaces and basements, secretly protecting the house and its inhabitants.

It is said that if a Domovoy loses the inhabitant it is supposed to protect or it was betrayed by them, it will start a fire. However, it does not always happen, and whether or not it does depends strongly on the character and feelings of the individual Domovoy. In this sense, it can be said that the probability of it occurring is higher when a long-time resident disappears or when it is betrayed.

On rare occasions, a Domovoy may be found alone in abandoned houses, having lost the inhabitant he was supposed to protect. It is said that if you guide them to their new home and its inhabitants with a lit firewood or torch, you will receive their deepest gratitude.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye] and [Universal Metamagic].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Exclusive Spell [Ash Burn]
abilities.description: Casts exclusive Fairy Magic [Ash Burn] (see below).

abilities.title: ‚óØHouse Guardian
abilities.description:
Only Domovoy, that has taken up residence in a house, has this ability. Those that have been moved or summoned from outside do not have this ability.

The Domovoy lives in a house and guards it. The scope of the house here is defined by the GM but is broad enough to include the entirety of the housing complex; if it is an underground labyrinth, then the entire labyrinth, unless there are obvious structural changes.

Domovoy has a Five Senses perception of everything within the scope of this house. As long as it is within the range of the house, Domovoy can manipulate the furnishings and equipment at will, as long as it does not cause direct damage to the character. Doors open (or close) on their own, candlesticks are suddenly lit, a table is inscribed with a puzzling message or any number of other strange incidents can be triggered. It can also make only its own voice heard from nowhere.

The following [‚ñ∫Furniture Projectile] unique skill can be used only within the house.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Furniture Projectile/Various/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
The target must be a place or condition where the [‚óãHouse Guardian] is active. Conversely, Domovoy itself can choose the target of this unique skill wherever it is located, as long as it is within the range of the ability of the [‚óØHouse Guardian] (so anyone within the house).

Domovoy throws a piece of furniture at the 1 target character and deals physical damage. If the furniture is attached to a wall or floor, it cannot be thrown, but if it is attached to metal fixtures, it can be thrown. The distance from the furniture to the target must be in the line of fire, and the Accuracy check and the physical damage of the hit will vary depending on the furniture.

allmonsters.description:
Domsva is an armored humanoid Magitech soldier, standing tall at over 3 meters. Its thick armor is an impressive sight to behold.

Despite its slow and heavy appearance, it defies gravity with the ability to levitate on its legs, moving at surprising speeds. Its powerful knee kicks take advantage of its thrusting ability, allowing it to stand on water.

A master of combat, it wields a two-handed greatsword with great vigor and carries a large two-handed cannon, albeit with a small number of bullets.

In the Magitech civilization, it was revered as a defender of important bases and a fierce attacker of enemy camps, boasting unparalleled combat power.

abilities.title: ‚óØMechanical Body
abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Portable Cannon/12 (19)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
Domsva uses its cannon and makes a Shooting Attack with "Range: 2 (30m)", dealing 2d+8 points of magic damage.

This ability can be used only twice, regardless of success or failure.

abilities.title: üó®Cleave I
abilities.description: It can attack up to 3 characters with melee attacks that can be reached, but the damage will be reduced by -3.

abilities.title: üó®All-Out Attack
abilities.description: A Weapon can deal an additional 8 damage on its next attack. However, any Evasion check made by this section this turn receives a -3 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Condemning Flash/10 (17)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
"Target: 1 Character" is blinded for 10 seconds (1 round) by a dazzling flash within "Range: 1 (10m)".

If the HP of the Body section is less than half of the maximum value (rounded up), the [‚ñ∫Condemning Flash] can be used twice with one Major Action. The second target can be chosen after the result of the first one. If the first target resists, the same target can be selected again.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ Impossible
abilities.description:
Its Legs hinder the attack.

The Body section cannot be attacked, whether melee or ranged.

When the Legs fall to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

abilities.title: üó®Kneeguard Bash
abilities.description: The target is attacked with armor at the knee joint. The Legs section gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy checks but deals -4 damage less.

allmonsters.description: This is a Construct disguised as a door in the corridors of labyrinths, ruins, and discarded mansions. Generally, they are responsible for repelling intruders, remaining completely motionless until an enemy approaches, at which point they attack as soon as they get close enough to open the door.

abilities.title: ‚óØMimicry/11/Danger Sense/Negates
abilities.description:
It mimics a door. While mimicking, characters cannot perform a Monster Knowledge check on this monster. If the character approaches it unintentionally, they need to make a Danger check with target number 11, and if it fails, they will be surprised (see CR I, p. 144). Mimicry will be automatically ended once the monster starts to act.

This monster can be detected with [Sense Magic].

abilities.title: ‚óØThrow
abilities.description: If the melee attack hits, the target is knocked to the ground and falls prone.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: One of the high-rank daemons, a Doppelganger's base form, is that of a black-skinned giant 3m tall. A single red line splits the face where its mouth would be, but its face is otherwise featureless. This Daemon has the ability to shapeshift into any target it has observed, and its usual method is to kill the target, take its place, and enter the Humanoid society to plot secret evil, causing suspicion and confusion in the society.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Shapeshift
abilities.description: The Doppelganger can change its shape into another's, with the quality of the transformation based on the time the Doppelganger has observed the target. A quick glance at a target allows the Doppelganger to copy the target's physical appearance, including any belongings. One minute's observation (6 rounds) allows for copying the target's tone and mannerisms, while one hour's observation gives a complete copy of the target's abilities and memory. This last transformation will also allow the Doppelganger access to any Classes and spells the target may have learned. This unique skill lasts until the Doppelganger reverts to its base form, taking Major Action to do so.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: A Doppelganger can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Metamagic/Targets], [Multi-Action], [Rune Master], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description:
Against melee attacks, the Upper Body section receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks.

This effect disappears when the Lower Body section falls to 0 HP or lower.

allmonsters.description:
This security Magitech was produced in large numbers during the Magitech Civilization Period.

It is about one meter long and appears like a large Human child, and its entire body is covered with hard metal. It has one arm, a large hammer, which it wields to attack. With wheels mounted on its legs, it is more agile than it appears.

abilities.title: ‚óØMechanical Body
abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description:
This is a jet-black daemon of about the same size as a Human. The face has a red, open mouth with a straight slit, but no other visible features exist.

This monster can shapeshift into the creature it perceives, then kills it and replaces it. It often enters into Humanoid and Barbarous societies.

Doubleburg's purpose is unknown, but they are said to be sent by the Daemons to learn about the intelligent life forms in the world of Raxia. They actively use their ability to transform, perhaps to advance their observations into the psychology of individuals and groups, and attempt to create doubt and confusion in cities and communities.

They are similar to Ogres and are considered more dangerous because they cannot be blocked by Swords of Protection.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Double Attack
abilities.description: With the claws of both hands, it makes two attacks on 1 character. This unique skill cannot be used on a character copied by [‚ñ∫Portrait].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Portrait
abilities.description:
It captures the appearance of the observed target and turns into it. If the target is only seen at a glance, its appearance and personal belongings can be matched. If the target can be perceived for 1 minute (6 rounds), it can learn its language and imitate its tone and gestures so precisely that even a close human cannot detect it. If it is taking the form of this unique skill, a Monster Knowledge check cannot be performed on it unless Detect check was made before.

This unique skill does not copy the target's class or unique skills. All the data during the battle will be the monster's data. Attacks made by the target's appearance are made by the monster's physical weapon (Claws), even though it looks like the target's weapon is doing them.

A copy of a character in multiple sections appears to have the corresponding number of sections. Still, only the Main Section (or one of them in the case of multiple sections) is treated as Doubleburg. Other sections do not perform any action. If this section is targeted and attacked, the effect is automatically given to the monster. If the effect targets more than one section simultaneously, the excess will do nothing, but at the same time, it will be automatically found that the section does not exist. Detect check is needed to find the actual section.

The [‚ñ∫Portrait] can be ended with Minor Action or during Combat Preparation.

allmonsters.description:
This is a more experienced Fomor Giant.

Normally, they lead Goblins or Bolg under a higher-ranking Drake or Troll. However, most of the assignments they are given are highly dangerous, such as spearheading a siege or leading a retreat.

abilities.title: ‚óØChain Attack
abilities.description: After an attack, Dowi Fomor can attack the same target again, regardless of its success or failure. This ability can add only one additional attack per round.

abilities.title: ‚óØCounter
abilities.description: Identical to the Combat Feat [Counter].

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Technique & ‚óØMuscle Mystery
abilities.description: Can use [Cat's Eye], [Beetleskin], [Bear Muscle], [Giant Arms], and [Recovery (7 points)]. These Techniques have twice the normal duration.

abilities.title: ‚è©Stratagem and Maneuver/All Areas (30m Radius)
abilities.description:
Can use [Surging Offense III: True Aim] (Accuracy +1, Physical Damage +1).

Every third turn, they can use [Maneuver: Unexpected Blow I] (+2 Accuracy, +2 Damage). Cannot use Stratagems if no other allies will be affected it.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle +4/None
abilities.description:
Fomor's height prevents enemies from attacking it.

The Upper Body receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks. When the Lower Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

allmonsters.description:
"Draconet" is a name used for dragons 100 years or younger, and a Draconet's attitude reflects its immaturity. Often angry, they will destroy their environment until they either run out of energy or have leveled their surroundings. However, it is possible to communicate with a Draconet when they are in a good mood.

As with older dragons, Draconets tend to hoard things with a significant amount of stored mana, including magical items, Sword Shards, and even whole Swords of Protection. They loathe to give up any of their hoards but may be convinced if there are appropriate replacements for the items to be taken. While the most common Draconets breathe fire, there are subspecies that can also exhale ice, lightning, or poison.

For the mount version of this creature, see Draconet (mount).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Flame Breath/11 (18)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Spits fire at "Target: 1 area(3m Radius) / 5" within "Range/Area: 2 (20m) / Shot" and deals 2d+15 Fire magic damage.

This unique skill cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: üó®All-Out Attack
abilities.description: A Wing can deal an additional 8 damage on its next attack. However, any Evasion check made by this section this turn receives a -3 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight II
abilities.description:
A Draconet receives a +2 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

If one of the Wings falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

allmonsters.sections: 7 (Head / Body x 2 / Wing x 2 / Foot x 2)
allmonsters.description: A large construct in the shape of a dragon, the Dragon Fortress is a huge machine, measuring around 50m long and 15m high. Able to fly at high speeds, its weapons are able to cause destruction on a massive scale. It is thought to be the top of the line when it comes to mobile defense and comes outfitted with a wide variety of weapons. It is an existence that brings together the highest level of technology in Magitech Civilization, and the leaders of each country are searching for their whereabouts.

abilities.title: ‚óØMechanical Body
abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚óØTargeting & Hawk Eye
abilities.description: Stray shots cannot occur. It also can aim through skirmishes at targets on the other side.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Adaptive Jet/18 (25)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Dragon Fortress sprays a jet of flames, ice, or lightning.

Within "Range/Area: 2 (50m) / Shot" deals to the "Target: 1 area(6m Radius) / 20" 2d+20 magic damage.

The type of damage is chosen upon usage between Fire, Water/Ice, and Lightning.

abilities.title: ‚óØGun
abilities.description: The Main Battery is a gun weapon that has a "Range: 2 (30m)" and a maximum magazine of 3. The Machine Gun is a gun weapon that has a "Range: 1 (10m)" and a maximum magazine of 6.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Reload
abilities.description: Fully reloads the Main Battery and Machine Gun of that section.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Volley
abilities.description:
To use this ability, the weapon must have at least 3 bullets loaded, and 3 bullets are consumed at the same time.

The success value of the Accuracy check is set to 30, with the same damage as a regular attack.

The same Dragon Fortress may only perform one [‚ñ∫Volley] per round against the same target.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ Impossible
abilities.description:
The Dragon Fortress's size hinders attack.

The Head cannot be attacked, whether melee or ranged. This effect disappears when any Body section falls to 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: ‚óØStranded
abilities.description: If the HP of all Body sections is reduced to 0 or less, the Head sections receive a -4 penalty for Evasion checks.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight II
abilities.description:
All sections receive a +2 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

This unique skill is lost if any Wing section is reduced to 0 or less HP.

loottable.loot: Trove of Magical Components (7,600G/Black White S)
Newly Discovered Magical Components (25,000G/Black White SS)

allmonsters.description:
This is a baby dragon at least 30 years old and is still in its early stages of development. At this age, they rarely leave their parents and are rarely seen flying in the sky with others.

It is not as majestic as a fully-grown dragon due to its low intelligence, but it is still considered more of a threat than most monsters. Furthermore, there is a high probability that their parents are nearby, and they will often flee to them when in danger.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fire Breath / 5 (12) / Fortitude / Half
abilities.description:
A Dragon Infant breathes fire in a "Range / Area:2 (20m) / Shot" to the "Target: 1 Character", dealing 2d + 4 Fire magic damage.

This unique skill cannot be used in consecutive rounds.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Dragon Infant receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

allmonsters.description:
Dragon Zombies are the reanimated corpse of a dragon that decayed over a number of years and returned to unlife after being corrupted. Typically, Dragon Zombies are of lower intelligence due to their brain having decomposed over the years, but rarely are there intelligent Dragon Zombies capable of speech and magic. However, the organs that would produce fire in a living dragon have rotted and decayed, and now the Dragon Zombie can only exhale a rotten miasma.

Often, Dragon Zombies have some sort of unfinished business in the world of the living, whether to get revenge on their slayer, to protect the remnants of their plundered horde, or something else altogether. The need to take care of this business drives the Dragon Zombie to the point where nothing will stand in their way in order to accomplish their goals.

abilities.title: ‚óØMiasma Vortex
abilities.description: The Dragon Zombie is surrounded by a protective veil of miasma and gains a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against ranged attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØRegeneration = 10 points
abilities.description: At the end of each round, each section of Dragon Zombie recovers 10 HP. This has no effect if the section has 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Poison Breath/25 (32)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
With "Range/Area: 2 (20m) / Shot" and "Target: 1 area (6m Radius) / 20", it breathes putrid gas dealing 2d+25 Poison magic damage.

This unique skill cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Twin Strike & Double Attack
abilities.description: A Dragon Zombie can make two Claw attacks each round. They may choose to attack different characters with each attack.

abilities.title: ‚óØMiasma Claws/24 (31)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
The target is weakened if the target is hit by a Claw attack. Target's strength is reduced by -6.

This effect is permanent and accumulative; a character whose strength falls to 0 or less dies without making a Death Check.

In the case of a fixed value character, each time it is affected by this effect, its damage is reduced by -1, and it will die if it is affected by the effect (Monster Level/5 (rounded up) + 2) times in total.

This effect is of the Disease type.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description: A Dragon Zombie's height prevents enemies from attacking it. The Head receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks. When the Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

abilities.title: üó®All-Out Attack
abilities.description: A Wing can deal an additional 8 damage on its next attack. However, any Evasion check made by this section this turn receives a -3 penalty.

abilities.title: üó®Tail Sweep
abilities.description:
The monster can use its tail to attack up to 5 targets in the same skirmish. An Accuracy check is made on all characters at once, and damage is determined individually.

This attack cannot be used in consecutive rounds.

allmonsters.description:
A Drake will change into dragon form if in danger. They always carry a magical sword that allows them to transform. While transforming, the Drake takes on a silvery-white sheen of razor-edged scales. Its physique becomes sleek and streamlined, and its wings become as sharp as a sword.

Despite their huge size, they retain high agility and are quick to attack.

For the Human form of this monster, see Drake (Human Form).

Drakes are similar in appearance to beautiful young men and women, though horns gracefully sweep from their heads and membranous wings sprout from their backs. Drakes can transform into huge dragons that wield massive swords infused with magic.

Other Barbarous look to Drakes as natural leaders, and huge forces have been known to gather at Drake's disposal.

While there is often little cooperation between Drakes, a powerful "king" Drake appears in rare cases, followed by many other Drakes.

Similar in appearance to the Drakes, yet with a much more regal presence, Drake Barons are imposing leaders of the Barbarous. The only difference is that they are more beautiful and more refined and are dressed in luxurious costumes. The dragon form is one size larger than the normal Drake, and its crest is shining in copper color.

While it's rumored there are little more than 100 of these Drake Barons throughout the entirety of Raxia, even those few are enough to bring much of humanity to its knees.

For the Dragon form of this monster, see Drake Baron (Dragon Form).

One of the highest-ranking Barbarous, Drake Counts have a regal air about themselves that lesser Drakes do not. While they may be the same as other Drakes physically, a Drake Count's appearance and mannerisms have that noble look about them, unconsciously showing off their status to other Barbarous. At the same time, Drake Counts are masterful combatants and tacticians, able to easily control thousands of Barbarous beneath them.

A massive beast, the dragon form of a Drake Count, is much larger than those of the Drake Barons underneath them. With glistening translucent green scales, its glory is only surpassed by its frightening combat unique skill.

For the Dragon form of this monster, see Drake Count (Dragon Form).

allmonsters.description:
Dreadbar is a bizarre daemon with a giant crocodile's lower body and a human's upper body. It has crocodile skin and large horns and uses spears and other weapons. It is 5m tall and 10m in length.

Dreadbar prefers to be near water, such as oceans and rivers and sometimes makes underwater ruins it's home. It is very powerful and can use high-level Divine Magic. It sometimes has other Daemons, such as Melbiz, as its subordinates. Gilmen sometimes worship it as a god.

At first glance, the Human-like section appears to be its main section, but Dreadbar's brain is housed inside its crocodile-like front. When it speaks, its voice emits from the mouth of its upper body, which resembles a human, so that an uninformed opponent will not realize where its main section is.

Although they have high intellect, they are brutal and enjoy killing, so if you encounter them, you will not be able to avoid a fight. They are sometimes found sealed as guardians in the underwater ruins of the Ancient Magical Civilization.

abilities.title: ‚óØRegeneration = 10 points
abilities.description: At the end of each round, each section of the Dreadbar recovers 10 HP. This has no effect if the section has 0 HP or lower.

abilities.description: A Dreadbar can make two Bite attacks each round. It may choose to attack different characters with each attack.

The Dreadbar vomits a mass of cold air with "Range/Area: 2 (30m)/ Shot" in "Target: 1 area (Radius 6m)/20", dealing 2d+15 Water/Ice magic damage.

This unique skill cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: üó®Tail Swing
abilities.description: A Dreadbar can use its Tail to attack up to 5 targets in the same skirmish.

allmonsters.description:
Like Zombies, this is a corpse in motion, but it differs from Zombie in that its body tissues are dry and tight, giving it the appearance of a skeletal Human from a distance.

They are light and agile. If you approach them carelessly, they will cut you down to pieces in no time, and you may lose your life.

abilities.title: ‚óØContinuous Attack
abilities.description: If a Dry Corpse successfully hits a target in melee, it may make a second attack against the same target.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

allmonsters.description: These tree fairies take the shape of a beautiful yet mysterious woman with long, flowing green hair wrapped around her limbs. Often appearing nude, Dryads are known to be man-charmers and will have a pile of bodies at the base of their tree. These corpses of men they had mesmerized, providing fertilizer in death as they did protection in life. There are stories of men who have escaped the clutches of a Dryad by threatening to cut their tree down.

abilities.title: ‚óØFire Vulnerability
abilities.description: When Dryad is hit by Fire-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Universal Metamagic] and [MP Save/Fairy Tamer].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Mesmerize/12 (19)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
With "Range/Area: 30m/ Target", it whispers sweet words to "Target: 1 Character" and mesmerizes it. This effect only works if the target is a male character, and the target thinks Dryad is his beloved lover and acts to protect her.

The character in this state considers any attack on the Dryad to be an offense and tries to defeat these offenders with all his might. This effect is of Psychic type and lasts only while the character is within "Range: 2 (30m)" from the Dryad.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Tree Assimilation
abilities.description:
The Dryad can step into a chosen tree within touch distance and hide inside, becoming invulnerable to attacks. In this state, she will also be unable to use melee attacks or [‚ñ∫Mesmerize] new targets (although she still can cast spells and maintain the effect of [‚ñ∫Mesmerize]).

Burning a tree where a Dryad is hiding will force the Dryad out. Otherwise, exiting a tree is also a Major Action

allmonsters.description: This is a fairy with a long, twisted beard and an appearance similar to Dwarf. They create mansions and other structures in remote places using illusions to lure travelers and wanderers. However, the structures created by illusions sometimes fail to serve their purpose, and when they wake up, visitors are left out in the open.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Garden of Illusion / 11 (18) / Willpower / Negates
abilities.description:
Within "Range: Caster" causes "Target: All areas (30m Radius) / All" to be affected by the illusion, making the targets unable to attack, cast spells, or perform any other action that targets other than itself during its turn for 30 seconds (3 rounds). It is possible to use effects that affect the range of the target, starting from the position (area, coordinate) where the target itself is or where it is located.

This effect is Psychic type

allmonsters.description:
A Dullahan is an immense figure comprised of a headless knight in black armor, driving a hellish chariot pulled by skeletal horses.

It carries its head in its left arm and sentences a man to death in one year. Anyone who tries to prevent a Dullahan from doing so becomes a target themselves (though they may not be killed until a year later). It is unclear why Dullahans do what they do, but even if their target hides in a secret room or on an isolated island, the Dullahan always appears and attempts to kill them.

An improved Dullahan, the Dullahan Lord still wears beat-up white armor and tucks its head underneath one arm.

However, the Dullahan Lord is familiar with Magitech and takes advantage of an ancient Manabike instead of the old horse-drawn carriage.

Within "Range: Caster" causes a loud noise around the target, impacting "Target: All Areas (30m Radius) / All". Targets suffer 2d bludgeoning magic damage and cannot declare Minor Actions or active combat feats for 10 seconds (1 round). Their Accuracy check and Evasion check are penalties by -2.

allmonsters.description:
This is a humanoid-looking Olden fairy, standing about 1 meter in height. It has a faint luminescence and lacks any gender characteristics. Dunae's luminescence resonates and shines brightly under the moonlight.

While friendly towards Humanoids and animals, it is very fragile and rarely causes harm to others, unless it is forced to defend itself in direct danger.

abilities.title: ‚óØMoonlight
abilities.description: When Dunae is in the moonlight its HP and MP are increased by 5 and Magic Power by 2.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Moon Dance / Optional
abilities.description:
"Target: 1 Entire Character" within "Range: Touch" of Dunae receives a blessing. Target can re-roll 2d on one skill check for 1 day. Target can decide if and when they want to use re-roll or not. After the re-roll, the second roll must be used as a result. It also disappears after a day has passed without being used.

This effect is treated as a Curse type with Success Value 12.

The same target can receive this blessing only once per day

allmonsters.description:
This is a cleaning Construct probably made in the Magic Civilization Period. Inside its humanoid body, cleaning tools such as brooms, dustpans, and cloths are stored. Detergent can be sprayed from the base of the two legs and is sprayed on the floor or low places.

The appearance of many of them reflects the taste and aesthetic sense of their makers, and there is little uniformity in their design, ranging from those that are utilitarian to those that are highly valued as works of art.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttitude Control
abilities.description: It does not fall prone under any effect.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Detergent Spray / Can't
abilities.description:
The detergent is sprayed in "Target: 1 area (3m Radius) / Space" within "Range: Caster". All targets within this range, if they are on their feet, must make an Acrobatics check with Target Number of 10 at the beginning of their turn, failing which they will fall prone immediately. If the character falls, they cannot get up during their turn.

This effect lasts for 3 minutes (18 rounds).

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: A Dusky Grace is, compared to other Daemons, rather small. It resembles a short human, with pale grey skin and an elongated, prehensile tail.

abilities.title: ‚óØEntangling Tail
abilities.description:
A successful hit from a Tail entangles the target. The target is unable to move, suffers a -2 penalty to all Accuracy and Evasion Checks with a -2 penalty (this penalty is not cumulative) and is automatically hit by the Tail attack each round.

When the target tries to escape, use de-bonding (see ML, p. 71).

While entangled by this unique skill, the Dusky Grace cannot attack other characters. If the monster itself wants to release the target, it can do so with a Minor Action.

allmonsters.description:
She is a wind fairy who lives in a mountainous area and takes the form of a small girl. She is shy and does not show herself often, but if you call her, she is sure to return your call.

She is good at imitating voices and has the ability to reproduce exact sounds and voices.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: An Echo only receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: Echo can use the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Echo
abilities.description:
Echo should be in the same position where they ended her previous round to use this ability. Also, it cannot be used in a round in which Echo moved with Normal Move or Full Move.

Echo reproduces only one Spell with Chant, Spellsong, Finale, or any other unique skill that uses sound or voice that was cast from the end of the previous Echo's turn to the beginning of Echo's current turn. The original user's values and abilities are retained in reproducing the effect, and the rolls and range (area) are also the same. However, the specific target of the effect is redefined arbitrarily by this monster (as if it had used it).

When using this ability, Echo consumes Level (adventurer level, monster level) x 2 points of HP and MP of the original effect (no MP consumption is required for the original user at this Echo reuse). Also, regardless of the type of the original effect, the use of this ability is a Major Action

allmonsters.description: Efreet are 5m tall giant volcanic fairies, often appearing as great horned humans wreathed in flame. Found in volcanos and deep caves near Salamanders, Efreets will rarely appear to outsiders. Although usually cheerful, they tend to lose their temper quickly, and a raging Efreet will turn everything around into charcoal instantly.

abilities.title: ‚óØType: Fire/Magic Power 22 (29)
abilities.description: Only the Upper Body section can cast spells.

abilities.title: ‚óØWater/Ice Vulnerability
abilities.description: When the Efreet is hit by Water/Ice-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: An Efreet receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Twin Strike & Double Attack
abilities.description: An Efreet can make two attacks each round, though each attack requires its own Accuracy check. They may choose to attack different characters with each attack.

abilities.title: üó®Fire Mana Strike = +22 damage
abilities.description: An Efreet can deal an additional +22 damage on their next attack and turn the attacks into fire-type damage. At risk, it takes a -2 penalty to its Fortitude and Willpower checks.

abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.description:
Within "Range: Caster," with a dance, scatters burning fire and deals 2d+22 fire magic damage to "Target: All Areas (30m Radius)/All".

This unique skill can only be used once per round.

abilities.description: Within "Range/Area: 2 (100m)/ Target" cancels the racial ability [Sword's Grace / Flame Body] of "Target: 1 Character" for 10 seconds (1 round).

allmonsters.description: These fairies take the shape of beautiful girls, with a part of their hair resembling a flame. They live in groups of three to five near sources of fire. They are curious and fond of people, and will be friendly towards anyone who treats them kindly. However, they will never forgive those who are hostile or betray them, and will try to burn them with fire.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fire Dance/5 (12)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description: Within "Range: Touch," this effect wraps the "Target: 1 Character" in fire dust, dealing 2d+2 Fire magic damage. In addition, the target takes a -2 penalty to Evasion checks for 10 seconds (1 round)

allmonsters.description:
This is a legendary dragon. Its age ranges from several thousand to tens of thousands of years old, and although it is still alive, its references can be found in histories and myths of ages past. It is more like a divine being than a mythical beast, and is comparable to a Minor God, as they can be worshiped in some areas.

If anyone ever manages to defeat it, this deed will be passed down from generation to generation.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude & Breath Aptitude
abilities.description:
The Elder Dragon can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Universal Metamagic], and [Rune Master].

When declaring [Multi-Action], it can select not only the combination of "Melee Attack and Spell Cast" but also the combination of "Melee Attack, [‚ñ∫Flame and Brilliant Breath], or "Spell Cast and [‚ñ∫Flame and Brilliant Breath]" with one Major Action.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Flame and Brilliant Breath/28 (35)/ Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Within "Range/Area: 2 (50m) / Shot", it spits out breath to "Target: 1 area (6m Radius) / 20" and deals magic damage to the target. In this case, the monster can arbitrarily choose one of the following two types, which differ in damage and type.

Flame Breath: Spits out fire, dealing 2d+40 Fire type.

Brilliant Breath: Spits out an energy mass, dealing 2d+30 Energy type.

This ability cannot be used in consecutive turns (whichever breath is used, neither breath can be used in the next turn).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Wordbreak
abilities.description: Elder Dragon uses [Wordbreak] combat feat using Head's Magic Power.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ None, Magic Obstacle = -4
abilities.description:
The Elder Dragon's huge body poking through the clouds hinders the attack.

The Head of the Greater Dragon cannot be engaged in melee combat. And if a character casts a spell targeting the Head section or other character in the same section caster gains a -4 penalty on the Spellcasting check.

This unique skill is lost when the Body section has 0 or less HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight II
abilities.description:

allmonsters.description: This Mythical Beast is the superior species to the Lesser Manticore. Although its size and appearance have not changed, its power and knowledge have become awe-inspiring. They always know the location of the labyrinth where a powerful magic sword is hidden. However, they are still twisted and do not easily listen to Humanoids in normal circumstances. They usually ask for something unreasonable to do for their vast knowledge.

abilities.description:
If the Tail's attack hits and deals 1 or more points of applied damage, it will paralyze the target and reduce its Dexterity by -6 points (to a minimum of 0). This effect is cumulative, and when the Dexterity reaches 0, the target will be unable to make any melee or ranged attacks.

If the character has a fixed value, its Accuracy check is reduced by -1 for each effect of this poison, and the character cannot be attacked after three such effects.

This effect is Poison type and lasts for 1 hour.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight

allmonsters.description:
Eltrias is a humanoid-looking magitech soldier that was reportedly created at the end of the Magitech Civilization. Its appearance is reminiscent of a knight wielding a sword and shield, and it stands at nearly 5 meters tall. Eltrias was likely responsible for commanding other magitech soldiers.

In close combat, Eltrias is a skilled fighter, wielding its sword and shield with ease. Its shield is equipped with a built-in gun, allowing for combat at various distances. Eltrias can also deploy a Protective Shield from its body, suggesting it was designed to work in tandem with Barba (see p. 160). Eltrias has the ability to command other magitechs and can coordinate attacks with them.

While originally designed as the core of an attack, Eltrias is sometimes stationed to protect a base without engaging in battle. However, some rogue units can be found wandering the wilderness, attacking enemy bases and settlements indiscriminately.

Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Attack Order
abilities.description:
The Eltrias instructs the surrounding machines to move precisely.

Magitech characters within "1 area (4m radius) / 10" centered on Eltrias gain a +1 bonus to Accuracy checks and +2 points of damage for 10 seconds (1 round).

This effect cannot be used for consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Defensive Order
abilities.description:
The Eltrias directs the surrounding Magitechs to perform defensive actions.

Magitech characters within "1 area (4m radius)/10" centered on Eltrias gain a bonus of +1 to Evasion and +2 points to Defense for 10 seconds (1 round).

This effect cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØLuminous Flux
abilities.description: Eltrias attacks with Luminous Flux are treated as Shooting Attacks with "Range: 2 (30m)". And they deal magic damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØTargeting
abilities.description: Stray shots cannot occur.

abilities.title: ‚óØProtective Shield Deployment
abilities.description:
When the Body section takes Fire, Water/Ice, Wind, Earth, or Lightning type damage, a protective shield forms around it, nullifying any subsequent attacks of the same element. When the defensive shield is put up, all sections are not affected by any damage or disadvantageous effect caused by the type.

Once a new protective shield is put up, any previous protective shield loses its effectiveness. At the beginning of the battle, the defensive layer against Fire is deployed.

abilities.title: üó®Cleave I
abilities.description: It can attack up to 3 characters with melee attacks that can be reached, but the damage will be reduced by -3.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Shield Guard
abilities.description:
Eltrias protects itself with a large shield. Changes the target of ranged attacks on all sections of itself to the Left Arm section.

Does not interfere and stop attacks, spells, and unique skills targeting multiple sections.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Concealed Gun/12 (19)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
The shield has a gun built into it which Eltrias can use to attacks suddenly.

Within "Range/area:2 (20m)/ Shot" it deals 2d+10 magic damage to "Target: 1 Character". Characters who have already been chosen before as targets for this ability receive a +2 bonus on Evasion checks.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description:
An Eltrias' height prevents enemies from attacking it.

The Head and Body receive a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks.

When the Legs fall to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

abilities.title: ‚óØOverdraft/11 (18)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: A target hit by a Kick will fall prone. Characters may counter this effect with a Strength check (see CR I, p. 113) instead of Fortitude if they wish.

allmonsters.description:
This is a Mythical Beast with green body hair of about 2m in length, inhabiting the forested areas of the Alframe continent, and looks like a raccoon. It can communicate with the same level of intellect as humans. It has a mild-mannered character and is a mediator between multiple Animals and Mythical Beasts in the forest ecosystem.

If a Humanoid or a Barbarous is trespassing on the territory of the Animals in the forest, they may use their magical powers to solve the problem.

For the mount version of this creature, see Emerald Raccoon.

allmonsters.description: This is an inexperienced shooter who shows promising abilities. They judge situations accurately and drive their opponents into a tight corner with high damage using their sniping.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Aimed Shot
abilities.description: Emerging Sniper focuses on a specific target. On its next turn, if it makes a Shooting Attack against the target and successfully hits with a roll of 3 or more over the opponent's Evasion check, the combined damage will be doubled.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may choose to change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides.

allmonsters.description: This is a higher Daemon that looks like a maiden holding a pearl with countless ivies entwined around her. The maiden is said to have taken the body of a person who was once sacrificed to this Daemon. The Maiden enjoys showing herself to make others hesitate to attack her or to make them feel guilty. At first glance, it looks like a Plant, but the main section is the central pearl, and the ivies and the maiden accompany it to protect it.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó® Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Universal Metamagic], [Double Cast], and [Rune Master].

abilities.title: ‚óØKnowledge & Weakness Exploit
abilities.description:
Endertuz can make Sage Knowledge checks with standard value 18 (25 fixed value).

Endertuz deals double damage to other monster weak points it detected.

abilities.title: ‚è©Open Eyes/‚è©Close Eyes
abilities.description:
The Maiden section has different abilities depending on its eyes condition. When the eyes are closed, the Maiden section is treated as blind (other sections still have eyesight).

The [‚è©Open Eyes] and [‚è©Close Eyes] can be performed only once before the Main section performs the Major Action.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ +4

The maiden is holding the pearl and shielding it.

The Pearl section gains a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee and ranged attacks.

This effect disappears when the Maiden section falls to 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: ‚óØLovely Figure/22 (29)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
It binds adversaries with guilt and inhibits their actions.

A character who inflicts 1 or more applied damage by a melee attack to the Maiden section and fails a Willpower check cannot take any Major or Minor Actions for the following 1 minute (6 rounds).

This effect is only active when the Maiden has her eyes closed and is automatically canceled when the Maiden opens her eyes.

This effect is Psychic type.

abilities.title: ‚óØPraying Maiden (Only When Eyes Closed)
abilities.description: Maiden and Pears sections heal HP and MP by 10 points at the end of their turn.

abilities.title: ‚óØRaging Maiden (Only When Eyes Open)
abilities.description:
The Maiden section is treated as having acquired the following Combat Feats (in addition to those of [‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude]):

[Multi-Action], [Mana Strike], and [Battle Master].

abilities.title: ‚óØMana Resistance
abilities.description: Reduce all Magic Damage Pearl section received by -5.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ Impossible

Tangled ivy hinders attacks.

This unique skill is lost when two or more Ivy sections have 0 or fewer HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCoordinated Attack
abilities.description: If an attack on an Ivy section is evaded, the other section's attacks on that target gain a +1 to the Accuracy check against that target. This modifier is accumulated for each evaded attack. However, once any section attack hits or the monster's turn is ended, it is lost.

allmonsters.description: A giant tree that roams around, using its roots as feet to walk. Entlets are said to be over 100 years old and have a wide variety of knowledge they can be persÍ∑≠ to share with others. Their leaves are reportedly herbs that increase one's wisdom, and teas brewed with them are top-rated among mothers. Entlets tend to be gentle giants and will be friendly if treated in kind.

allmonsters.description:
This is a shrimp-faced daemon, spotted in and around Shallow Abysses, about the size of a Human child, with thick, short limbs and dull indigo skin.

Although not much of a threat on their own, they can appear in large numbers at once, and often the Adventurers' Guild is asked to exterminate these monsters.

abilities.title: ‚óØMana-inhibiting Poison/4 (11)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: If the claw attack hits, the target's Magic Power is reduced by -1 for 10 seconds (1 round). This effect is Poison type.

allmonsters.description:
Ergacleo is a forward-leaning Daemon with numerous tentacles sprouting from its head. When fully extended, Ergacleo can reach a height of 4 meters, but it usually bends its body to a height of fewer than 2 meters. This daemon is a fearsome magician who has created many spells, and conversely, has a unique skill that renders its body impervious to any magic. Its long, slender limbs and torso are weak, and it tries to protect them from enemy attacks as much as possible.

Perhaps because of their high intelligence, they are sometimes sealed in ancient archives and other places as guardians or librarians, or used as servants. Naturally, however, it is not their intention to live there forever, and they will try to break free by lies. If this is impossible, they will kill the intruder (even if the seal is released, they will still try to kill them). They seem to take pleasure in accumulating magical knowledge and may possess several rare grimoires.

abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], and [Mana Save].

This monster is immune to magic. An Ergacleo's HP cannot be reduced by magic damage.

Items, unique skills of the monsters, and other non-magic effects obtained by other-type classes are effective, but they do not cause magic damage.

abilities.description:

Mako Stones that are not consumed before the Apostle's HP falls below 0 are automatically acquired when determining loot.

allmonsters.description: The Evil Index is a Construct known as "The Monster Encyclopedia." It is a Mimic-type monster that was created by ancient magicians to safeguard their homes and research findings. It appears as a thick book floating in the air, with sharp fangs lining the edges of its binding. When attacking its prey, the book opens slightly, and a shrill laugh can be heard coming from between the fangs. Inside the book, there is a collection of magical knowledge that Evil Index utilizes to launch its attacks.

If a character approaches it unintentionally, they need to make a Danger check with Target Number 22, and if it fails, they will be surprised. allmonsters.description: This priest believes in an evil god associated with the Second Sword. They are enemies of Humanoid society in various ways, such as those who sneak into Humanoid cities and try to propagate their religion and those who work in partnership with the Barbarous clans.

allmonsters.description:
This is a self-sustaining sword created by a sorcerer who studied Swords of Genesis during the Magic Civilization Period as the result of their research. It is about 5 meters long.

Swords of Genesis have been studied from various aspects, but the monstrosity that we see here was created to reproduce its performance and power and has survived to the present day. The size of the sword is also too large to be handled by a humanoid.

Strictly speaking, it's not a magic sword but a Construct in the shape of a sword, but it seems that some of the research results were able to reproduce part of the secret of Swords of Genesis.

abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from edged weapons and all Magic damage. Sword section melee attacks are treated as silver weapons.

If this ability is declared with [üó®Power Strike II] or [üó®Lethal Strike II], the damage will be changed only for one target.

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +8 points. When declaring [üó®Lethal Strike II], this ability is triggered when the modified roll is 10 (the original roll was 9) or more.

abilities.title: ‚óØCareful Balance
abilities.description: The well-balanced and carefully crafted handle helps to move the sword blade. The Sword section has the ability of [‚óØMultiple Actions = 2 times]. This ability is lost when the HP of the Handle section becomes 0 or less.

allmonsters.description:
This Daemon is about 4 meters long and resembles a beautiful woman wearing a white cloak. Her hair and face are also white, while only the tip of her tail and her eyes are golden. The mantle is not a garment but skin that shimmers around her body like velvet.

Ezerves are rational and aggressive, preferring to work alone and not getting along with others. They can breathe a white substance that puts creatures into a state of suspended animation. The creature in this state is indistinguishable from a corpse, and after a funeral or other ceremony is held for it as if it were dead, the creature likes to cause despair by informing Humanoids of its true state.

Additionally, creatures put into suspended animation may be used as offerings for summoning other Daemons or as a Daemon Seminarium.

abilities.title: ‚óØWhite Skin
abilities.description: The physical and magical damage of the lightning and energy type is reduced by -3 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØMagic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Universal Metamagic], [Targeting], [Hawk Eye], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], and [Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Breath of Endless Sleep/Optional
abilities.description:
Spits white breath on up to 5 targets of Ezerve's choice within "Range: Caster", sapping life from them.

The targets are placed in a state of suspended animation and are treated as if no time has elapsed.

A character in this state is indistinguishable from a corpse.

If the character knows about this ability (they have prior knowledge of the ability, or have successfully performed a Monster Knowledge check on this monster), they can perform a Detect check with Target Number 20 on a corpse that they strongly suspect is under this effect, and if successful, they can detect that the corpse is in a state of suspended animation under this effect.

This ability is treated as "Resistance: Can't" for targets with 0 or less HP.

This ability requires 10 minutes to use. It also consumes 30 MP when used.

This effect is treated as a poison and curse type with a Success Value of 20.

abilities.title: üó®Flash of a Magic Blade
abilities.description:
Makes a Melee Attack against the target in the same skirmish area where this monster is located.

This effect cannot be performed on consecutive turns and costs 8 MP.

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +9 points.

If the HP of the Body section falls to 0 or below, it loses this ability.

abilities.description:
If the Needles attack hits and deals 1 or more points of applied damage, the MP of all sections is restored by 5 points.

If the MP of a section is more than half of the maximum value, the MP of that section is not recovered.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Point Needle/13 (20)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description: Throws a needle at the target character within "Range: 10m" and deals 2d+8 Curse magic damage. Using this effect consumes 5 MP.

allmonsters.description:
A giant anglerfish, about 5 to 7 meters long, it can be found in the coastal areas of the Alframe continent.

On its back are piles of ruins and building junk, which at night or from a distance may appear to be island structures.

Among the Barbarous, the Lizardmen are particularly knowledgeable about the ecology of this monster, and there are reports that they treat it as a nest or base, or use it to approach the coast.

abilities.title: ‚óØNatural Mimicry/16/Danger Sense/Negates
abilities.description:
The Fake Angler disguises itself as an island by floating with only its back breaching the surface of the water. While it is using this mimicry, characters cannot perform a Monster Knowledge check on this monster. If a character approaches it unintentionally, they need to make a Danger check with Target Number 16, and if it fails, they will be surprised (see CR I, p. 144). Mimicry will be automatically ended once the monster starts to act.

This monster cannot be detected with [Sense Magic].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Dizzying Light/10 (17)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
Within "Range: Caster," it shines a lantern on the forehead and confuses "Target: All Areas (30m Radius) / All".

The target will appear to be out of position or distance from all characters, including Fake Angler, for 10 seconds (1 round), and when attempting to use a ranged attack or ranged effect, the target must roll 1d after determining the target, and if the roll is 1 or 2, the target cannot be properly targeted, and the action must be canceled. If canceled, any ammunition, MP, and consumables will not be lost (though the target forfeits their action for the turn).

Every time this effect is used, it costs 10 points of MP.

This effect is Psychic type.

abilities.title: ‚óØSpine Fin Poison/11 (18)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: A target hit by a Spine Fin attack and suffering from more than 1 point of applied damage to HP will suffer an additional 7 points of poison magic damage.

abilities.title: üó®Tail Sweep
abilities.description:
The monster can use its tail to attack up to 5 targets in the same skirmish. An Accuracy check is made on all characters at once, and damage is determined individually.

This attack cannot be used in consecutive rounds.

allmonsters.language: Trade Common, Regional Dialect, Learned Magic Language
allmonsters.description: A Humanoid magician who has lost sight of the true purpose of magic and uses their power for selfish gain. The GM should decide on their specific magic type in advance. If this monster appears in solo play, it should be treated as having learned Truespeech Magic, unless otherwise specified.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may choose to change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll, by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Magic (1 System) Level 3 / Magic Power 5 (12)
abilities.description: The Wizard has mastered one of the following: Truespeech Magic, Spiritualism Magic, Fairy Magic, Magitech, Nature Magic or Summoning Arts up to Level 3.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magical Aptitude
abilities.description: The Wizard has learned the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Metamagic/Targets].

allmonsters.description:
These rodents are about 40cm long and are found in abandoned buildings and ruins. They propagate in sewer systems and catacombs and are hated by people because they make their homes unsanitary and spread diseases.

They breed prolifically, and if you see one, it is safe to assume that there are many more around.

abilities.title: ‚óØDisease Bite / 2 (9) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description: If a character is hit with a Bite attack that inflicts 1 or more applied damage, this character gains a -1 penalty to their Fortitude. This effect is of the Disease type, it is permanent unless healed and it is not cumulative.

abilities.title: ‚óØNimble
abilities.description: Filthy Rat gains a +2 bonus to the Evasion check against ranged attacks.

allmonsters.description:
This is a Giant of about 7m tall which lives near volcanoes. They resemble dwarves in appearance and customs. They worship the Flame Warrior Grendal and forge huge weapons. They have immunity to fire, and their hair and beards shimmer with flames. Their skin is reddish-bronze, and they wear clothes made of asbestos and metal armor.

They are not hostile to everyone, but will warn anyone who approaches the mine which is their territory, and will show no mercy to those who still try to sneak in.

They often possess extremely powerful magic swords, either forged by themselves or found on 1,000-year-old corpses. Some of these swords are legendary. Many people challenge Fire Giants for their hoard, but none ever return.

abilities.title: ‚óØContinuous Attack
abilities.description: If a Fire Giant successfully hits a target in melee, they may make a second attack against the same target.

abilities.title: üó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: Can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫War Cry / 20 (27) / Willpower / Negates
abilities.description: The Fire Giant unleashes a powerful yell, causing fear in those who fail to resist within a 10-meter radius around Fire Giant. This fear, treated as a Psychic effect, gives a -2 penalty to all Action Checks for the next 30 seconds (3 rounds).

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ +4
abilities.description:
The Upper Body cannot be attacked in melee. Against any ranged attacks, Upper Body receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks.

When the Lower Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

allmonsters.sections: 3 (Right Launch Tube / Center Launch Tube / Left Launch Tube)
allmonsters.description:
This is a specialized gunnery model of the Zerlay series, with three optical weapons connected side by side. The legs, which serve as the model's base, have only minimum mobility and are not designed for high-speed or long-distance movement.

Although it has a high attack power, it is limited because the simultaneous firing of all the rays causes malfunction due to heat exhaustion.

abilities.title: ‚óØMana Coating (2)
abilities.description: Reduces magic damage received by -2.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Light Ray/9 (16)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Attacks with a huge ray of light.

Attacks target within "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/Line" and deals 2d+7 Energy magic damage.

This unique skill cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØTargeting & Hawk Eye
abilities.description: [‚ñ∫Light Ray] fired into a skirmish cannot make stray shots and can attack targets beyond the skirmish.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Overcharge
abilities.description: The next [‚ñ∫Light Ray] fired from the same section will have its damage increased by 3 points. This effect is cumulative up to 2 times (+6).

abilities.title: ‚óØExhaust Heat
abilities.description:
If any section uses [‚ñ∫Light Ray], adjacent sections cannot use [‚ñ∫Light Ray] during the same turn.

The three sections are linked side by side, with the Center Launch Tube flanked by the Right and Left Launch Tubes.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: This is a golem made of flesh. It is about 2 to 3 meters in size and looks like a simplified version of the human form.

abilities.description:
None.

abilities.description:
Obsidian Shield (Small) (150) (üó®‚ñ≥Cover I)

Corundum Protection (Small) (100) (‚óØGuardian I)
