allmonsters.language: Trade Common, Barbaric, Ogre, Drakish, Arcana
allmonsters.description: Much larger than the Lesser Ogre species, Ogres wield significant physical and magical power. Standing close to 3m tall, they can use larger equipment. Ogres act as though they are master tacticians, using Lesser Ogres and other Barbarous as fodder for their evil (and often cowardly) operations to attack Humanoid races. However, their success rate isn't the greatest, and those who fail often tend to be sent on those same suicide missions by other Ogres.

abilities.title: ‚óØ‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Personification
abilities.description:
An Ogre may take on the appearance and mannerisms of a character they have eaten or change back.

When transformed, the Ogre's maximum HP and MP are decreased by 5. Accuracy, Evasion, Fortitude, and Willpower are also reduced by 1 point each. This form can be held up to 18 hours per day.

The [‚è©‚ñ≥Personification] can also be ended with Minor Action or during Combat Preparation.

allmonsters.description: Although they have no shapeshift ability and cannot cast spells, they are a subspecies of Ogres, boasting a strong body twice the size of a normal Ogre and formidable strength. Because of their low intellect, they are used by Ogres and Drakes, but as long as they can fight, Ogre Berserkers are happy.

abilities.title: ‚óØContinuous Attack II
abilities.description: If an Ogre Berserker successfully hits a target in melee, they may make a second attack. They can make a third attack against the same target if a second attack hits.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike II
abilities.description:
An Ogre Berserker can deal an additional +12 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by the Ogre Berserker this turn receives a -2 penalty.

This declaration should have been made at the time of the first attack. It cannot be made during an additional attack from the [‚óØContinuous Attack II].

allmonsters.description: Although they lack the shapeshift ability, Ogre Warlords are a superior species of Ogres, possessing physical and magical powers far superior to those of ordinary Ogres. Though not much different in appearance from an ordinary Ogre, they are sometimes adorned with crowns and necklaces and carry specially forged swords that prove their kingship.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: üó® Mana Strike = +14 damage
abilities.description: An Ogre Warlord may deal an additional +14 damage to their next melee attack. If they do, at risk, they receive a -2 penalty to Fortitude and Willpower checks until their next turn.

loottable.loot: Royal Treasured Sword (8,000G/Gold Black White S)

allmonsters.language: Trade Common, Barbaric, Ogre, Drakish, Arcana
allmonsters.description:
This is a high-ranking Ogre with excellent magical abilities. They are capable of casting Truespeech Magic and Spiritualism Magic and often blend in with humanoids to carry out their evil deeds.

Ogre Wizards are considered elite among Ogres and sometimes command infiltration teams of Lesser Ogres. They use Lesser Ogres to secretly neutralize the Swords of Protection and enter Humanoid cities. Ogre Wizards are known to gradually replace the inhabitants of a city with Ogres under their control and then one day reveal their true nature and ravage the city. When an Ogre Wizard is discovered in a town, it is often too late to stop them.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Personification
abilities.description:
An Ogre Wizard may take on the appearance and mannerisms of a character they have eaten or change back.

When transformed, the Ogre Wizard's maximum HP and MP are decreased by 5. Accuracy, Evasion, Fortitude, and Willpower are also reduced by 1 point each. This form can be held up to 18 hours per day.

The [‚è©‚ñ≥Personification] can also be ended with Minor Action or during Combat Preparation.

allmonsters.description:
The Onyx Basilisk is a higher-level of Basilisk with an evil onyx eye. The petrification curse this Basilisk gives turns the victim into a black agate (onyx).

This monster also has an evil eye of stagnation as its second evil eye.

The transformed Onyx Basilisk is a large lizard over 5 meters in length, and its right and left evil eyes to shine in milky white and black. Unlike the rational Human form, Onyx Basilisk in this form moves with its emotions and lays waste to the beings in front of it.

For the Monstrous form of this monster, see Onyx Basilisk (Monstrous Form).

abilities.title: üó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚è©Onyx Gaze/15 (22)/Willpower/Neg
abilities.description:
With "Range/Area: 2 (50m) / Target", it stares at "Target: 1 Character" and petrifies the target (Dexterity, Agility-6) (see CR II, p. 329). Under this effect, the target eventually turns into an onyx statue instead of a stone statue. It is possible to cancel the effect with [Cure Stone].

If the target of this unique skill is the one who holds the mirror, and if Willpower's success value is 4 or more points higher than the Target Number, gaze can bounce off the, giving this effect to Onyx Basilisk always affecting them without a check even if Onyx Basilisk is blindfolded. This unique skill is of curse type.

This unique skill can be used only once per round.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Stagnation Gaze/14 (21)/Willpower/Neg
abilities.description: With "Range/Area: 2 (30m) / Target", the monster stares at "Target: 1 Character" and prevents its movement. Target cannot take any Major Action and any Minor Action for 10 seconds (1 round). However, if the target can take multiple Major Actions, the number of Major Actions is reduced by only one (still no Minor Action can be taken).

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison Blood/16 (23)/Fortitude/Neg
abilities.description: Anyone who deals damage to this monster in the same skirmish will receive 2d+6 poison magic damage at the end of their turn.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Monstrous Form
abilities.description:
The monster transforms into its monstrous form. For data on the monstrous form, see Onyx Basilisk (Monstrous Form). HP and MP are restored to their maximum values, and all effects of spells and the like are removed. When [‚ñ∫Monstrous Form] is activated, only the Body section is treated as if it made a Major Action; the Head and Evil Eyes sections may still take a Major Action on this turn.

[‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Humanification] cannot be used for 1 hour immediately after using [‚ñ∫Monstrous Form].

allmonsters.sections: 4 (Right Evil Eye / Left Evil Eye / Head / Body)
allmonsters.description: This is the Monstrous form of the Onyx Basilisk (Human Form).

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison Blood/17 (24)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: It is the same as the unique skill of Onyx Basilisk (Human Form), except for a different target number.

abilities.title: ‚è©Onyx Gaze/16 (23)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description: It is the same as the unique skill of Onyx Basilisk (Human Form), except for a different target number.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Stagnation Gaze/15 (22)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description: It is the same as the unique skill of Onyx Basilisk (Human Form), except for a different target number.

abilities.title: üó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats[Multi-Action], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØStanding Upright
abilities.description: If the HP of the Body is 0 or less, all other sections get a -2 penalty on Evasion checks.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Humanification
abilities.description:
It instantly transforms into Human form. Refer to Onyx Basilisk (Human Form) for data on the Human form. If the Body section has suffered HP or MP damage or has been affected by magic or other effects, these are carried over to the Human form. If its HP is less than 0, it immediately falls unconscious.

[‚è©‚ñ≥Instant Humanification] cannot be used for 1 hour immediately after using [‚ñ∫Monstrous Form].

allmonsters.description: These are civilians who do not have the means to fight. If you need data for a civilian NPC in a scenario, you may use this data.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may choose to change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll, by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides

allmonsters.description:
These are the leaders of the wolf pack. They are one size larger than a normal Wolf and much more dangerous. However, the true fear lies in the fact that wolves led by a pack leader move in a more controlled manner than regular ones.

For novice adventurers, a pack of wolves led by a Pack Leader can be a considerable threat.

abilities.title: ‚óØPack Command
abilities.description: Gives a +1 bonus to all Wolves' Accuracy and Evasion checks in the skirmish in which it resides. This effect is not cumulative, even if there are multiple Pack Leaders.

abilities.title: üó®Aimed Attack
abilities.description: When attacking, the Pack Leader can gain a +1 bonus to Accuracy. This ability has no effect on characters equipped with metal armor.

allmonsters.description:
A white horse with wings on its back, a Pegasus is a rare sight due to its somewhat skittish personality. The image of a Pegasus is popular in folktales and legends, and it is said that riding one is like running in the sky. They do not simply allow anyone to ride them, so the few adventurers and aristocrats seen on a Pegasus have just that much more prestige.

The wild species lives mainly in rugged mountains, but it is a popular Mythical Beast for riding and is also kept by the Rider's Guilds. It is rare to find adventurers and nobles who keep them privately.

For the mount version of this creature, see Pegasus.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Pegasus receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison/Disease Immunity
abilities.description: When the mount is subjected to a poison or disease-type effect or damage, it can always be resisted as "Resistance: Optional."

allmonsters.description:
Peri has a beautiful female figure, a fire fairy who lives in the secluded regions and high mountains where humanoids and barbarous are not likely to visit.

The large joints of its arms and legs and other parts of its body are covered with orange-colored fire making it dangerous-looking to approach.

Basically, Peri prefers solitude. They are usually cold to visitors to their habitat, or they hide and try not to get involved. However, she may develop a romantic interest in a humanoid male on rare occasions.

In such a case, the Peri will secretly pursue the man, disguise her appearance as that of the opposite race, and seduce him. She then takes him back to her place of residence, never to rerelease him to live with him.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], and [Universal Metamagic].

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Peri receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Humanization
abilities.description:
Peri can change into any Humanoid female form. It can choose which race it wants to change into, but the specific appearance afterward is fixed for each race. Different Peri can take on various forms (even if they change into the same race), but they all share that they are beautiful and passionate women.

This ability can only be used once daily and lasts up to 1 day. Peri can cancel it with Minor Action

allmonsters.description: This is a serpent with a dangerous poison that gradually petrifies its prey. The poison is mainly used to weaken its prey. However, it can also be used as a weapon against powerful enemies, and it will not stop attacking until it has completely petrified its prey.

abilities.title: ‚óØPetropoison/7 (14)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: If the Bite's attack hits and deals more than 1 point of applied damage, the target will gain the Petrifaction (Dexterity, Agility/-6) effect. This effect is Poison type.

allmonsters.description:
This is a mythical beast in the shape of a giant 7-meter-long crocodile with pure white scales.

Despite their fearsome appearance, they are gentle and thoughtful and are self-appointed guardians of great rivers and lakes. Together, they will attack without mercy anyone who harms those who live in the water or who destroy the watery places.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fairy Magic 9 Level / Magic Power 11 (18)
abilities.description: Can cast Water/Ice type up to 9 ranks. This does not change even if the contract pattern is adopted (see MA, p. 136).

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: üó®Tail Swing II
abilities.description: A Tail attack hits up to 5 targets in the skirmish Petsuchos is in.

allmonsters.description:
This is a large butterfly, about 3 meters long. Its wings are beautifully iridescent and it flies slowly in the sky.

Although they do not speak a language, they are able to share their thoughts with others, and may act as mediators in their territory.

abilities.title: ‚óØMana Absorption Proboscis / 8 (15) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description: A target whose HP is reduced by a Proboscis attack has its MP reduced by 1d points. At the same time, the MP of the Body section is recovered by the same amount.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fairy Magic 7 Level / Magic Power 10 (17)
abilities.description:
Can use Earth, Water/Ice, Wind, and Light types.

This does not change even if the contract pattern is adopted (see MA, p. 136).

abilities.title: ‚óØLight Protection
abilities.description: The Right Wing and Left Wing take -3 less magic damage, regardless of type.

abilities.title: ‚óØAdhesive Scales
abilities.description: If a melee attack with an edged weapon hits a Right Wing or Left Wing section, the physical damage dealt by the weapon is reduced by 1 point immediately after the attack. This effect is cumulative (up to -4). This effect lasts until the weapon is cleaned with more than 10 liters of fresh water for 10 minutes.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Phantasmal Scales / 9 (16) / Willpower / Negates
abilities.description:
Within "Range: Touch," confuses "Target: 1 Entire Character" and makes it difficult to recognize the enemy. When a target uses a melee attack or casts a spell targeting the Body section within the next 10 seconds (1 round), roll 1d. If the result is "1-3", the target will be automatically switched to the section that used this unique skill. If the result is "4-6", the target will remain in the Body section without any change.

This effect does not work if the Body section is only one of multiple targets from [Metamagic/Targets].

This effect is treated as a Psychic type.

allmonsters.description:
A Phantom is the consciousness of someone that has died, leaving behind a strong grudge. It reacted with mana and became Undead. It takes on the form of a living being, but has no substance and wanders about covered in a white cloth.

They hate the living with a passion and attack them to welcome new members into the ranks of the undead. This resentment is feared because it curses and debilitates the living and empowers the undead, giving them more power and increasing their threat.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Undead Blessing/5 (12)/Optional
abilities.description:
It empowers other undead characters within "Range: Self" and "Target: 2-3 area (10m radius / All)". The targets receive a +2 bonus for Accuracy checks and +2 points to damage for 10 seconds (1 round).

This effect is a curse type.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Hateful Scream/7 (14)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Phantom emits a cursed cry to the living at "Range: Self" and "Target: 1 area (6m radius) / All". All targets except for the undead are dealt 2d+2 Curse magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

allmonsters.description:
It is a sphere about one meter in diameter that floats while emitting phosphorescent light. This construct is believed to have been used by wizards to show off their creations and illuminate them.

As well as being a light, it could act as a guardian, preventing the exhibits from being stolen or damaged.

It is often encountered in ruins, along with the architecture and objects it was guarding. Although it does not speak itself, there have been reports of it being stopped by Arcana language words.

abilities.title: ‚óØFire Immunity, ‚óØLightning Immunity, ‚óØPoison Immunity, ‚óØDisease Immunity, ‚óØPsychic Type Immunity
‚óØEnergy Absorption
abilities.description:
It is immune to Energy-type damage. Conversely, if the monster is hit by an Energy-type attack, its HP is recovered by the amount of applied damage.

No effects other than damage can be caused by Energy-type effects.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison/11 (18)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: If the Slam hits, it deals 2d Poison magic damage to the target.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison Body/11 (18)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: A character who makes a melee attack against this monster and hits it suffers 2d points of Poison magic damage at the end of their turn.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: A Pixie is an Olden fairy with the appearance of a small girl. It has pointy ears and beautiful butterfly-like wings on its back. When a Pixie encounters travelers, it approaches them in a friendly manner, often rolling up flower petals while engaging in conversation. Pixies are generally kind to strangers and willingly answer their questions. However, they can occasionally play adorable pranks on them.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Pixie receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks

allmonsters.description: This is a Zombie carrying a plague in its body. Its claws can make their victim catch their plague. The disease turns its victims into new Zombies. In some cases, entire villages have been turned into Zombies because of a lack of proper response.

abilities.title: ‚óØPlague Claws / 4 (11) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description:
If the target is hit by a Claws attack, the target falls victim to a disease called the Wight Plague. If the target fails the Fortitude Check, one of the target's ability score, (randomly selected) is reduced by one point at the moment of the attack and every full day thereafter. This effect is cumulative. When any ability score becomes 0, the target dies and becomes a new Plague Zombie.

This effect is of the Disease type and lasts until the victim is healed by some means or becomes a Plague Zombie. Even if the target dies from an effect other than this disease, the progression of the disease does not stop, and in some cases, the target may become a Plague Zombie long after death.

allmonsters.description:
This is a giant centipede that appears on the plains of the Alframe continent. It mainly feeds on animals on the plains, but in the Dorden region, it has been observed to frequent the vicinity of railroad tracks. Studies have shown that they move along the tracks by licking the track water and oil spilled by trains, earning them the nickname "Railway Centipedes." This habit is thought to be a way for them to replenish some nutrients, but this has not been proven with certainty. Because they are quite large, they often block railroad tracks and are requested to be taken down.

For the mount version of this creature, see Plain Centipede (mount).

abilities.title: ‚óØDeadly Poison/8 (15)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: If the Jaw attack hits and deals at least 1 applied damage, it deals an additional 2d+6 Poison magic damage to the target.

abilities.title: üó®Decoy Attack I
abilities.description:
It gains -2 to Accuracy checks, but the damage is increased by +2 on hit.

If the declared attack is evaded, the enemy receives a -1 penalty to Evasion checks for the next 10 seconds (1 round). This effect is cumulative up to -4 but is lost if the target fails an Evasion check even once.

allmonsters.description:
This construct looks like a about 30cm in diameter crystal ball floating in the space. Lightning is swirling inside the sphere and occasionally discharges outward with sound.

Its lightning can activate Constructs and Magitech. It is known that this Construct was developed by researchers in the Magic Civilization Period, but it was later confirmed to be effective for Magitech as well. In the Magitech Civilization Period, there were cases where Magitech was used at archaeological sites.

abilities.title: ‚óØShock
abilities.description: Melee Attack damage inflicted by this monster is treated as Lightning magic damage.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Lightning Connection/Can't
abilities.description:
Deals "Target: 1 Character" at "Range: Touch" 5 Lightning fixed damage.

If the target is a Construct or Magitech monster, the target gets a +2 bonus to Accuracy check for 10 seconds (1 round), and the physical damage it causes becomes Lightning type and increased by +3 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: This is a golem in the shape of a dragon, made of a solid alloy, mainly platinum.

abilities.title: ‚óØSuperalloy Body
abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from magical or weapon attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight II
abilities.description:
All sections receive a +2 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

It loses this ability if any of the Wing section HP becomes 0 or less.

[[div class="golemitems"]]

abilities.title: ‚ÄªBody Only
abilities.description:
Bright Red Ruby (Large) (8,000)

‚ñ∫Flame Breath/15 (22)/Fortitude/Half

Golem spits out the fire with "Range/Area: 2 (20m) / Shot" and "Target: 1 area (5m Radius) / 10," dealing 2d+13 Fire magic damage.

This ability cannot be used in consecutive turns. It also cannot be used in the turn immediately after using [‚ñ∫Blizzard Breath] or [‚ñ∫Lightning].

Blue Lotus Jade (Large) (8,000)

‚ñ∫Blizzard Breath/15 (22)/Fortitude/Half

Golem sprays a jet of water with "Range/Area: 20m / Shot" in a "Target: 4m Radius / 10", dealing 2d+13 Water/Ice magic damage.

This ability cannot be used in consecutive turns. It also cannot be used in the turn immediately after using [‚ñ∫Flame Breath] or [‚ñ∫Lightning].

Amethyst of Purple Lightning (Large) (8,000)

‚ñ∫Lightning/15 (22)/Fortitude/Half

Golem unleashes an electrical bolt with "Range/Area: 50m / Line", dealing 2d+13 Lightning magic damage to the target.

This ability cannot be used in consecutive turns. It also cannot be used in the turn immediately after using [‚ñ∫Flame Breath] or [‚ñ∫Blizzard Breath].

Calcite Compound Eyes (Large) (4,000) (‚óØBreath Control)

Spinel Horn (Large) (3,000) (‚ñ∫Charge)

Lapis Lazuli Weight (Large) (4,000) (üó®Tail Swing I)

‚îîQuartz Counterweight (Large) (6,000) (üó®Tail Swing II)

abilities.title: ‚ÄªWing Only
abilities.description:
Obsidian Shield (Large) (3,000) (üó®‚ñ≥Cover II)

Corundum Protection (Large) (2,000) (‚óØGuardian II)

Malachite Feather (Large) (3,000) (üó®All-Out Attack=Damage +8, Evasion -3)

abilities.title: ‚ÄªAny Section
abilities.description:
Amber Eye (Large) (10,000) (‚óØUltimate Aim = +4 Accuracy)

Garnet of Vitality (Large) (4,000) (‚óØHP Enhancement = Max HP +15)

‚îîFocused Garnet of Vitality (Large) (6,000) (‚óØImproved HP Enhancement = Max HP +15)

Shimmering Onyx (Large) (3,000) (‚óØMana Coating = Magic damage -3)

abilities.title: ‚ÄªAll Section Must be Equipped
abilities.description:
Red Iron Blood (Large) (2,000) (‚óØMobility Enhancement = Movement +5)

Yellow Flint (Large) (4,000) (‚óØFast Reaction = [Footwork])

Quartz Disruptor (Large) (5,000) (‚óØType Resistance) [[/div]]

allmonsters.description:
A monster made of toxic pollen that has solidified into a floating ball with a diameter of approximately 50cm. They are said to have almost no will of their own, and respond to attacks by external threats by scattering poison and poisoning them.

They can be found floating in windy places, and also within caves populated by other plants.

abilities.title: ‚óØPowder Body
abilities.description: The Poison Pollen is immune to critical hits from all weapon attacks.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Pollen Attack / Can't
abilities.description: The Pollen sticks itself to the target's mucous membranes, causing damage. This has "Range: Touch" and deals 1d+1 poison magic damage to "Target: 1 Character."

abilities.title: ‚óØPollen Poison / 5 (12) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description: Characters who suffer 1 or more points of damage from [‚ñ∫Pollen Attack] receive a -1 penalty to their Action Checks for 3 minutes (18 rounds). This effect can stack up to two times (for a total penalty of -2) and is of the Poison type.

allmonsters.description: A giant poisonous toad that has grown to around 1m long. These Poison Toads inhabit a variety of areas, with those in the forests and grasslands taking on a deep green hue, while those who dwell in wetlands and ruins have a color ranging from dark blue to near purple. Numerous warts that cover their body constantly ooze toxins, which can be dangerous to those who wish to prey on these toads. However, pharmacists will buy these toxins and oils for a decent price.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison / 3 (10) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description: If the Slam attack inflicts 1 or more applied damage, it inflicts 6 Poison magic damage to the target.

allmonsters.description:
This is a species similar to a bug, with a total length of more than 1 meter. It prefers moist ground, such as swamps and deep forests where there is no sunlight. It constantly secretes poisonous body fluid, which it uses to weaken approaching small animals and prey on them.

Its poisonous shell can become a dangerous weapon if carefully processed and traded at a high price by some.

abilities.title: ‚óØCorrosive Fluid Secretion
abilities.description:
If the monster is hit by a melee or ranged attack, the weapon or ammunition will be affected by the corrosive fluid. If not cleaned with at least 1 liter of alcohol within 24 hours, they will rot and become useless. Magic weapons and ammunition are not affected by this effect.

If the attack was made with a natural weapon, the attacker must suffer 1d poison magic damage for each hit.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Venom Spray/5 (12)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Sprays poison fluid at "Target: 1 area (3m Radius) / 5" with "Range: Caster." The target receives 2d poison magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚è©Curl Up
abilities.description:
It curls up its body and defends itself with its outer shell. While curled up, it gains +3 Defense points but cannot make a melee attack with its Mouth.

Stretching a curled up body is also a Minor Action. The body can only be curled up or stretched before the Major Action is executed.

allmonsters.description: A type of Wight, a corpse in a state of total decomposition. In addition to the paralytic power of its rotten claws, the poisonous gas stored within its body damages anything in its vicinity. Poisonous Wights are mindless and attack living creatures to try to increase the number of its allies. Because it has no feelings or logic, its behavior is unpredictable.

abilities.title: ‚óØRobe of Poisonous Fog/Can't
abilities.description: A Poisonous Wight constantly releases a green poison fog from its mouth and nose and covers "Target: 1 area (3m Radius) / Space" within "Range: Caster". Anyone in the area suffers 2d Poison magic damage at the start of their turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØParalyzing Poison/14 (21)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
If a Claw attack hits and deals at least 1 applied damage, the target has a - 2 penalty to Evasion checks for 30 seconds (3 rounds). This effect is not cumulative.

This effect is of a Poison type.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison Claw/14 (21)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: If the Poisonous Wight hits with a claw attack and inflicts one or more points of applied damage, the target suffers an additional 7 points of Poison type damage to its HP and MP.

abilities.title: ‚óØWight's Curse/Can't
abilities.description:
Anyone reduced to 0 HP or below by the Wight's attack is automatically cursed, without any Resistance Check.

Only after the curse is lifted can the victim recover from its unconscious state. If left attended, one Soulscar will be accumulated for every three days (72 hours) that pass. If the fifth Soulscar is acquired by this fact, the character immediately becomes a Wight.

A Success Value of 20 or more is required to remove this curse by magic or other means. The character does not lose any Soulscars accumulated by this effect when the curse is removed.

allmonsters.description:
Poltergeists are entities that form when an individual dies while holding an unnaturally strong attachment to a particular object. This object becomes the core of the Poltergeist, regardless of its nature, and allows the spirit to manipulate other objects to affect the living world.

Common Poltergeist cores (Main Section) include various pieces of jewelry, favored items of the original owner, or other innocuous mementos, such as toys and dolls. The commonality of these objects facilitates the Poltergeist's ability to hide its core among other objects it manipulates. However, only the core of the Poltergeist can cast spells or manipulate other objects, so it becomes apparent where the core is when combat begins.

abilities.title: ‚óØObject Camouflage
abilities.description:
A Poltergeist's Core is indistinguishable from the other Object sections it is using at the start of combat. At the beginning of the combat, the GM keeps secret which of the 5 sections is a Core section and which is an Object section.

However, once the Core uses any spells, or either the [‚ñ∫Command Weapon] or [‚ñ∫Rush] unique skills are used, the Core can be easily identified.

Melee attacks don't directly identify the Core, but knowledgeable characters are able to make conclusions based on the damage received.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: A Poltergeist can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Metamagic/Area], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Command Weapon/Can't
abilities.description:
At "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/Target" and "Target: 1", the Poltergeist possesses a weapon. The target is attacked with the weapon it has equipped and automatically suffers damage. The damage is "Weapon's Power + 8" points. Characteristics such as Power, Critical Threshold, type, etc., depend on the individual weapon. It is applied if the weapon has a constant effect, but special effects activated by a password, MP consumption, etc., do not occur.

This unique skill cannot command any Gun category weapon. If the controlled weapon is of the Bow or Crossbow category, the ammunition used will be one randomly chosen from those that the person holding the weapon has available in their quiver.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Rush/Can't
abilities.description:
Within "Range: Touch," all remaining Object sections simultaneously rush at a "Target: 1 Character", "dealing 2d x (Remaining Objects)" physical damage to the target.

All remaining Objects must be able to take a Major Action to use this unique skill, and using this ability counts as a Main Action for all Objects once completed.

allmonsters.description: This is a promising magical warrior. They are not yet proficient as either a warrior or a wizard, but they are capable of performing both roles at a minimum level.

abilities.title: ‚óØMagic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feat [Targeting].

abilities.title: üó®Mana Strike = +5 damage
abilities.description: May deal an additional +5 damage to their next melee attack. At risk, they take a -2 penalty to their Fortitude and Willpower checks.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may choose to change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll, by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides.

allmonsters.description: A Puck is a tree spirit that looks like a small boy dressed in green clothes and a hat. Often seen flying around, they are happy fairies who love music and will often sing or whistle along to a tune they enjoy. Pucks are often talkative to the performers and generally friendly, but they are also quite mischievous and will prank mountain climbers just as quickly.

abilities.title: ‚óØWind Body
abilities.description: Edged weapons treat Puck's Defense as 3 points higher.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Puck only receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØEarth Vulnerability
abilities.description: When the Puck is hit by Earth-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: üó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feat [Universal Metamagic].

abilities.title: ‚óØDistant Voice
abilities.description:
The range of the Puck's spells is doubled. When using [Metamagic Distance], this unique skill doubles the spell's range before the Combat Feat is applied.

In Simplified Combat, magic with "Range: 1" becomes "Range: 2".

abilities.title: ‚è©Windfall
abilities.description:
The wind carries Puck. At the beginning of its turn, it moves the Normal Move distance (up to the adjacent area in Simplified Combat and up to 33m in Standard Combat). After that, Puck can still move and use actions. This does not count as their movement for the turn, so if the Puck takes a Limited Move, they may still cast a spell on that turn.

This unique skill cannot be used in consecutive turns

allmonsters.habitat: Forests, Mountain, Cave, Grassland, Wilderness, Shallows
allmonsters.description:
These giant ants are more than 1 meter long and covered with a purple shell. Carnivorous, they nest here and there in Alframe, and their ferocity in attacking at random makes them a threat to people.

They are often seen in Shallow Abysses, and their nests can be found where Shallows were found before. Abyssal shards are also sometimes found in the nests, and their connection to Abyss is being investigated.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Formic Acid/4 (11)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: Spit acid on "Target: 1 Character" at "Range: Touch," dealing 2d-1 poison magic damage.

allmonsters.description:
It is a poison snake, always spreading poison and noxious gases. Its total length is about 10 meters, but its thick body, covered with black and purple scales, makes it quite a presence.

They intensely hate Humanoid, Barbarous, and all other creatures with intelligence, and once they encounter one, they will never relent in their attacks until they have completely defeated it.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison/12 (19)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: If the Bite hits, it deals 8 poison magic damage to the target.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Poison Spray/11 (18)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Within "Range/Area: 2 (30m) / Shot" spits poison on "Target: 1 Character", dealing 2d+9 Poison magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoisonous Fog/11 (18)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
A poisonous mist is constantly emitted from the body.

At the end of this monster's turn, all the characters in the same position (area, coordinate) as the Body section suffer 2d+6 Poison magic damage.

abilities.title: üó®Tail Sweep
abilities.description:
The monster can use its tail to attack up to 5 targets in the same skirmish. An Accuracy check is made on all characters at once, and damage is determined individually.

This attack cannot be used in consecutive rounds.

loottable.loot: Venom of the Woe Serpent (1,000G/Red S)

allmonsters.description:
This is a Barbarous with a snake head. From the neck down, it is almost the same as a Human, but the neck and head are those of a thick snake, together about 50 cm long.

Although Quepalas are known to have inherited knowledge from the Magic Civilization Period, their clan can be divided into two main groups. The first are those who prefer dark, damp places and live in tribes. In these settlements, the lower Barbarous, such as Goblins and Bolgs, often serve as slaves and guards.

The others live in Shallow Abysses, utilizing their knowledge of Magic Civilization to control daemons as their followers. They use the area as a hunting ground, leaving a few zones of seeming safety amidst the thick growth of poison grass and mushrooms, where they enjoy slowly hunting down any passing prey.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Magic (2 systems) 6 Level /Magic Power 8 (15)
abilities.description: Most of them have Truespeech and Spiritualism Magic at 6th level, but some of them might instead of one of them have Summoning Arts at 6th level.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison/7 (14)/Fortitude/Neg
abilities.description: If their Bite attack hits, the target is dealt additional 6 Poison magic damage.

allmonsters.description: This is a highest-ranking Quepala. Although they are regarded as quite powerful among the Barbarous, they do not take their place as generals in the Barbarous army, preferring to hide in the dark and plotting. There are some Quepala Chiefs who prefer to dwell in Shallow Abyss.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control] [Metamagic/Targets], [Rune Master], and[Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison/15 (22)/Fortitude/Neg
abilities.description: If the Bite attack hits, the target is dealt additional 12 Poison magic damage.

allmonsters.description: This is a Quepala who is particularly knowledgeable and excels in magical knowledge. They are sometimes the leaders of settlements in the larger Shallow Abysses. They are gruesome and brutal and have a strong hatred for Humanoids and the beings who are in their service.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison/10 (17)/Fortitude/Neg
abilities.description: If their Bite attack hits, the target is dealt additional 8 poison magic damage.

allmonsters.description:
A humanoid-like Daemon with a lanky body shape. The front of the body has numerous razor-like openings, and numerous tentacles sprout from the back. Glistening organs similar to a mako stone peek out from the apertures in the body and from the tips of the tentacles.

These organs have the ability to absorb and distribute the MP received to others, and this daemon is also called the "Supply Soldier of Daemon World".

abilities.title: ‚óØMagic Damage Halved
abilities.description:
If this monster is subjected to magic damage, the total damage is first halved; if it is halved by resistance, it becomes 0.

This unique skill does not affect anything except damage - Effects will still happen based on the result of the resistance check.

abilities.title: ‚óØMP Absorption
abilities.description:
If the Quezardus becomes a target of a spell, it restores its own MP for the magic's base MP cost.

This effect appears only when the Quezardus is targeted by a spell cast at it and does not affect similar but non-magical abilities or effects performed from items. Even if the MP cost of the caster who cast the spell is increased or decreased by various abilities or effects, the MP recovered by this monster is calculated based on the base MP cost. Also, whether the spell is friendly or hostile and whether or not the resistance to the magic was made should not be taken into account.

abilities.title: ‚è©MP Transfer/Optional
abilities.description: The Quezardus transfers any amount of its MP to "Target: 1 Character" within "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Shot." The number of MP that can be transferred is an arbitrary number from 1 to its current MP. The Quezardus receives fixed damage to its MP and the target's MP is restored by the amount of the MP.

allmonsters.description: This is a daemon that appears as an upright dragon with enormous membranous wings. When a Ragnakang fully extends its neck, it stands around 5m long and will use that long neck and tail in combat. Thoroughly infused with poison, a Ragnakang is dangerous to touch, let alone engage in combat. Some still stand guard at the entrances to old ruins, and such places have seen no intrusions because of the Ragnakang's diligence.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Techniques
abilities.description: They may use the [Cat's Eyes], [Beetleskin], [Bear Muscle], and [Strong Blood] Techniques.

abilities.title: ‚óØDeadly Poison /11 (18)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description: If a Bite attack hits and deals 1 or more points of applied damage, the target receives extra 2d+8 Poison magic damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØConvulsive Poison/10 (17)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
If the Tail attack hits, the target receives a -1 penalty to any Skill Checks for 1 minute (6 rounds). This effect is cumulative.

This effect is Poison type.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description:
Against melee attacks, the Head section receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks.

This effect disappears when the Body section falls to 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description:
All section receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

If one of the Wing sections falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

allmonsters.description:
This is a large self-propelled Magitech created in the Magitech Civilization Period for use as a base of invasion or defense. It is designed to move on rough roads with its legs, and on tracks with wheels used by trains for long-distance travel.

It is about the same size as a train car, but there is a record that several of them were linked and used in large-scale battles.

abilities.title: ‚óØMechanical Body
abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: ‚óØTargeting
abilities.description: Stray shots cannot occur.

abilities.title: ‚óØGun
abilities.description: The Cannon is treated as a Gun weapon with a "Range: 2 (50m)" and a maximum magazine of 1.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Reload
abilities.description: Reloads bullet into the cannon.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Bursting Shell
abilities.description:
The loaded bullet is changed to attack with "Target: 1 area(4m Radius) / 10". Damage and range distance remains the same.

This unique skill can only be used when the bullet is loaded and consumes 10 points of the section's HP.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Wheel Drive
abilities.description:
This unique skill can only be used when this monster is on track. Also, it cannot be used when the HP of any Base section is less than 0.

The built-in wheels are lowered onto the tracks. The Railway Cannon can move on the tracks at a speed of "90 (wheels)".

It cannot use [‚ñ∫Trampling Down] on your turn to use this unique skill.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Trampling Down/13 (20)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Railway Cannon stomps around the area. It deals 2d+10 earth physical damage to "Target: 1 area (3m Radius)/All" with "Range: Caster."

After this effect is used by one of the Base sections, it cannot be used by the Base section in the same round.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Loading Aid
abilities.description: Selects one of the Trail Gun sections and reload the bullet into that cannon.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle =+4 ‚Ä¢+4
abilities.description:
Its size hinders attacks.

All Trail Guns gain a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee and ranged attacks.

If the HP of any Base section falls below 0 or below, this effect is lost.

loottable.loot: Trove of Magical Components (7,600G/Black White S)

allmonsters.description:
The Korgana region is home to a huge bear that measures over 3 meters in length. Its body fur is almost blackish gray, and the area around its head and shoulders is discolored reddish black from the fresh blood of its prey.

These bears are extremely ferocious and belligerent. They will attack any creature that unknowingly enters their territory as prey.

There have been numerous reports of Humanoid and Barbarous beings killed, and surrounding villagers warn travelers and merchants to flee as fast as possible if they find traces of these bears.

abilities.title: ‚óØAll-Out Attack
abilities.description: A Head can deal an additional 8 damage on its next attack. However, any Evasion check made by this section this turn receives a -3 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚è©Cowering Eyes/12 (19)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
Stares at one character in close proximity, filling them with fear.

One character in the same skirmish area receives a -2 penalty to Accuracy and Evasion checks for 10 seconds (1 round), and the physical and magical damage it inflicts is reduced by 4 points.

This effect is Psychic type. This effect can only be used once per 10 seconds (1 round).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Double Attack
abilities.description: Can attack twice with the Paws of both hands.

abilities.title: ‚óØBear Hug
abilities.description:
If the Red Helm successfully hits with [‚óØDouble Attack], it will hold the target, and the target will not be able to move or make a melee or ranged attack. Each round, the held target is hit automatically by the Red Helm, dealing 2d + 24 damage.

When the target tries to escape, use the de-bonding rules.

While entangled by this unique skill, the Red Helm cannot attack other characters. If the monster itself wants to release the target, it can do so with a Minor Action.

abilities.title: ‚è©Intimidating Posture
abilities.description:
Stands up and spread their arms wide to intimidate the target.

For 10 seconds (1 round), the Head section gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy checks for melee attacks and +2 damage. At the same time, the Body section takes a -2 penalty to its Evasion checks.

This effect can only be used once in 10 seconds (1 round).

allmonsters.description: This is an improved version of Dorn with slightly improved performance. It is recorded that a small number of this model was produced as a research magitech as a basis for the development of other higher models of Dorns.

abilities.title: ‚óØMechanical Body
abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description:
These small robots were simple security devices designed for use during the Magitech Civilization period. Sporting four short legs with wheels coming off a flat body, these robots will first attempt to drive away intruders using a simple warning in the Magitech language but will resort to electric shocks (Defense still applies) if this warning is not heeded.

Renguards, while small, often appear in large numbers and will often link to each other in order to increase the power of their electric shocks and drive away more formidable intruders.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Linking
abilities.description:
The Renguard connects to a fellow Renguard within "Range: Touch" and increases its attack power. The targeted Renguard receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy checks and +3 bonus to damage. Up to 5 Renguards can be Linked together (4 Renguards to another) this way, for a 7 (14) Accuracy, dealing 2d+10 damage.

After the boosted Renguard attacks, all Links are disconnected.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

loottable.loot: Old Recording Device (100G / Black White A)

allmonsters.description:
This undead is the result of hatred and refusal to die. At the moment of its demise, the inability to accept its own death resonates with the surrounding mana, transforming it into a pseudo-monster.

Unlike ordinary Ghosts, it has no clear purpose and is filled only with resentment toward the cause of, and denial of, its own death. Since it loses its power when it leaves the place where it died, it does not travel but continues to spread its hatred and spill its "truth" on the spot, which is said to transform the mana around it and create a hatred-filled space.

As with the Ghost, the power of the Restirigist depends on the power of the person in the previous life (the values here are for regular Restirigist), but its intellect is reduced, so it cannot cast spells.

They might vanish if you make them aware of their death, but you can always just destroy them instead.

abilities.title: ‚è©Binding Chains of Hatred / 10 (17) / Willpower / Negates
abilities.description:
Within "Range/Area: 2 (50m) / Target," curses "Target: 1 Area (5m radius / All)". The targets receive a -1 penalty to all Action Checks. The area (Simplified Combat) and center coordinate (Standard and Advanced Combat) of this effect can only be targeted from the exact location where the monster itself died.

This ability has the Curse type and can only be used once per round.

abilities.title: ‚óØBinding Grudge
abilities.description: If the monster moves more than one area (Simplified Combat) or 5m (Standard and Advanced Combat) from the point where this Undead previously died, it will receive a -2 penalty to all action checks

allmonsters.description:
A Revenant is an undead being created by the death of an impure soul. Constant resurrections scar one's soul and certain spirits can rise on their own with enough soulscars. Humanoids, Barbarous, animals, and mythical beasts can be Revenants.

A Revenant has an intense hatred of the living and will kill without discrimination. If a Revenant is reduced to 0 HP or lower, it is utterly destroyed and cannot be revived.

abilities.title: ‚óØPast Life
abilities.description:
This monster's strength depends on its strength before it is reborn as a Revenant. In the various numerical fields, apply the numerical value of the monster before it was reborn to the places marked with "‚Äª".

The level of this monster is equal to "Previous Level + 1". Revenant also inherits combat feats and unique skills. However, it cannot cast spells.

abilities.title: ‚óØRegeneration = 3 points
abilities.description: At the end of each round, a Revenant recovers 3 HP. This has no effect if the Revenant is at 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

allmonsters.description:
It is a Daemon with a huge bow; its entire body is covered with numerous hard thorns. This Daemon pulls out these spines by itself and uses them as arrows.

Unusually for Daemons, it prefers a fair fight. It prefers to avoid making a surprise attack and always start a fight when they can see each other. However, they have no hesitation in opening battle with an opponent who has only melee weapons, calling out from a distance of 50 meters, saying, "Come on, let's play it fair" (the argument being that it is worse to have no means of a long-range attack and may wait for them searching a bow).

abilities.title: ‚óØTargeting & Hawk Eye
abilities.description:
It is possible to select a character in a melee area as a target for the "Area: Line" effect without causing misfiring.

It also can aim through a skirmish to attack enemies beyond.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Bow
abilities.description: Makes a Shooting Attack with a Bow at "Range: 2 (50m)". Accuracy check and damage are the same as in the normal attack.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Heavy Bow/17 (24)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
Rigogan draws its bow and fires with terrible force. Shooting attack with "Range/Area: 2 (50m) / Line", those failing Evasion checks suffer 2d+20 physical damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Rapid Fire Bow/17 (24)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description: Makes Shooting Attack with "Range: 2 (20m)" on any 5 targets, dealing 2d+13 physical damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØFinal Arrow/19 (26)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
If this monster's HP is 0 or less, its body thorns will scatter in an explosion. Within "Range: Caster" and "Target: All areas (30m radius) / All" targets are hit by 2d+20 points of physical damage.

This ability can be activated only once, after which the monster dies automatically.

allmonsters.description:
This is a mythical beast looking like a reindeer, with many nut-like bells with altered horns attached to various parts of the big horns. By shaking its head, the bells on the horns ring, creating spellsongs.

Cautious, they seldom appear in front of anyone except those they trust. When an intruder comes to their territory, they try to drive them away with spellsongs.

When acquired as loot, their bells may be used as materials for musical instruments, sacred treasures, ritual implements, etc.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Special Spellsong /9 (16)/All areas (50m Radius)
abilities.description: Uses the Spellsongs [Nostalgia] and [Lullaby]. Once this unique skill is used, it cannot be used for the next 30 seconds (3 rounds). After using either Spellsong, 30 seconds (3 rounds) must elapse before the subsequent use of either special Spellsong.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫[Finale: Breath of the Meadows]/9 (16)
abilities.description:
Within "Range: 2 (60m)," up to 3 characters heal their HP by 2d+7 points. This effect does not work on Undead, Constructs, and Magitech characters.

This unique skill cannot be used in consecutive turns. Also, once a character has been affected, it cannot be affected for the following hour.

loottable.loot: Light Sounding Bell (200G/Gold Red Black A) x 1d
Clear Sounding Bell (2,680G/Gold Red Black S)

allmonsters.sections: 7 (Head / Body x 2 / Wing x 2 / Leg x 2)
allmonsters.description: A monstrous bird whose wingspan reaches 30m, the Roc is a wondrous sight to see. They live in the higher altitudes of most mountain ranges, though their massive form and vivid coloring can be seen from quite far away. With their massive talons, they can grab even mature cows and fly away with them, let alone a full-grown humanoid.

abilities.title: ‚óØContinuous Attack
abilities.description: If a Roc successfully hits a target in melee, it may make a second attack against the same target.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ Impossible
abilities.description:
The huge Roc's Body hinders attacks.

The Head of the Roc cannot be attacked with melee and ranged attacks. This unique skill is lost when the Body section has 0 or less HP.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Windstorm/18 (25)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
The Roc flaps its wings, creating high winds dealing 2d+12 physical damage within "Range: Caster" to "Target: All Areas (30m Radius) / All".

To use this ability, both Wing sections must be ready for Major Action. Also, when this ability is used, the Major Action of both Wing sections is completed.

This unique skill cannot be used in consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight II
abilities.description:
All sections receive a +2 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

This unique skill is lost if the Wing sections are reduced to 0 or less HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØClutch
abilities.description:
If the Talon attack hits, the target is grabbed; the target can no longer move and can only perform melee attacks against the Leg that is grabbing it.

Roc cannot attack the target Leg has grabbed except with the section it has grabbed ([‚ñ∫Windstorm] also cannot hit the target). However, the Talons of Leg section will automatically hit.

When the target tries to escape, use the de-bonding rules. If the monster itself wants to release the target, it can do so with a Minor Action.

allmonsters.description: Rock Golems are humanoid constructs built entirely out of rocks of various sizes which stand menacingly at around 3m tall.

abilities.title: ‚óØRock Body
abilities.description:
The Rock Golem is immune to criticals from edged weapons and all non-Energy-type Magic damage.

[[div class="golemitems"]]

abilities.title: ‚ÄªAny Section
abilities.description:
Obsidian Shield (Medium) (600) (üó®‚ñ≥Cover II)

Corundum Protection (Medium) (400) (‚óØGuardian I)

Jet Sign (Medium) (400) (üó®Aimed Attack = +2 Accuracy and -4 damage)

Sunstone Brilliance (Medium) (1,200) (‚ñ∫Brand=Next attack cannot be evaded, damage +5)

Amber Eye (Medium) (2,000) (‚óØUltimate Aim = +4 Accuracy)

Garnet of Vitality (Medium) (800) (‚óØHP Enhancement = Max HP +10)

‚îîFocused Garnet of Vitality (Medium) (1,200) (‚óØImproved HP Enhancement = Max HP +10)

Shimmering Onyx (Medium) (600) (‚óØMana Coating = Magic damage -3)

abilities.title: ‚ÄªAll Section Must be Equipped
abilities.description:
Coral Branch (Medium) (400) (‚óØBlock)

Red Iron Blood (Medium) (400) (‚óØMobility Enhancement = Movement +5)

Moonstone of Serenity (Medium) (1,000) (Golem loses its Weak Point (it becomes "None"))

Quartz Disruptor (Medium) (1,000) (‚óØType Resistance) [[/div]]

allmonsters.description: These are mythical beasts whose entire bodies have decayed and become undead. The majority are quadrupeds, but some of them fly in the sky or move underwater.

abilities.title: ‚óØDouble Bite
abilities.description: When dealing damage with a Bite attack, the damage is rolled twice and added during damage calculation.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Miasma Breath/13 (20)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Rotten Beast spits miasma with "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/ Shot" to "Target: 1 area (4m Radius) / 10", dealing 2d+14 Disease magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

loottable.loot: Skull of a Defiled Mythical Beast (1,500G/Red S)

allmonsters.sections: 4 (Head / Right Arm / Left Arm / Legs) Main
allmonsters.description:
This is a Humanoid Undead whose whole body is rotting. It has large bumps at the joints of their bodies, and their entire bodies are bloated with them.

They appear mainly in ruins and caves. It is not difficult to locate its territory because it rots surrounding plants just by passing through them, and its remains are covered with decaying flesh spilled from its body.

abilities.title: ‚óØNormal Weapon Immunity, ‚óØPoison Immunity, ‚óØDisease Immunity, ‚óØPsychic Type (Weak) Immunity
‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Spitting Rot/12 (19)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: Spits out a large amount of rotten fluid from its mouth at "Target: 1 area (3m Radius) / 5" with "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Shot", dealing 2d+10 Disease magic damage.

abilities.title: üó®Cleave II
abilities.description: It attacks with a weapon up to 5 characters within the skirmish in which it resides.

Attack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ +4

This monster's sheer size hinders attack.

The Head cannot be attacked in melee. Against any ranged attacks, Head receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks.

When the Legs fall to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

allmonsters.description:
These Barbarous are towering beasts cloaked in black hide, standing at an imposing 2.5 meters tall. Their fists are rock-hard, mutated into weapons of deadly force. Every inch of their bodies is encased in black, resilient skin, impervious to most impacts.

These creatures are uncivilized and meritocratic, preferring to settle disputes through duels.

abilities.title: ‚óØElastic Skin
abilities.description: Against blunt weapons, its Defense is treated as 3 points higher.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Quick Spinning Fist/9 (16)/Evasion/Neg
abilities.description:
It attacks by spinning both arms and swinging them widely. Up to 5 targets of Rumblefist choice will be hit with a melee attack that deals 2d+8 points of physical damage and causes them to fall prone.

A character whose Evasion check for this ability is only 1 or 2 short of this ability's Success Value does not take any damage but only falls prone.

This ability cannot be used in consecutive turns.

allmonsters.description: These are Humanoid robbers who drive a horse-drawn cart. They often attack peddlers and other travelers along the roads.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may choose to change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll, by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides.

abilities.title: ‚óØDownswing
abilities.description:
The Rider section deals an extra +2 Damage.

When the Horse section falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill is lost.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison Immunity, Disease Immunity, Psychic Immunity, Curse Immunity
‚óØMounted = 4 Characters
abilities.description: The cart can carry up to four characters. (See CR III, p. 91).

allmonsters.description: With a wingspan of about 50cm, this bird resembles a woodpecker. It is known for its carnivorous nature, pecking at anything and everything it sees as food.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Rushpecker receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Triple Attack
abilities.description: Thrusts its beak forward at high speed, attacking one character three times.

allmonsters.description:
This is a variant of the Sandworm which appears in the Ward of Magic Giant in the Burlight Region. Its entire body is covered with red mucus, which is an aggregation of microorganisms that corrode iron, stone, and wood. The Rust Worm sustains itself by ingesting the metabolites of these microorganisms. As a result, its own digestive organs deteriorate, and its mouth remains closed and unable to open.

The unique "Red Sandworm Gem" which can be obtained as loot can be traded as a raw material for Honey Red Jam.

abilities.title: ‚óØCorrosive Mucus
abilities.description: Weapons that attacked this monster and armor attacked by this monster will be corroded and lost after 24 hours; cleaning them with wine or other alcohol within 24 hours will prevent this effect.

abilities.title: ‚óØHeat Madness
abilities.description: When the monster receives a Fire- or Energy-type effect or damage (even if the applied damage is 0), it becomes ferocious. The monster's damage is increased by +4 for 1 minute (6 rounds). This effect is not cumulative.

abilities.title: ‚óØDelicate Loot
abilities.description: When [‚óØHeat Madness] occurs, the loot determination roll for this monster is modified by +1. This effect is not cumulative, even if it occurs more than once.

allmonsters.description: This is a bird-shaped golem with a golden-red stone body.

abilities.title: ‚óØGolden Red Stone Body
abilities.description: The Rutile Raptor is immune to criticals from edged weapons and all non-Energy-type Magic damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight II
abilities.description:
All sections receive a +2 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

This ability is lost if the HP of Body section falls to 0 or below.

abilities.title: ‚ÄªHead Only
abilities.description:

‚ñ∫Flame Breath/12 (19)/Fortitude/Half

Golem spits out the fire with "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/ Shot" and "Target: 1 area (5m Radius)/10," dealing 2d+10 fire magic damage. This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns. It also cannot be used on the turn immediately after using [‚ñ∫Lightning].

Amethyst of Purple Lightning (Large) (8,000)

‚ñ∫Lightning/12 (19)/Fortitude/Half

Golem unleashes an electrical bolt with "Range/Area: 50m/Line", dealing 2d+10 lightning magic damage to the target. This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns. It also cannot be used on the turn immediately after using [‚ñ∫Flame Breath].

allmonsters.description: A Saber-equipped Hoodling excels at hunting in groups, using intimidation to drive the enemy toward its companions. When they appear with higher-level Youma such as Bolgs and Hugls, their attacks become even more threatening.

abilities.title: üó®Decoy Attack I
abilities.description:
The Saber Hoodling gains -2 to Accuracy checks, but the damage is increased by +2 on hit.

If the declared attack is evaded, the enemy receives a -1 penalty to Evasion checks for the next 10 seconds (1 round). This effect is cumulative up to -4 but is lost if the target fails an Evasion check even once.

allmonsters.description: Similar in appearance to a regular tiger, the Sabertooth Tiger has two enormous, very sharp canine teeth that give it its name. These fangs are strong enough to easily penetrate metal armor.

abilities.title: ‚óØDouble Bite
abilities.description: When dealing damage with a Bite attack, the damage is rolled twice and added during damage calculation.

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +6 points.

allmonsters.description: The Sabinga are flying Youma, whose existence is confirmed in Genguntekul, "The Featherlord's Stone," in the Constellation City of Cyrecode. Similar to Goblins in appearance, they possess large, fin-like wings on their lower limbs, which they spread wide to fly. They move slowly while in flight, but by rapidly opening and closing their wings, they can maneuver in a somersault-like motion.

abilities.title: üó®Somersault Attack
abilities.description:
Flips and flutters back and forth in front of the target, attacking at an irregular trajectory.

Declaring this before a melee attack grants the Sabinga a +1 bonus to its Accuracy Check, but incurs a -1 penalty to its Evasion Check.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

allmonsters.description: Sahagin resemble fish with arms and legs. They are treated as slaves among the Gilman tribes and are often used for labor and as soldiers. Sahagin are very self-conscious and timid, and will not fight unless ordered to by a superior. They primarily live in water but sometimes attack small boats or children playing on the shore.

Salamanders are 2m long lizard-like fairies drawn to flames and fire and tend to live in areas with higher temperatures than usual. Because of this tendency, they're driven to burn everything around them, and there's often charcoal strewn about their lairs. However, despite being drawn to fire, Salamanders aren't aggressive, though they are still dangerous when not threatened.

abilities.title: ‚óØWater/Ice Vulnerability
abilities.description: When the Salamander is hit by Water/Ice-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: üó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feat [Universal Metamagic].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Flame Breath/8 (15)/Fortitude /Half
abilities.description: With "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/ Shot", spits fire at "Target: 1 Character", dealing 2d+9 Fire magic damage

allmonsters.description:
This is a white, lower Daemon, about 3m long, in the shape of a white bug, with four beautiful bird feathers. Its white body surface, including its wings, is not covered with feathers but rather hard rocks.

Its body emits an intense odor that pierces the nose.

It is said that it is arrogant and always looks down on others, especially those who give it orders, and that it will always rebel.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], and [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚è©Strange Smell/13 (20)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
All the body's holes within "Range: Caster" emit a foul odor. All characters in the same position (area, coordinate) as the Body section receive a -2 penalty to Willpower for 3 minutes (18 rounds).

This ability can be used only once per round, and when used, it consumes 5 MP of the Body section and can be used only once per round.

This effect is Disease type.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description:
All sections receive a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

If the Wings section falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

abilities.title: üó®All-Out Attack
abilities.description: Wings can deal an additional 8 damage on its next attack. However, any Evasion check made by this section this turn receives a -3 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚è©High Mobility
abilities.description:
The skin covering the wings peels off, exposing the flesh and increasing mobility. For 3 minutes (18 rounds), the bonus to Accuracy checks and Evasion checks from [‚óØFlight] for all sections is increased to +2.

On the other hand, the Defense of Wings section is reduced by -4.

This effect can be used only when the Wings section's HP is 40 or less, and once it is used, it cannot be canceled by the monster's will.

allmonsters.description:
A giant snake-like creature that lives in the sand, which may have up to one-fifth of its body covered in a hard exoskeleton. Older Sandworms often have gems in their hide, formed from sand and pressure. The green gems carry a high price in markets, while the clear gems have value when crushed into an abrasive polishing powder.

Some Bolgs have reportedly tamed Sandworms and use them in battle.

abilities.description: None.

loottable.loot: Green Sandworm Gem (200G/Gold Red A) x 1d

allmonsters.description: This is a fish-shaped golem made of light, perforated rock.

abilities.title: ‚óØStone Body
abilities.description: A Scale Flipper is immune to criticals from edged weapons and all magic damage, except for Energy-type damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnderwater
abilities.description:
Scale Flipper doesn't receive penalties for moving or taking action in the water. However, it can't perform any Action without water.

[[div class="golemitems"]]

abilities.title: ‚ÄªHead Only
abilities.description:
Spinel Horn (Medium) (600) (‚ñ∫Charge)

Blue Lotus Jade (Medium) (1,600)

‚ñ∫Blizzard Breath/9 (16)/Fortitude/Half

Golem sprays a jet of water with "Range/Area: 20m/ Shot" in a "Target: 3m Radius/5", dealing 2d+7 water/ice magic damage. This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

Calcite Compound Eyes (Medium) (800) (‚óØBreath Control)

abilities.description:
