abilities.title: ‚ÄªAll Section Must be Equipped
abilities.description: Anisotropic Anorthite (Medium) (600) (Ground movement 10 (crawling), [‚óØUnderwater Specialization]) [[/div]]

allmonsters.description:
This Construct was created in the Magic Civilization Period and has a caterpillar-like body with a sucker-like mouth. It was mainly used for guarding and eliminating intruders. It moves with its body wriggling and jumping and attacks hostile objects by sucking on them with its sucker pads and sucking up their bodily fluids. The name is derived from the bruises left on the target after the suckers were attached.

It also has the power to suck up mana and cancel all weak magic and effects, and as a byproduct of this effect, it may have crystals with mana stored in its body. They can be used in exactly the same way as the mako stone.

abilities.title: ‚óØDangerous Absorption/Can't
abilities.description: If an attack with the Suction Pad hits the target, it is sucked into the target. In the sucking state, the monster can use one of the unique skills [‚è©Suck Blood] or [‚è©Minor Break]. If the turn ends without using any of the unique skills, the monster automatically releases the target.

abilities.title: ‚è©Suck Blood/Can't
abilities.description:
It deals 2d magic damage to the target and heals its own HP by the same amount as the applied damage.

This unique skill can only be used on targets that were sucked with [‚óØDangerous Absorption] and once used targets are released.

abilities.title: ‚è©Minor Break/Can't
abilities.description:
Removes any effect from the target with a success value of 0.

This unique skill can only be used on targets sucked with [‚óØDangerous Absorption], and targets are released once used.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: This is the result of the downfall of an adventurer who died and was successfully resuscitated. They have a strong sense of inferiority due to the "scar" they carry on their body and in their soul, and hold an unreasonable grudge against novice adventurers and ordinary people.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may choose to change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll, by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Double Attack
abilities.description: It can attack the same target twice in one action with its Fists.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Throw Attack/6 (13)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description: Throws 1 character as a melee attack. Target takes 2d+2 physical damage and falls prone.

allmonsters.description: This Magitech looks like a humanoid torso on a pedestal. The silhouette is similar to that of Androscorpion, but the legs are wheels. It has been regarded as a Magitech that was made by Barbarous, who stole the technology of Humanoid's Magitech.

abilities.title: ‚óØMechanical Body
abilities.description: It is immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike I
abilities.description: It can deal an additional 4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +5 points.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Stir Up/8 (15)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
The wheels are violently rÎØ≠ against the ground, and dust is blown up. Within "Range: Caster," this gives "Target: 1 area (Radius 6m) / All" a -2 penalty on Accuracy check or Evasion check for 10 seconds (1 round).

Which of the penalties is applied is randomly determined for each target and each time the effect is applied. Different penalties are cumulative.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØStanding Upright
abilities.description: If the HP of the Wheels is 0 or less, Body section gets a -2 penalty on Evasion checks.

allmonsters.description: A giant ocean snake, a Sea Serpent can measure up to 20m long, causing sailors to believe they had encountered an aquatic dragon. Under normal circumstances, they are solitary monsters, content to eat fish but will attack boats when desperately hungry. There are subspecies of Sea Serpents that can live in freshwater, and some cities have even enshrined a Sea Serpent as the embodiment of a water god.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnderwater Specialization
abilities.description: Can move in water without penalties and restrictions. Conversely, all Skill Checks are subject to a -2 penalty on the ground.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fire Breath/9 (16)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: Spits out a fireball with "Range: Caster" and deals 2d+5 fire magic damage to "Target: 1 area (4m Radius) / 10".

abilities.title: ‚óØEntanglement II
abilities.description:
A successful hit from a Sea Serpent attack entangles the target. Each round, the entangled target is dealt 2d+8 physical damage and makes all Accuracy and Evasion Checks with a -2 penalty.

The monster can use [‚óØEntanglement II] to entangle multiple characters with multiple hits and can attack other characters while entangling.

When one of the targets tries to escape, use the de-bonding rules.

abilities.title: ‚óØLong Body
abilities.description:
The Head section can make a Bite attack with "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Target".

When the Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description: The Sea Serpent's height prevents enemies from attacking it. The Head receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks. When the Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

loottable.loot: Shining Parasitic Shellfish Shell (1,000G/Gold Red S)

allmonsters.description:
This Daemon takes the form of a muscular human about 2 meters in height, with two pairs of arms. Countless sharp gem fragments protrude from its body.

It can produce jeweled spears from its own body and use them as weapons. However, approaching the spear will result in injury from the sharp gems protruding from its body.

These Daemons may appear as soldiers of higher-ranking Daemons.

abilities.title: ‚óØGem-Smashing
abilities.description:
Gems throughout the body shatter with each wound, injuring the opponent.

When the character hits with a melee attack or a "Range: Touch" effect, this monster suffers 1d+2 fixed damage each time for each hit.

abilities.title: ‚óØMulti-arm Stance
abilities.description:
The monster can have up to four Jeweled Spears, one for each arm.

When two or more spears are held, the Selassaroui can perform a combination of Melee Attack and [‚ñ∫Jeweled Spear Throw] up to two times in total. In this case, it can choose the second attack method and target after seeing the result of the first roll.

This monster already has 4 spears at the start of combat. If it loses one due to [‚ñ∫Jeweled Spear Throw], it can create a new one with [‚è©Create Jeweled Spear]. With only one spear, it can only make one melee attack or [‚ñ∫Jeweled Spear Throw].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Jeweled Spear Throw/13 (20)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
The Selassaroui attacks by throwing a spear in its hand.

Throw has "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/ Shot" at "Target: 1 Character" and deals 2d+13 physical damage.

A Jeweled Spear will be shattered and lost regardless of the result of the attack.

abilities.title: ‚è©Create a Jeweled Spear
abilities.description: Creates a Jeweled Spear in hand. This effect can be used only once per round and costs 8 MP.

allmonsters.description:
This Daemon is a stubby, reddish-black, irregularly shaped creature with a number of small arms and legs.

Instead of using its legs or feet as it should, it moves by crawling. It does not speak any language but seems to have enough intellect to understand what others say.

abilities.title: ‚óØAmorphous Body
abilities.description: Immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚óØDaemonic Droplets
abilities.description: An attack with Droplets is treated as a Shooting Attack with "Range: 20m". If the target is hit, the Defense is treated as half (rounded up).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Red Droplets/11 (18)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
Droplets begin to fly around the Shabalay.

All targets in the same skirmish area as the monster are dealt 2d+8 Poison magic damage. Using this effect consumes 10 points of MP.

allmonsters.description: Dark fairies standing around 30cm tall, Shades are cloaked entirely in darkness. However, if one could see through and see the actual appearance of a Shade, they appear to be tall, almost gaunt fairies wearing well-made clothing created entirely out of temporary darkness. Shades rarely occur in areas with a high population, preferring more rural areas.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Shade only receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion for melee attacks.

abilities.title: üó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feat [Universal Metamagic].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Dark Mind/8 (15)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
The Shade attempts to wrap the minds within "Range: Caster" and "Target: All Areas (30 Radius)" in shadow, preventing them from taking any deliberate action. Those who fail to resist cannot move or perform Minor or Major Actions for 30 seconds (3 rounds).

This effect is treated as a Psychic type

allmonsters.description: This Construct is black and about 1.5 meters long. Its upper body is Humanoid, and it has several long, thin, cloth-like legs. It waits in the shadow of its master when not in use, and only performs chores when called. In the present day, it wanders around the ruins as it cannot find its master's shadow.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttitude Control
abilities.description: It can never fall prone due to any effect.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike I
abilities.description: They can deal an additional 4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚óØRegrow Legs
abilities.description:
If the Legs section HP is 0 or less, it is restored to its maximum value. The recovered Legs section can perform an action immediately.

This ability can be used only once per combat.

abilities.title: ‚óØOutstretched Legs
abilities.description: Kick attacks are treated as melee attacks with "Range: 1 (10m)".

allmonsters.description: Sharks live in clear water and have a strong sense of smell for blood. They quickly hunt down prey once they smell blood, making it difficult to escape.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnderwater
abilities.description: A Shark doesn't receive penalties for moving or taking action in water. However, it can't perform any Action without water.

allmonsters.description:
This monkey species is small, measuring about 70 cm in length. It has long, thin claws on both hands, which it uses to pounce on and attack its prey.

These monkeys are brutal and vigilant, and they can be tricky, challenging, and distracting as they rip through their prey.

abilities.title: ‚óØJust Scratches
abilities.description: If the roll of the damage decision is 5 or less, the Sharp Nails gets a +1 bonus to Evasion checks for the following 10 seconds (1 round).

allmonsters.description:
This Hoodling Youma holds a shield large enough to conceal itself. Although they can attack by slamming with their large shield, their main role is to cover their Barbarous superiors when they are exposed to attack.

This shield is a sign of strength and self-discipline, but often makes them overconfident.

abilities.title: üó®‚ñ≥Cover I
abilities.description: This effect is the same as the combat feat [Cover I] (see CR I, p. 255).

allmonsters.description:
This is a lower Daemon with a semi-transparent, reptilian-like appearance. It is about 4m long and attacks its opponent with a long bright red tongue.

Because of their ecology, they are very rare to find, and those that are found are almost without exception preyed upon.

abilities.title: ‚óØSemi-Transparent Body
abilities.description:
The whole body is semi-transparent.

This monster does not create any shielding, even if it is on the battlefield. Also, it is invisible to characters in a different area (Simplified Combat) or at a distance of more than 10 meters (Standard Combat).

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], and [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +5 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ +4
abilities.description:
The giant body hinders attacks.

The Head section gains a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee and ranged attacks.

This effect disappears when either Rider or Left Side section falls to 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: üó®Tail Sweep
abilities.description:
The monster can use its tail to attack up to 3 targets in the same skirmish. Accuracy check should be made once; if multiple characters are hit, damage should be determined individually.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Curse of Translucency/9 (16)/Willpower/ Neg
abilities.description: Within "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/ Shot", the monster shoots an invisible wave from the tip of the Tail at "Target: 1 Character". The target gains the [‚óØSemi-Transparent Body] unique skill. This effect is permanent of a Curse type.

allmonsters.description:
Silky is a wind fairy, approximately 50cm in length, who takes the form of a beautiful human female wearing a light robe. She enjoys creating chilly winds, organizing books and documents, and playfully disrupting the order she creates. Silky particularly delights in teasing those who are in search of knowledge.

You may encounter Silky in the storerooms of ancient ruins, the laboratories of the city, or the warehouses of the king's castle.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Silky receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnexpected Clues
abilities.description: While organizing and scattering books and documents, the chance to get clues by chance is increased. If a character attempts a Search check, Track check, or Literature check within a 10m radius of Silky, they get a +1 bonus to those checks

allmonsters.description:
A monster that mimics a tiny traveler's hut, room, or other such building, the Sinker House is deceptively dangerous. Fitting in an area usually around 5m in height, width, and depth, the Sinker House can be attacked through the floor or walls. The house can create a sizeable conical drill to attack the inhabitants, changing the floor to make it more dangerous for the inhabitants all the while.

While the Sinker House is often seen as a small hut, it can appear as any indoor and outdoor room to trap victims inside. However, these rooms do seem to be slightly distorted, and this distortion can give away the Sinker House's mimicry.

Additionally, Gargoyles and other flying creatures find the interior quite welcoming, making it all the more dangerous for unaware adventurers.

abilities.title: ‚óØMimicry/18/Danger Sense/Negates
abilities.description:
It can mimic rooms. While mimicking, characters cannot perform a Monster Knowledge check on this monster. If a character approaches it unintentionally, they need to make a Danger check with target number 18, and if it fails, they will be surprised (see CR I, p. 144). Mimicry will be automatically ended once the monster starts to act.

This monster can be detected with [Sense Magic].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Triple Attack
abilities.description: Sinker House can attack the same target with three attacks.

abilities.title: ‚è©Room Rotation
abilities.description:
Sinker House can flip itself 180 degrees, swapping the floor and ceiling. All non-flying characters will fall 5m (taking fall damage) and fall prone.

This unique skill can only be used once per round and cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚è©Floor Change
abilities.description:
Sinker House changes the floor of the room to one of the following states. This unique skill can be used only once per round.

Softening: The Sinker House can make the floor soft and challenging to walk on. Characters standing on the floor will receive a -2 penalty for Evasion, but any character falling on a softened floor will take no damage.

Ignition/10 (17)/Willpower/Half: The Sinker House sets the floor on fire, dealing 2d-2 fire magic damage to all characters standing on it.

Freezing: The floor becomes icy and slippery. All characters on the floor receive a -2 penalty on their Accuracy checks. In addition, at the end of their turn, they must make check 2d + Adventurer Level + Agility modifier with target number 13, falling prone if they fail this check.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: An ephemeral fairy of snow and ice, Skadis are beautiful women, often with an innocently sly smile on their face. With frozen armor and an icicle spear, they are at home in the middle of freezing weather. Skadis are drawn to strong men and will occasionally give them a jewel to call on the fairy in times of need. When such a gifted man dies, the Skadi will take the corpse away, and it is said that the body is stored in the Skadi's ice palace deep within the snowy mountains.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlame/Earth Vulnerability
abilities.description: When the Skadi is hit by Fire-type or Earth-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Skadi receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Universal Metamagic], [Rune Master] and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚è©Icicle Spear/19 (26)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
With "Range/Area: 2 (30m)/ Shot" throws a spear made of ice and snow at "Target: 1 Character" and deals 2d+20 Water/Ice magic damage to the target.

This ability can be used up to 5 times per round (10 seconds), but cannot be used on the same target in the same turn. If it uses this ability more than 3 times, it cannot cast spells on its turn

allmonsters.language: Trade Common, Arcana, Sylvan, Youma, Barbaric
allmonsters.description: This is a battlefield bard who fights with spellsongs and finales. They are also trained as warriors to stand in the front.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫[Finale: Beast's Roar]/8 (15)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Uses [Finale: Beast's Roar] at "Range: 2 (50m)", dealing 2d+6 bludgeoning magic damage to up to 3 targets.

This unique skill can be used only on the turn immediately after using [‚ñ∫Basic Spellsongs] two or more times in succession.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate

These flying whales live in the vicinity of the Floating Masses. They are white and can grow up to 15 meters in length. They usually hide among clouds and are not easily spotted.

They prey on small flying birds and rarely attack Humanoids.

For the mount version of this creature, see Sky Whale (mount).

A character who is deafened is immune to this effect.

abilities.description:

In addition, a target that fails a resistance check suffers a -2 penalty on Accuracy checks and Evasion checks for 10 seconds (1 round).

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

allmonsters.description:
The Wyvern is a Mythical Beast with a lizard-like head and torso and large wings composed of cortical membranes that allow it to fly. It is sometimes called a "false dragon" because it looks like a dragon, but unlike a dragon, it does not have forelimbs. They also have a low intellect and cannot speak.

There are many subspecies of Wyverns, differing in size, the type of breath they emit, and whether or not they have a poison stinger on their tail. The Sky Wyvern, common in the Ursyla region, is the smallest of the Wyvern species and is considered relatively easy to control. It is characterized by its shiny, bluish-purple body color.

abilities.title: ‚óØDelicate Loot
abilities.description: Whenever an Edged weapon, Wind, or Slashing damage deals 10 or more points of applied damage at any one time, a False Dragon Scale is added to the "Always" obtained loot. This effect is cumulative up to 3 times.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Impact Breath / 8 (15) / Fortitude / Half
abilities.description:
With "Range / Area: 2 (30m) / Shot", the Sky Wyvern spits a wave at "Target: 1 Character", dealing 2d+6 Bludgeoning magic damage and knocking it prone.

This ability cannot be used in consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description:
All sections receive a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

If the Body section falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Twin Strike & Double Attack
abilities.description: It can make two Claws attacks each round, though each attack requires its accuracy check. They may choose to attack different characters with each attack.

allmonsters.description:
It is a small airship. It has no combat capability and is for transportation only. It can accommodate up to 10 passengers in addition to a pilot. Rarely excavated from the ruins of Magitech Civilization, they are sold at high prices. Some of them have sails and use wind power.

The Magitech spell [Skyship] can make one with the same capabilities.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight

This ability can exceptionally mount characters that can store something within them to be boarded. However, characters with the [‚óØMounted] unique skill cannot be mounted.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected

allmonsters.description: Sleipnirs are wind fairies that take the shape of an eight-legged horse. They are known as "gale fairies" due to their incredible speed. Sleipnirs can move at unnoticeable speeds, and when they travel, they create massive gusts of wind behind them. However, they are quite temperamental and can run down from a mountain past a village in a rage. The wind they create in these situations can easily destroy the village with little effort.

abilities.title: ‚óØEarth Vulnerability

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Gale Movement/20 (27)/Fortitude/Negates

The Sleipnir charges full force with "Range: 2 (132m)" and "Area: Breakthrough", dealing 2d+20 Wind magic damage causes targets to fall prone. It can be used only on the ground, and if it is used, the Sleipnir takes a -4 penalty on Evasion checks until the beginning of its next turn.

Their abilities outside of their magic are not a threat, but as long as they have MP and Mako Stones, they can use powerful magic to eliminate enemies and support allies. The GM should decide on their specific magic type in advance. If this monster appears in solo play, it should be treated as having learned Truespeech Magic, unless otherwise specified.

Mako Stones that are not consumed before the Sorcerer's HP falls below 0 are automatically acquired when determining loot.

allmonsters.description: Sparaci is a fairy which looks like a popping firework about 20cm long. It has a strong ego and cannot speak on its own, but it can understand the Sylvan language spoken by others. When it hits, the force may be too strong and cause it to explode and disappear.

allmonsters.description: A Specter is believed to be the spirit of a powerful and angry magic user. Often, these spellcasters lived during the age of the Magical Civilization, the Magic Civilization period, and their sheer hatred of the living has kept their form intact. In fact, this hatred drives the Specter to kill anyone it comes across. For some reason, Specters will only be found at night and disappear during the day. However, unlike some others, the sun does not damage the Specter.

allmonsters.description: The Sphinx is a mythical beast about 5m tall, with the body of a lion, the wings of an eagle, and the face of a beautiful human woman. Highly intelligent and powerful wizards in their own right, Sphinxes can speak any language and cast the most known magic spells, regardless of Class. Sphinxes are often seen serving as gatekeepers for ancient magicians, welcoming those who can answer their riddles as friends of the magician. However, failing to come up with the correct response will lead to a dire fate.

abilities.title: ‚óØMana Resistance
abilities.description: Reduce all Magic Damage Sphinx receive by -5.

Sphinx can make Sage Knowledge checks with a standard value of 20. In this case, it knows combat feat [Sage's Wisdom].

Sphinx deals double damage to other monster weak points it detected.

It has mastered all magic systems at 13 levels.

A subspecies of the Spotted Rhino, this is a very large aquatic rhinoceros that can grow up to 7 meters in length. The skin is still spotted, but the shading is more distinct.

They prefer to live in places where the flow is stagnant. When they digest food in their bodies, they produce a foul-smelling gas that they disperse and contaminate their surroundings.

The Spotted Bog Rhino runs forward with "Range/Area: 2(45m) / Breakthrough" dealing 2d+22 physical damage and knocking them prone.

To use this ability, the Spotted Bog Rhino must be able to make a Full Move, and all Sections of its body must be capable of making Major Actions. The use of this ability is declared before the movement, and once it has taken place, all Sections are considered to have taken their Major Actions and the Rhino suffers a -4 penalty to its Evasion for the next 10 seconds (1 round).

In addition, the target who fails the resistance is overwhelmed by the smell for 1 day and suffers a -2 penalty for all Skill Checks that use the Intelligence modifier for Standard Value calculation. This effect is lost if the target washes their entire body with water for 1 hour.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

This unusual rhinoceros with speckled skin appears in rivers and swamps. The speckled skin is not as hard as that of the common rhinoceros, and it is said that its preference for diving in the water is probably to avoid predators on the ground.

They are peaceful and will not attack unless there is a reason, but once angered, they can be extremely destructive.

allmonsters.description: Fairies of light, Sprites are similar to Shades in size and stature, only around 30cm tall and glowing with a bright light. Their actual appearance is that of a slim blonde woman dressed in a robe of white light, though the light given off by the robe is enough to obscure this view. To restore one's vitality, having the aid of a Sprite is quite crucial for Fairy Tamers. However, Sprites are incredibly shy and rare in public areas.

This is a Magitech for sieges, boasting an ultra-long-range weapon. While guns are the standard for such Magitechs, this is a rare type that attacks by shooting heavy javelins. The accuracy and power of the javelin, the primary weapon of the Magitech, were the highest priority in its design, and its other abilities, including mobility, were relatively low.

Different Star Snipers variations change what is ejected into rocks, flame projectiles, etc.

A Javelin attack is treated as a Thrown Attack with "Range: 2 (100m)".

Star Sniper has 2d Javelins at the start of combat.

abilities.description: It can throw Javelins into a skirmish without causing stray shots, and attack targets beyond the skirmish as well.

Prepares to shoot the target.

With "Range/Area: 2 (100m) / Target," the monster declares the next ranged attack to be performed on "Target: 1 Character".

If this monster makes a ranged attack with a Javelin at the declared target on the next Major Action, it gains a +2 bonus to its Accuracy check and +15 points to its damage. Regardless of whether this action is made or not, and regardless of whether the attack hits or not, the effect of this ability is lost once the following Major Action is completed.

It constantly expels the steam that builds up in its sac, keeping the surroundings hot and humid, which they prefer. This environment is unpleasant for most organisms but desirable for a limited number of livestock breeders and farmers, and the seeds are sold at high prices.

At "Range: Self" and "Target: 1 area (5m radius) / Space," the Steam Pod creates an unpleasant environment for the creatures by blowing steam.

Any character within range receives a -1 penalty to all Accuracy and Evasion checks. This effect is a poison effect.

Monsters whose Habitat includes "Forests," "Marshes," or "Caves" are not affected by this effect.

allmonsters.description: This is a floating plant that floats on the surface of shallow rivers and ponds, with its round leaves ranging from 30 to 50 cm in diameter. If animals step on them unnoticed, they will drop them into the water and attack them.

abilities.description:
It can retract its body and mimic a stone. While mimicking, characters cannot perform a Monster Knowledge check on this monster.

If a character approaches it unintentionally, they need to make a Danger check with target number 13, and if it fails, they will be surprised (see CR I, p. 144). Mimicry will be automatically ended once the monster starts to act.

abilities.description: They may use the [Beetleskin] and [Bear Muscle] Techniques.

allmonsters.description:
This Barbarous, with its beautiful female form and bat-like wings, is commonly known as a "monster appearing in dreams." She appears at night to the sleeping opposite sex and sucks their life force by giving them lewd dreams. The victim eventually weakens and dies. Females are called Succubus, and males are called Incubus.

They are often seen in the service of the Immortal Queen Zeides or the Mad God Laris.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Succubus receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Magic (2 systems) 12 Level/Magic Power 16 (23)
abilities.description: Succubus has mastered any two of Spiritualism Magic, Divine Magic, and Summoning Arts at the 12th level.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Metamagic/Targets], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Indecent Dreams / 16 (23) / Willpower / Negates
abilities.description:
Within "Range: Caster" and "Target: All Areas (20m radius)/All" are put to sleep, and show a lewd dream and put to sleep. The Succubus must choose whether to target HP or MP for each use of [‚ñ∫Indecent Dreams] and will regain HP or MP equal to the damage dealt.

This effect is both Psychic + Curse type. However, sleep brought by this effect is treated as Psychic (Weak) type.

allmonsters.description:
Among Succubi, Succubus Knights are especially good at fighting.

They have the ability to refine weapons, use scythes and swords, and wear tight silhouette armor. Their beautiful appearance mesmerizes and awe- inspires the viewer at the same time.

They love to attract the strong heroes and take particular pleasure in seducing them with their bewitching beauty, as well as in overpowering them with their fighting prowess, bringing them to their knees, and then sucking their energy out of them.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Succubus receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Magic (2 systems) 15 Level/Magic Power 20 (27)
abilities.description: Succubus has mastered any two of Spiritualism Magic, Divine Magic, and Summoning Arts at the 15th level.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: üó®Mana Strike = +20 damage
abilities.description: May deal an additional +20 damage to their next melee attack. At risk, they take a -2 penalty to their Fortitude and Willpower checks.

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +12 points.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Indecent Dreams/20 (27)/Willpower/Neg
abilities.description:
Within "Range: Caster" and "Target: All Areas (20m radius)/All" are put to sleep, and show a lewd dream and put to sleep. The Succubus must choose whether to target HP or MP for each use of [‚ñ∫Indecent Dreams] and will regain HP or MP equal to the damage dealt.

This effect is both Psychic + Curse type. However, sleep brought by this effect is treated as Psychic (Weak) type.

allmonsters.description: These Undead wield powerful magic swords imbued with holy power. Most of the weapons these creatures bear have been found to be swords, but some also wield axes, spears, and fist weapons. When defeated, their holy swords shatter and are lost, but leave behind Sword Shards as loot.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Sacred Blade Rampage / 6 (13) / Evasion / Negates
abilities.description: Flourishes its blade like a raging tempest, at "Range: Caster," "Target: 1 Area (3m radius/5)," dealing 2d+1 Energy magic damage.

abilities.title: ‚è©Draw Forth Power
abilities.description:
Calls forth power from the sacred blade without regard for itself.

For 10 seconds (1 round), the Resistance Check for [‚ñ∫Sacred Blade Rampage] changes from Evasion/Negates to Fortitude/Half, and the damage becomes 2d+4.

When it uses this effect, the Sword immediately receives 5 points of fixed damage to its HP and its Evasion is penalized by -1 for 10 seconds (1 round).

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

allmonsters.description:
This is a giant earthworm that inhabits the swamps of the Alframe continent. The length of the body, from the mouth to the tip of the tail, is about 20 meters, with the largest exceeding 30 meters.

It is said that when they leave the swamp where they were born while still young and move to a spring or pond filled with fresh water, they dig up the bottom of the water and turn it into a muddy swamp, making it their new home.

abilities.title: ‚óØSwamp Monster Body
abilities.description: Damage from bludgeoning weapons is treated as if Defense were 5 points higher.

abilities.title: ‚óØBloodsucking
abilities.description: If the Mouth attack hits, the HP of any one section of this monster is recovered by a value equal to the applied damage. Which section is recovered can be selected after each attack and after all the damage determination processes are completed. However, the section with HP below 0 cannot be selected.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fluid Eruption/16 (23)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
With "Range: Caster" and "Target: 1 area (3m Radius) / 5", it spurts out bodily fluids to blind the target.

If the target fails resistance, it becomes blind. This state can be removed with an effect that cures blindness or by the target wiping its face with Major Action.

This unique skill can only be used when the HP of the Body section is less than half of the maximum value (rounded up), and when used, it consumes 10 HP. The body section can lower its HP to 0 or lower, with this ability becoming disabled.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Foot Scooping/12 (19)/Danger Sense/Negates
abilities.description: Its tail crawls underground and attacks the feet of the target. With "Range: Touch," Tail makes up to 5 characters fall prone. This effect only applies to bipedal characters with only one section.

allmonsters.description: What appears to be an ant at first is really an exceedingly small earth fairy, dressed in a dark hat and coat. Muryans are tiny fairies that travel in swarms and will typically be seen as a part of a large group, rather than individually. Because of their small size, they tend to avoid conflict when possible and are rather easygoing. If a group of Muryans sees someone who's not having a good time, they will try and put on a little song and dance to bring some cheer.

abilities.title: ‚óØWind Vulnerability
abilities.description: When the Swarm of Muryans is hit by Wind-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: üó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: A Swarm of Muryans can use the Combat Feat [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚óØSwarm
abilities.description:
A Swarm of Muryans is immune to criticals.

In addition, Throw or similar attacks deal no damage and have no effect.

The maximum applied damage from magic with "Area: Target" and "Target: 1 Character" is limited to 1 point.

If this monster is in melee, the combat feat [Targeting] or [Magic Control] loses its effect when it targets or includes a character or a melee area (the center point in Standard Combat) in the skirmish where it exists.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Swarming Attack/Can't
abilities.description: Countless Muryans crawl up and bite. The Swarm of Muryans deals [2d + 1/5th of remaining HP (rounded down)] physical damage to "Target: 1 Character" within "Range: Touch."

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫[Finale: Summer Vitality]/5 (12)
abilities.description:
With "Range: 2 (30m)", [Finale: Summer Vitality] is used to heal HP of "Target: 1 Character" by 2d+3 points. This effect does not work on undead, constructs and magitech characters.

This ability cannot be used in consecutive turns. Once a character is affected, it cannot be healed again by this monster

allmonsters.description: This is a Humanoid agile warrior. It is not only a melee attacker, but also can throw knives and quickly moves, leading the battle to an advantageous situation.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Throw Knife/4 (11)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
Throws a knife. This unique skill deals 1d+1 physical damage to "Target: 1 Character" at "Range: 1 (10m)".

This effect may be used up to twice per combat.

abilities.title: ‚óØKilling Blow
abilities.description: If the 2d roll determining damage is 9 or more, the damage is increased by +4 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may choose to change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll, by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides.

allmonsters.sections: 4 (Body / Sword Arm / Spear Arm / Club Arm)
allmonsters.description:
This is a combat training construct from the Magic Civilization Period. It has a log-like body with three arms holding weapons and four short legs for movement. Rarely a working version of this construct has been found at Magic Civilization Period ruins.

It is said to have been used to teach how to deal with various weapons and magical attacks. Its three arms were modeled after a certain humanoid race that became extinct during the Magic Civilization Period.

abilities.title: ‚óØStable Body
abilities.description: Any "Resistance: Half" effect on this monster will be treated as "Resistance: Negates."

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: üó®Decoy Attack I
abilities.description:
It gains -2 to Accuracy checks, but the damage is increased by +2 on hit.

If the declared attack is evaded, the enemy receives a -1 penalty to Evasion checks for the next 10 seconds (1 round). This effect is cumulative up to -4 but is lost if the target fails an Evasion check even once.

allmonsters.description: Whimsical wind fairies Sylphs appear to travelers as half-transparent humanoids, often choosing to appear as either humans or elves. They are not malicious, but sometimes their pranks may be dangerous, such as flying around a mountaineer trying to climb. Sylphs prefer to fly freely wherever they want, though occasionally, some will follow a group of travelers that appreciate their pranks.

abilities.title: ‚óØWind Body
abilities.description: Edged weapons treat Sylph's Defense as 3 points higher.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Sylph receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØEarth Vulnerability
abilities.description: When the Sylph is hit by Earth-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Metamagic Distance].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Gale Breath/9 (16)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: With "Range/Area: 2 (30m)/ Shot", breathes a mass of compressed air to "Target: 1 area (3m Radius)/5", dealing 2d+6 wind magic damage

allmonsters.description: This is one of the larger Magitech Zerlay series, carrying a larger launcher on its back. The larger size allows it to shoot as a light beam. It is also able to move while maintaining its posture when shooting the light beam.

abilities.title: ‚óØMana Coating (1)
abilities.description: Reduces magic damage received by 1.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Light Ray/7 (14)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Attacks with a huge ray of light.

Attacks target within "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/Line" and deal 2d+5 energy magic damage.

This unique skill cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØTargeting & Hawk Eye
abilities.description: [‚ñ∫Light Ray] fired into a skirmish cannot have stray shots, and can attack targets beyond the skirmish.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description:
SZerlay's height prevents enemies from attacking it. The Launch Tube receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks.

When the Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

abilities.title: ‚óØLoss of Mobility
abilities.description: When the Body section HP becomes 0 or less, SZerlay cannot move.

allmonsters.description:
Among the Talos, this juggernaut is the most heavily fortified in terms of offensive power and is specifically designed to break through enemy lines, even operating independently.

Standing at nearly three meters tall, it wields a massive sword and a large shield. Its thick and foreboding outer shell exudes an intimidating presence.

They excel in combat against magicians and demonstrate their combat prowess in group battles. Furthermore, they serve as leaders among other Talos and possess the intelligence to comprehend complex strategies. They display unwavering loyalty to their masters and possess a high level of emotional intelligence, enabling them to care for their masters and lend a listening ear during peaceful times.

To sustain its life, a Talos Juggernaut must consume a humanoid heart every six months.

abilities.title: ‚óØMana Absorbing Shell
abilities.description:
Gains a +4 bonus to resistance checks against magic. Also, if the resistance check sÏ≥Æds, HP is recovered equal to the MP used for the spell (the actual number used, or the equivalent for 1 character if [Metamagic/Targets] was present).

This does not apply to resistance to Fairy Magic or Nature Magic.

abilities.title: ‚óØFairy/Spirit Blindness
abilities.description: Cannot sense or hear the voices of fairies and spirits. When damaged by Fairy Magic, Fairies, or Nature Magic, it suffers 3 additional points of damage.

abilities.title: ‚è©Ignis Blaze
abilities.description: Flames spew from its entire body. Damage from melee attacks becomes fire type, with a +3 bonus to Accuracy Checks and a +6 bonus to damage. This effect is not cumulative. When the creature uses this ability, it receives 8 fixed damage at the end of its turn.

abilities.title: üó®Desperate Strike II
abilities.description: When using this, if the attack hits, it deals +10 damage, and the user receives 10 points of fixed damage. If the attack does not hit, no fixed damage is suffered.

abilities.title: üó®Cleave II
abilities.description: Talos Juggernaut can attack with a weapon up to 5 target characters within the skirmish in which it resides.

Cracked Ignis Ore Core (1000G / Gold Black S)

allmonsters.description:
Talos are artificial creatures believed to have been created by Barbarous and Dark Dwarves. These creatures were driven underground during the era of the Ancient Magic Civilization. According to legend, Talos were made by magically mineralizing various creatures and feeding them into a furnace that could burn the ore called "Ignis Blaze."

Talos resemble warriors standing about 2 meters tall. They wear tightly fitted armor and carry large swords. Their armor acts as a natural outer shell, and although they have horns, the horns grow directly from their skulls, not from their helmets. Their faces are Humanoid but lack expression.

Talos were created to fight and serve Barbarous. They are fearless and possess great combat skills. They have a general resistance to magic, and when they exert themselves, flames spew from the outer joints and gaps along the inner thigh. Because Talos is an artificial lifeform, it does not possess a soul and, therefore, does not have Soulscars. As a result, it is unaffected by Swords of Protection. However, a major weakness of Talos is its inability to perceive fairies and spirits.

During the Magic Civilization era, Talos were believed to have been extensively used. However, most of them were seemingly destroyed in the battles of that era, making them rarely seen today. Nonetheless, Talos can still be found in boxes called "Fire's Casing" in Magic Civilization ruins. As long as they remain within these casings, they seem to continue sleeping without aging.

Opening a Fire's Casing with the correct sequence makes an individual the master of the Talos. However, a Talos cannot survive without consuming a Humanoid heart once a year. Although not certain, there is a theory that Talos served as a motif in the foundational research of Runefolk. Some similarities can be observed between the two.

Talos Soldiers are the lowest class of mass-produced soldiers. They have minimal intelligence and lack human emotions. They mechanically follow the orders of their masters. In some cases, they are found in large numbers and are used as subordinates by Drakes.

abilities.title: ‚óØAnti-Magic Shell
abilities.description: Gains a +4 bonus to resistance checks against magic. However, this does not apply to resistance to Fairy Magic and Nature Magic.

abilities.title: ‚óØFairy/Spirit Blindness
abilities.description: Cannot sense or hear the voices of fairies and spirits. When damaged by Fairy Magic, Fairies or Nature Magic, it suffers 3 additional points of damage.

abilities.title: ‚è©Ignis Blaze
abilities.description: Flames spews from its entire body. Damage from melee attacks becomes fire type, with a +2 bonus to Accuracy Checks and a +4 bonus to damage. This effect is not cumulative. When the creature uses this ability, it receives 5 fixed damage at the end of its turn.

abilities.title: üó®Desperate Strike I
abilities.description: When using this, if the attack hits, it deals +5 damage, and the user receives 5 points of fixed damage. If the attack does not hit, no fixed damage is suffered.

loottable.loot: Shattered Ignis Ore Core (300G/Gold Black A)
Cracked Ignis Ore Core (1,000G/Gold Black S)

allmonsters.description:
Heavily armed and armored even for a Talos, it bears a sword and large shield and stands slightly taller than a Talos Soldier. Endowed with great combat ability and judgment, it stands as an impregnable line of defense against those who would harm its master.

It is unable to sustain its existence if it does not consume a Humanoid heart once every 10 months.

abilities.title: ‚óØAnti-Magic Shell
abilities.description: Gains a +4 bonus to resistance checks against magic. However, this does not apply to resistance to Fairy Magic and Nature Magic.

abilities.title: ‚óØFairy/Spirit Blindness
abilities.description: Cannot sense or hear the voices of fairies and spirits. When damaged by Fairy Magic, Fairies, or Nature Magic, it suffers 3 additional points of damage.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Defense of Ignis
abilities.description: The Talos Warrior becomes covered in fire and gains +3 Defense for 10 Seconds (1 Round). Anyone who makes a melee attack versus the Talos during this period, regardless of success or failure, must suffer 2d of Fire magic. This causes the Talos to receive 5 points of fixed damage on its next turn.

abilities.title: üó®Power Attack I
abilities.description: They can deal an additional +4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

abilities.title: üó®‚ñ≥Cover II
abilities.description: This is identical to the combat feat [Cover II].
