Cracked Ignis Ore Core (1,000G/Gold Black S)

allmonsters.description:
Tannoz are ugly Barbarous that live mainly by the seashore and riverside. They are short and have wrinkled faces. Their right hand is a pair of crab-like pincers, and they carry a lantern in their left hand. These lanterns are used for hunting prey, confusing and stranding boats at night, and luring Humanoids into swamps and rivers. Sometimes they can also be seen inland serving other Barbarous.

Tannoz are hated by Humanoid fairy tamers because they do not make contracts with their fairies, but force them to work.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fairy Magic 6 Level/Magic Power 8 (15)
abilities.description: It can use Earth, Water/Ice, Wind, and Dark magic types.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Metamagic/Targets].

allmonsters.description: They are the leader of the Tannoz, who use Divine Magic in addition to Fairy Magic. Tannoz generally follow Sea Snatcher Eiryak, whose teachings Tannoz Clerics preach to their companions. Clerics prefer to summon fairies and support allies with Divine Magic.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Divine Magic 9 Level & Fairy Magic 9 Level/Magic Power 11 (18)
abilities.description: It can use Earth, Water/Ice, Wind, and Dark Fairy Magic types.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], and [Metamagic/Targets].

allmonsters.description: This is a mature and experienced Tannoz fighter. They are skilled at fighting in the water, and their sharp pincers are sharp enough to easily pierce even the hardest armor.

abilities.title: ‚óØFairy Magic 10 Level/Magic Power 12 (19)
abilities.description: It can use Earth, Water/Ice, Wind, and Dark types.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats[Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], and [Metamagic/Targets].

allmonsters.description: Tentacle Kelp is a mobile form of seagrass, about 5 meters long. It entangles and preys on animals and boats mainly in shallow water, but it can also walk by its roots and may come up to beaches and other areas when there is no prey.

abilities.title: ‚óØEntangling Leaves
abilities.description:
A successful hit from a Wrap entangles the target. Each round, the entangled target is unable to move, is hit automatically by the Wrap and makes all Accuracy and Evasion Checks with a -2 penalty. This penalty is not cumulative.

When the target tries to escape, use de-bonding rules.

While entangled by this unique skill, the Leaf section cannot attack other characters. If the monster itself wants to release the target, it can do so with a Minor Action.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttitude Control
abilities.description:
Tentacle Kelp cannot fall prone.

If the Root section falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

abilities.title: ‚óØStanding Firm
abilities.description:
If the Leaves section attempts to use de-bonding, its success value is given a +2 bonus.

If the Root section falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

allmonsters.description:
The Terror Beasts are considered the higher form of Aetherbeasts.

It is about the size of a cow and four-legged, but it has a horrifying and bizarre appearance, and its body is constantly decomposing and regenerating. It emits an unpleasant odor, and those who see it can be weakened by fear.

They often follow other daemons and are known to act in groups. Their fangs are poisonous, and those that are bitten will surely die as their bodies slowly rot.

abilities.title: üó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: A Terror Beast can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action] and [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚óØDreadful/9 (16)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description: Anyone who sees the Terror Beast receives a -2 penalty to all Skill Checks due to fear for 10 seconds (1 round). A Willpower check against this effect must be made at the beginning of each character's turn. This effect is Psychic type.

abilities.title: ‚óØCorrosive Poison/11 (18)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
The target is poisoned if the Bite attack deals at least 1 point of applied damage.

A poisoned character immediately suffers 2d-5 Poison magic damage (minimum 0) and continues to suffer the same damage on each of its turns (no Fortitude check is needed). This effect lasts as long as it is not cured but is not cumulative.

abilities.title: ‚óØRegeneration = 10 points
abilities.description: At the end of each round, the Terror Beast recovers 10 HP. This has no effect if Terror Beast has 0 HP or lower.

allmonsters.description: It is a deep blue, jelly-like, amorphous creature, a subspecies of Blob, and is virtually indistinguishable from a regular Blob in appearance. This creature has the ability to mimic creatures and engulf the unwary approaching creatures. The unfortunate prey will be eventually assimilated into a part of the Thing.

abilities.title: ‚óØSoft Body
abilities.description: Bludgeoning weapons treat the Defense of a Thing as 5 points higher. And it is immune to Throw and similar attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØAcidic Body
abilities.description: Weapons that have attacked this monster and armor that has been attacked by this monster will melt away after 24 hours; cleaning with alcohol such as wine within 24 hours will prevent this effect.

abilities.title: ‚óØMimicry / 15 / Danger Sense / Negates
abilities.description: It can mimic other living creatures. While mimicking, characters cannot perform a Monster Knowledge check on this monster. If a character approaches it unintentionally, they need to make a Danger check with Target Number 15, and if it fails, they will be surprised. Mimicry will automatically end once the monster starts to act.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description: This is a Druid who is compassionate towards animals and plants, and uses their power to protect their friends.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Hawk Eye] and [Universal Metamagic].

abilities.title: ‚óØSword's Grace/Change Fate
abilities.description: Once per day, they may change the result of a Skill Check or Damage roll, by switching the faces of the rolled 2d to the opposite sides and adding +1 to it.

allmonsters.description:
A huge bird cloaked in lightning, a Thunderbird's body shines brightly in the sky. Even amid combat, the electricity arcing off of one of these great birds is rather intense.

Thunderbirds often do not stay in one territory for long and are difficult to track down for any purpose. Only rarely does a Thunderbird settle down and create a nest, and more often than not it is due to spawning.

They may lay eggs in Shallow Abysses for self-preservation, which can create dangerous beasts for intruders.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Thunderclap/6 (13)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Summons lightning with "Range: Self" and "Target: 1 area (6m radius) / 20" and deals 2d+4 Lightning magic damage to the target.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description:
A Thunderbird receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

If one of the Wings falls to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

allmonsters.description: A four-legged carnivore with black and orange stripes. A ferocious feline, these large cats are hunting experts alone, hiding with their striped camouflage and striking unexpectedly. Their fur is prized by fashion enthusiasts, and high-quality pelts can fetch a good price at the market.

abilities.title: ‚óØFast Action
abilities.description: During the first round of combat, if the Tiger wins initiative, it may take two Major Actions that round.

abilities.title: ‚óØContinuous Attack
abilities.description: If a Tiger successfully hits a target in melee, it may make a second attack against the same target.

allmonsters.description: The Tiki Tiki Daemon is actually a multitude of smaller Tikiras that move in concert as a single creature. The combined Tiki Tiki has the appearance of a human-sized Tikira. All Tikira in the colony share both thoughts and perceptions.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Paradox
abilities.description: The Tiki Tiki can cause spells that would recover HP to deal Magic damage instead by spending twice as much MP to cast those spells.

abilities.title: üó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: Receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØMockery
abilities.description: The Tiki Tiki finds failure hilarious and will begin uncontrollably laughing when anyone, friend, or foe, Automatically Fails on a roll. While laughing, the Tikira cannot use magic until the end of their next turn.

abilities.title: ‚óØSuper Unluck
abilities.description: In battles where the Tiki Tiki is present, when any character, friend or foe, other than the Tiki Tiki rolls double 6's, that roll gets changed to double 1's instead (which triggers the Tiki Tiki's [‚óØMockery] unique skill). It is possible to change the roll back to double 6s using [Sword's Grace/Change Fate]. This ability is not triggered if double 1s are changed to double 6s using [Sword's Grace/Change Fate] normally.

abilities.title: ‚è©Split/Reform
abilities.description: The Tiki Tiki can split itself into a swarm of smaller Daemons or reform into one large Daemon. When split, the Tiki Tiki cannot make melee attacks or cast spells but gains the [‚óØSwarm] unique skill. If the effect of [‚óØMockery] is active, the ability [‚ñ∫Destructive Cacophony] is also triggered. Splitting or Reforming requires a Minor Action, but the Tiki Tiki cannot Split and Reform during the same turn.

abilities.title: ‚óØSwarm
abilities.description: This unique skill is only available when the Tiki Tiki has used [‚è©Split/Reform] to become a group of smaller Daemons. When targeting the Tiki Tiki or another character in the Tiki Tiki's skirmish area, the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Magic Control] cannot be used.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Destructive Cacophony / 20 (27) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description:
This ability can only be used when [‚óØMockery] is active and when the Tiki Tiki has split itself into a group using [‚è©Split/Reform].

The Tiki Tiki surrounds a "Target: 1 Character" within "Range: Touch" and bombards them with loud laughter. The target receives 2d+16 of Bludgeoning magic damage and is unable to declare Combat Feats for 10 seconds (1 round).

loottable.loot: Rainbow Daemon Wings (1500G/Gold Red S) x 1d

allmonsters.description: 20cm high, the Tikira is a small daemon that looks similar to a Human but has the compound eyes and membranous wings of a dragonfly. They love to fly around and cause mischief, taking pleasure in someone else's misfortunes.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Paradox
abilities.description: The Tikira can cause spells that would recover HP to deal Magic damage instead by spending twice as much MP to cast those spells.

abilities.title: üó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: Receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØMockery
abilities.description: The Tikira find failure hilarious and will begin uncontrollably laughing when anyone, friend, or foe, Automatically Fails on a roll. While laughing, the Tikira cannot use magic until the end of their next turn.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnluck
abilities.description: The first time any character would roll double 6s (other than the Tikira), that roll gets changed to double 1's instead (which triggers the Tikira's [‚óØMockery] unique skill). It is possible to change the roll back to double 6's using [Sword's Grace/Change Fate], however, this unique skill would then affect the next roll of double 6's that occurs. If there are multiple Tikira's on the battlefield, each one of them can use this unique skill for different double 6s.

allmonsters.description:
A Tilgris is a Mythical Beast similar to a tiger, with red and black tiger stripes on its fur. However, it is two times larger than an ordinary tiger.

It is characterized by a partially hardened skin from the forehead to the back that makes it appear armored. Tilgris, in addition to its sharp fangs and claws, uses its tail skillfully and mercilessly to attack its enemies. In addition, Tilgris has the ability to spit lightning breath, which has been described as "like a lightning cloud descending directly from the sky."

They are territorial and exclusive, and it is considered very dangerous to venture into their territory.

Although they are often regarded as violent because of their ecology, they are also known to be as intelligent as humans. Although they cannot speak, they can understand human languages and are not easy to trap.

On the other hand, they are also known to be very faithful to their fellow humanoids, and some of them have developed friendships with humanoids and act as mounts in the Rider's Guilds.

For the mount version of this creature, see Tilgris.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Double Attack
abilities.description: Can make two Claws attacks with one Major Action.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Lightning Breath/10 (17)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description:
It spits lightning with "Range/Area: 2 (20m) / Shot" to "Target: 1 area (3m Radius) / 5." It deals 2d+9 Lightning and Water/Ice magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØLong Tail
abilities.description: Tail attacks can be made with "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Target".

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If their 2d damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +7 points.

allmonsters.description: This fairy is a beautiful giant about 5 meters tall, and she lives with Dryads and Gnomes, singing and making merry. They hate to be disturbed, preferring places where even animals do not come close, such as deep in the mountains or in the wilderness. The fairy is good-natured and amiable, taking very good care of those with whom she has shared a banquet.

abilities.title: ‚óØType: Earth/Magic Power 22 (29)
abilities.description: Only the Upper Body section can cast spells.

abilities.title: ‚óØWind Vulnerability
abilities.description: When the Titan is hit by Wind-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Twin Strike & Double Attack
abilities.description: A Titan can make two attacks each round, though each attack requires its own Accuracy check. They may choose to attack different characters with each attack.

abilities.title: üó®Earth Mana Strike = +22 damage
abilities.description: A Titan can deal an additional +22 damage on their next attack and turn the attacks into earth-type damage. At risk, it takes a -2 penalty to its Fortitude and Willpower checks.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØKnock Out
abilities.description:
If the fist hits the target, the target is sent to the rearguard area of their faction (Simplified Combat) or to any direction chosen by this monster (Standard Combat) for 30 meters and falls prone, taking 45 points of falling damage.

If this effect is applied while the target is not touching the ground, the flying distance is 40 meters (Standard Combat), and the falling damage is 60 points (both in Simplified Combat and Standard Combat).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫King of Earth/Can't
abilities.description: Within "Range/Area: 2 (100m)/ Target" cancels the racial ability [Sword's Grace / Change Fate] of "Target: 1 Character" for 10 seconds (1 round).

abilities.title: ‚óØEarth's Vitality
abilities.description:
This ability is active only when the HP of the Lower Body is more than 1 and less than half of the maximum value (rounding up).

At the end of the monster's turn, Lower Body recovers 20 HP.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Earth Rumble/22 (29)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: The earth vibrates, shaking the space around it. Within "Range: Caster," Titan deals 2d+20 earth magic damage to "Target: All Areas (30m Radius)/All".

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ +4
abilities.description:
A Titan's enormous size hinders attack.

The Upper Body cannot be attacked in melee. Against any ranged attacks, Head receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks.

This effect disappears when the Lower Body falls to 0 HP or lower

allmonsters.description:
Titania, a majestic fairy, lives in seclusion with her loyal followers, the Sprites and Nymphs, in the high mountains and forests.

She upholds strict precepts and rules and commands respect from all. Defying her values and beliefs leads to swift and formidable consequences.

abilities.title: ‚óØType: Light/Magic Power 22 (29)
abilities.description: Only the Upper Body section can cast spells.

abilities.title: ‚óØLight Protection
abilities.description: A Titania takes -17 less magic damage, regardless of type.

abilities.title: ‚óØIndomitable Spirit
abilities.description: Titania is completely immune to any Psychic type effects that it does not wish to receive, and she is free to cancel any Psychic effects it has. Cancel happens without contested checks, and even for Curse + Psychic effects.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: They receive a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], [Wordbreak], [Rune Master].

abilities.title: üó® Fast Singing
abilities.description: Titania can cast two spells with one Major Action. During both Major Actions, Titania has -4 Magic Power lower.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Pillar of Light/24 (31)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
This ability has "Range/Area: 2 (50m) / Target" and rains a pillar of light down from above on up to two targets of Titania's choice, dealing 2d+24 Energy magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚è©Blessing of Light
abilities.description:
This ability restores 10 points of HP and MP to the Upper Body.

Using this ability will cost Lower Body 20 MP.

This ability can only be used once every 10 seconds (1 round).

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ +4
abilities.description:
A Titania's tremendous size hinders attack.

The Upper Body cannot be attacked in melee. Against any ranged attacks, Head receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks.

This effect disappears when the Lower Body falls to 0 HP or lower

allmonsters.description:
This is a 2-meter-long, insect-like construct that lacks wings for flying. Instead, three to five spinning gears are attached to its back near the top, and it strikes opponents by creating razor winds through the violent rotation of these gears.

Attacking the gears on the wings increases the speed of rotation and produces stronger winds. It is worth noting that this type of aircraft was initially used for autonomous air cages and other non-combat roles.

abilities.title: ‚óØRotary Conversion
abilities.description: Whenever the monster receives 1 point or more physical damage, the monster's physical damage and magic damage are increased by 1 point for 10 seconds (1 round). This effect is stacks until it reaches a maximum of 4 points.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Whirlwind/5 (12)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Trap Mixer creates a magical wind around itself. It deals 2d wind magic damage to all opponents in the same skirmish area.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Howling Wind/6 (13)/Willpower/Half
abilities.description:
Trap Mixer sends wind blade far. With "Area: Shot" it deals 2d+2 slashing magic damage to target 1 character within "Range: 1 (10m)".

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Construct HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Construct's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Constructs can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.description:
This mantis has grown abnormally long, up to about 7 meters in length. Its scythe, with its tip, split into three parts, is hard enough to cut through rocks. The wings on its body not only allow it to fly but also weaken its prey by vibrating them.

They can fly, but only for very short periods of time, and they are also not as flexible and maneuverable as on the ground. Therefore, when hunting prey, they descend to the ground to fight.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Cross Strike / 14 (21) / Evasion / Negates
abilities.description:
The Mantis makes a melee attack on 1 Character with both its Left and Right Scythe sections simultaneously, dealing 2d+22 physical damage if successful.

This ability cannot be used if either the Left or Right Scythe has already taken a Major Action, and when this ability is used, the Major Action for both Sections is considered to be completed.

abilities.title: ‚óØDeflect
abilities.description:
If the Body section is the target of a melee or ranged attack, the Right Scythe or Left Scythe section can defend by repelling the attack. Instead of the Evasion check of the Body, each section performs an Accuracy check and compares the Success Values. If the Success Value is equal to or higher than the opponent's Accuracy check, the section takes no damage. If it fails, the Body section receives a hit without making an Evasion check.

This ability can only be attempted once per round per section.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Disturbing Buzz / 12 (19) / Willpower / Negates
abilities.description: The Mantis flutters its wings violently and produces an unpleasant sound "Range: Caster" and "Target: All Areas (30m Radius) / All", disrupting the concentration of all the characters there. This inflicts a -1 penalty to all Skill Checks for those who are affected, and lasts for 10 seconds (1 round). This effect is Psychic type.

loottable.loot: Glittering Wing Membrane (340/G / Gold Red A)
Hard Three Bladed Scythe (2500G / Red Black S)

allmonsters.description:
A Troll's stature is like that of a boulder; standing taller than 3m, its skin is tougher than a rock. For Barbarous, Trolls have incredible discipline and take great pride in maintaining their physique. They are also devout followers of the gods.

Troll blood is said to symbolize power as well, and it is often used as a sort of paint. When applied by a Troll, it will strengthen weapons and armor. Even a Troll's skin can be toughened by its own blood.

Trolls are often nocturnal creatures as well and dislike bright lights. Sunlight, in particular, will significantly weaken a Troll, and they abhor going out during the daytime.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike I
abilities.description: They can deal an additional 4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚óØWeakening
abilities.description: As long as a Troll is under sunlight, it receives a -2 penalty to all Accuracy and Evasion Checks.

allmonsters.description: Known as the "tyrant king," Tyrant Regilex is an extremely ferocious predator. It stands erect and looks like a lizard with well-developed back legs. They are about 10 meters long, and when they see their prey, they attack without hesitation, no matter how big or small the prey is. Their sharp claws and fangs are their most powerful weapons, and they are uncontrollable once they start rampaging. They are also known as the strongest predators in all Raxia.

abilities.title: ‚óØMight of the Tyrant/23 (30)/ Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
This unique skill is treated as an effect of "Range: Caster" and "Target: All Areas (100m Radius) / Space".

All characters in the area of effect, except the Tyrant Regilex itself, must perform a Willpower check at the beginning of their turn. If they fail, they suffer a -2 penalty on all action checks for the next 10 seconds (1 round) due to instinctive fear.

This effect is of the Psychic type.

abilities.title: ‚óØEnormous Body
abilities.description: Tyrant Regilex's body is too large. Some attacks will not reach the enemy in front of it. The Tail section melee attacks cannot be used to attack targets that have been attacked by Head or Body sections. The reverse is also true.

abilities.title: ‚óØContinuous Attack
abilities.description: If a Tyrant Regilex successfully hits a target in melee, they may make a second attack against the same target.

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +20 points.

abilities.title: ‚óØClaws
abilities.description: If the Claws attack hits, it should make two damage decisions, dealing them both to the target.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ +4
abilities.description:
The giant body hinders attacks.

The Head section gains a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee and ranged attacks.

This effect disappears when the Body section falls to 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike III
abilities.description: They can deal an additional +20 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

allmonsters.description:
The Undead Generals were specially created by ancient wizard-kings to guard their treasures.

These warriors are skilled at launching swift and powerful attacks, making them formidable in melee combat. However, they possess low intelligence and can only carry out orders. Still guarding the wizard-king's secret underground laboratories and treasure vaults, they are an extremely formidable adversary for any adventurers.

abilities.title: ‚óØPsychic Resistance
abilities.description: The Undead General gains a +4 bonus when it makes a Willpower roll against any psychic type spell or unique skill.

abilities.title: ‚óØBone Body
abilities.description: An Undead General is immune to criticals from edged weapons.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫4 Attacks (At Random)
abilities.description: The Undead General makes four attacks, swinging the weapon around in both hands. For each attack, the target is chosen at random from the list of possible melee attackers.

abilities.title: ‚óØContinuous Attack II
abilities.description: If an Undead General successfully hits a target in melee, they may make a second attack. They can make a third attack against the same target if a second attack hits.

abilities.title: ‚óØPainful Strike
abilities.description: If the 2d roll of the damage roll is 10 or more, the damage is increased by an additional +12 points.

abilities.title: üó®‚ñ≥Cover I
abilities.description: The effect is the same as the combat feat [Cover I].

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

loottable.loot: Royal Treasured Sword (8,000G/Gold Black White S)

allmonsters.description:
Water fairies that have become stronger with time and mana, Undines appear as beautiful humanoid women (often humans and elves). Often seen in larger bodies of water, they have also been sighted in rivers and are very curious about travelers on the water. However, their curiosity may occasionally be dangerous, as Undines tend not to know that other races can drown in water.

They dislike ugly people on the water and try to deliberately sink their vessels, so they can't be seen on the water. However, an even more hated enemy is those who would pollute water sources. These people, the Undines, actively and aggressively try to drown to protect themselves and their habitat.

abilities.title: ‚óØWater Body
abilities.description: Blunt weapons treat the Undine's Defense as 3 points higher.

abilities.title: ‚óØFire Vulnerability
abilities.description: When Undine is hit by Fire-type damage, it takes an extra 3 damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Metamagic/Targets], [MP Save/Fairy Tamer].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Water Gun/9 (16)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: With "Range/Area: 2 (20m) / Shot", the monster sprays water jet from both palms at "Target: 1 Character", dealing 2d+6 water/ice magic damage and making it fall prone

allmonsters.description:
Unicorns are elegant creatures, horse-like, with long, iridescent spiraling horns on their forehead. They are intelligent but very skittish, only appearing to human maidens and even then, quite rarely.

They are hunted by both outlaws and Barbarous for their horn, which can cure diseases and heal wounds even after it is removed from the Unicorn.

The horn has the entirety of the Unicorn's MP stored in it, and when cut it retains the Unicorn's current MP (killing the Unicorn in the process) and can be used as a Unicorn Horn (see CR II, p. 233 or ET, p. 150).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fairy Magic 6 Level/Magic Power 8 (15)
abilities.description: Can use Earth, Water/Ice, Light, and Dark types.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], and [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Healing Horn/10 (17)/Fortitude/Negates
abilities.description:
It touches the "Target: 1 Character" with a horn to heal the target's HP by 50 points. If the Fortitude check was the favorable result in the success value comparison, the target will also be completely cured of any poison, disease, curse, petrification, etc. that it has been subjected to. It is also possible to apply this effect to itself.

However, this effect does not apply to Constructs and Magitech characters. Furthermore, if the character touched by the horn is Undead, not only is it immune to the aforementioned effects, but it must also perform a Fortitude and, if it fails, suffer magic damage of 50 points.

A character can only receive this effect once per day. In the case of a character with multiple sections, each section can be affected up to once per day.

Using this unique skill consumes 10 points of MP.

abilities.title: ‚óØHorn of Mana
abilities.description: If the Unicorn's MP reaches 0, it dies instantly, its horn crumbling into useless dust.

loottable.loot: Unicorn Horn (Remaining MP x 300G/Gold Red A √¢¬Ä¬ì SS)

allmonsters.description: A ferocious Undead dog under the influence of a Vampire. Drinking the fresh blood of others causes them to attack with greater frenzy.

abilities.title: ‚óØVampiric Madness / 7 (14) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description:
When attacking, the Vampire Hound drains blood from its target, the smell of which causes it to become frenzied.

If an attack hits, the target makes a Fortitude Check immediately after damage is dealt. If it fails, the Vampire Hound gains a +1 to its Accuracy and damage, as well as a -1 penalty to its Evasion, for 3 minutes (18 rounds).

This effect is cumulative and can stack up to four times.

allmonsters.description:
Among the Nosferatu, there exists a Matter Clan of vampires who have spent many years studying as scholars. Like other clans, they focus on contracts, but their first priority is to pass on knowledge.

Despite their considerable proficiency in Barbarous, they do not like to exclude others from their work. They view almost everything as a research target, and their only concern is whether or not they can prove their own ideas through experiments or other means. They prefer to "preserve" the state of things so that their research targets will never cease, and they do not go around killing or destroying without careful consideration.

However, they will not tolerate any interruption that may interfere with their research and will try to eliminate it with their own abilities. They are also characterized by their arrogance and ruthlessness, and when it comes to the experiments they have in mind, they do not care about the lives of others.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Truespeech Magic, Spiritualism Magic, Divine Magic 14 Level/Magic Power 21 (28)
‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], [Double Cast], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØKnowledge & Weakness Exploit/21 (28)
abilities.description:
Can make Sage Intelligence checks with a Standard Value of 21 (fixed value of 28).

If this monster makes an attack against another character who is detected as having a weak point, the effect of the attack is doubled.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Vampire Tetrahedron receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØRegeneration = 12 points
abilities.description: At the end of each round, a Vampire Tetrahedron recovers 12 HP. This does not affect the Vampire Tetrahedron at 0 HP or lower.

abilities.title: ‚óØVampire Body
abilities.description: As long as a Vampire Tetrahedron is under sunlight, it takes 12 magic damage at the end of its turn and receives a -2 penalty to all Accuracy and Evasion Checks. This damage cannot be reduced in any way. Additionally, the Vampire Tetrahedron cannot use their [‚óØRegeneration] or [‚óØNormal Weapon Immunity] abilities.

abilities.title: ‚è©Fourth Dimensional Laws/22 (29)/Willpower/Neg
abilities.description:
It is a limited manifestation of a higher level of reason that is incomprehensible to the human mind.

This skill affects in "Range/Area: 1 (100m) / Target" affects "Target: 1 Character". Target will treat "5" or "6" as "0" for each dice rolled for the Skill Checks for 10 seconds (1 round). So, Success Value can become even 1 or 0. If a dice roll is changed by an effect such as [Sword's Grace/Change Fate], or if a dice roll is changed again, this effect will still work, so for example "1,2" roll changed to "5,6" will result in 0+0= 0 result.

Even with this effect, the automatic failure still occurs only when "1, 1" was rolled.

This effect can be used only once in 10 seconds (1 round) for the same target, and consumes 5 MP to use.

abilities.title: ‚óØVampire of the Matter Clan
abilities.description:
If a Bite attack hits, the monster's HP will be restored by the applied damage.

A target whose HP is reduced to 0 or less by Bite's attack suffers a -15 penalty on Death Checks. If such a target fails the Death Check, the monster chooses one of the following three options: make the target a vessel, make the target die, or scar the soul for 5 soulscars of the target and turn it into a Mad Blood.

Those that become Mad Bloods begin to act immediately afterward.

The vessels do not age the same as there are under the effect of [Preservation] (see CR II, p. 142). They cannot take action, and no other effect or damage is applied except for canceling this effect can affect them. This effect is treated as a Curse-type effect with a Success value of 26. If the effect is dispelled, the target is "dead" at the time of dispelling.

If Vampire Tetrahedron does not recover HP by [‚óØVampire of the Matter Clan] for 7 days, their HP and MP will be reduced by 12 points, and they lose their unique skill [‚óØRegeneration]. This reduction will accumulate every 7 days, but it will all be removed immediately when the [‚óØVampire of the Matter Clan] is used.

abilities.title: ‚óØRevival
abilities.description:
When the HP of this monster becomes 0 or less, and there is a character within a 100m radius who has become a vessel by the effect of [‚óØVampire of the Matter Clan], the monster will immediately take over the character's body and revive itself. When this happens, the HP is restored to its maximum value, but the MP inherits the current value of the Vampire before revival.

The vessel character dies at this stage. To revive, the HP of the new Vampire Tetrahedron must be reduced to 0 or less, and the corpse must be retrieved (for example, if the Vampire dies by falling off a cliff, they may resurrect out of the PCs' sight). If there are multiple vessels within the area of effect, a character will be randomly selected from them to become the new body.

loottable.loot: Glasses of the Immortal (3,500G/Gold Black White S)
Golden Recording Glasses of the Immortal (16,500G/Gold Black White SS)

allmonsters.sections: 7 (Body / Eye Hand x 2 / Ear Hand x 2 / Nose Hand / Mouth Hand)
allmonsters.description:
This is a high-rank Daemon with a monkey-like appearance, but instead of the usual shoulders and arms, it has six long arms sprouting from its back. On the palm of each arm, there are facial parts such as eyes and ears (the original face also has normal features).

As additional sensory organs, these hands give them high perception and make them adept at avoiding danger.

It is said that this Daemon is the type who plans each action. When this Daemon appears in Shallow Abyss, it is said to be filled with countless traps and tricks.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], [Rune Master], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØLong Arms
abilities.description: Hands can do melee attacks with "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Target".

abilities.title: ‚óØSight Augmentation
abilities.description: The Body section gains a +2 bonus to Evasion checks for each healthy Eye Hand section.

abilities.title: ‚óØHearing Augmentation
abilities.description: This monster gains a +2 bonus to Fortitude and Willpower checks for each healthy Ear Hand section.

abilities.title: ‚óØMemorize the Smell
abilities.description: If Nose Hand performs an Accuracy check, regardless of the success or failure of the check, Body and Nose Hand sections gain a +2 bonus to Accuracy checks against the target. This effect is not cumulative and is removed when the Nose Hand section HP becomes 0 or less.

abilities.title: ‚óØBloodsucking
abilities.description: When a Bite attack hits, the HP of any one section of this monster is recovered by the same value as applied damage. The monster can choose which section to heal after each attack, and applied damage is calculated. However, the section whose HP is 0 or less cannot be selected for heal.

allmonsters.description:
This mythical beast is about 2 meters tall and resembles a huge wolf. Its coat color is a gradation of black to white, with varying degrees of intensity, but mostly gray.

They have their own language consisting of howls, and they excel at hunting by using it to hunt down their enemies and coordinate their attacks. They are generally belligerent and have a primitive but unique culture centered on hunting.

Because of the way they are, they joined Dalkhrem's army during the War of the Gods, and even today, they are often seen as friends of the Barbarous, and some of the Barbarous have Varg as their mount. They are especially close to Bolgs, Ogres, Trolls, and Lycanthropes.

The relationship between Vargs and Barbarous is only as equal partners. It is said that if they are forced to be slaves, they will bite the Barbarous' head off at that moment.

abilities.title: ‚óØCoordination
abilities.description: A Varg gains a bonus to their Accuracy equal to the number of other Vargs (of any type) in the same skirmish area, up to a maximum of +4.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike I
abilities.description: A Varg can deal an additional 4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

loottable.loot: Beautiful Mythical Beast Hide (800G/Gold Red A)

allmonsters.description:
Vila is a fairy in the form of a human-sized girl who appears near water sources.

Some say that Vila's beautiful figure and voice lures men through dance to become their lovers, while others fear that those captivated by her dance will be lured into the water and drowned.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: Vila can use the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Inviting Dance/7 (14)/Willpower/Negates
abilities.description:
This effect is of the psychic type and lasts for 3 minutes (18 rounds).

Within "Range/Area: 1 (10m)/ Target", Vila shows a dance to "Target: 1 Entire Character". If that character fails their Willpower roll, the character will perform the same movement and actions on their turn that they saw Vila do immediately prior to turn before this unique skill was used.

For example, if the character sees Vila make a melee attack, the character will attempt to execute a Fist (Punch) attack on the target of Vila's attack. In this case, Accuracy checks and damage decisions are made with the character's stats. If a character is seen Vila using Fairy Magic, the character should cast the same Fairy Magic spell (with the same target, etc.) using the character's Magic Power. If the character cannot cast this Fairy Magic spell, they only imitate vocalization and just waste Major Action on this attempt to cast.

When a character with multiple sections is affected by this effect, any one of the sections mimics Vila's action. The other sections do not act (except for movement)

allmonsters.description: Among the Rumblefists, there are individuals who have undergone a special ritual that allows them to control lightning. These individuals have a black horn on the top of their heads, which they can use to summon lightning. This ability is only demonstrated in the heat of battle. By channeling the lightning through their bodies, they are able to attack with lightning-charged fists.

abilities.title: ‚óØElastic Skin
abilities.description: Against bludgeoning weapons, its Defense is treated as 3 points higher.

abilities.title: ‚óØCharged Fist
abilities.description:
Fists fill lightning, increasing its striking power.

If the Volticfist is the target of a lightning-type effect, their fists become hard and treated as magic weapons (though still dealing physical damage), increasing physical damage by +2 points over 3 minutes (18 rounds). This effect is cumulative up to 3 times (+6 total).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Thunder Scream/10 (17)/Fortitude/Neg
abilities.description:
The Volticfist shouts to the heavens and drop bolts of lightning around themselves.

Up to 2 random creatures (including itself) in the melee area where it is located are hit by this effect and are dealt 2d+8 lightning magic damage.

This effect can be used while in melee, and it costs 6 MP.

allmonsters.description: This fairy looks like a large fire lizard, about 3 meters long. It has flaming fire wings on its back and can fly. Although they do not appear before people on their own, they are very territorial and try to eliminate those who enter their territory.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Metamagic/Targets], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], and [Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: Vulkan receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚è©Flame Wings / 18 (25) / Fortitude / Half
abilities.description:
Their flame wings burst into flames. Within "Range: Caster" deals 2d+15 fire magic damage to "Target: 1 area (5m radius) / 15", and gives a -2 penalty to Accuracy checks and Spellcasting checks for 10 seconds (1 round).

Both damage and penalty modifier are treated as Fire type. This ability can be used only once per round and cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: üó®Tongue Cleave
abilities.description: A melee attack with the tongue can be made on up to 5 targets of Vulkan's choice. This attack has a -1 penalty to Accuracy checks

allmonsters.description: A large bird of prey that typically lives in high mountains or canyons, the vulture has a wingspan that can reach up to 3 meters. With this, it can easily carry away both livestock and Humans. Normally, vultures are content to fly high above, but when hungry, they will descend to catch prey and bring it back to their nest.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: Receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

allmonsters.description:
A Daemon shaped like a wolf, with black spike-like protrusions growing from its entire body. They are about 3m in length and stand 1m and 50 cm tall at the shoulder. Brutal and cunning in battle, they strike with great agility and can enlarge the spikes that grow from their body.

Their special ability, [Hound's Scent] is easier to handle, if the individuals keep track of who is struck by their attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØHound's Scent
abilities.description: A Wafushu relentlessly pursues prey, much like a hunting dog. If it successfully hits with a Bite attack, it gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy checks against the target for 3 minutes (18 rounds), as well as a +1 bonus to Evasion checks against attacks made by the target.

abilities.title: ‚óØAbrasive Spikes
abilities.description: Merely brushing against the Wafushu's spiky protrusions causes damage. Any target of the Wafushu's Bite attack suffers 4 points of fixed damage, whether or not the attack is successful.

allmonsters.description:
A large crow-like bird with a height of 50 cm and a wingspan of 1m 50cm. They are highly intelligent for animals and have been tamed by the Bolg]. In addition to being used as a combat force, they can be given courier missions or conduct simple reconnaissance.

When it finds a Humanoid, it makes "Caw, caw" sounds to alert Barbarous at a distance.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Warble Crow receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚óØTear Off
abilities.description:
If the result of the damage roll is 4 or less, discard the result and reroll 2d to determine damage again. This effect is only valid once per damage roll.

This ability has no effect on characters equipped with metal armor or characters with special abilities such as [Stone Body] that prevent critical hits with edged weapons.

allmonsters.description: The ashes of a corpse burnt to ashes, leaving behind a grudge and becoming Undead. It rarely occurs when a person burned to death in a fire is left unattended or when a corpse is burned carelessly in the open. It is rare for a corpse that has been officially cremated to become Undead. These ashes rise and move in whirling zephyrs. They are full of resentment and attack the living without regard.

abilities.title: ‚óØAsh Body
abilities.description:
Blunt weapons treat the Defense of Warring Ash as 5 points higher.

Throws deal no damage and have no effect.

Any damage that is not of the recovery effect type cannot be critical.

abilities.title: ‚óØShadow Sneak
abilities.description: It is not subject to any movement blocking (see CR II, p. 59) and is not restricted in any way when attempting to leave the skirmish.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Cover with Ash/9 (16)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: Within "Range: Touch," it covers "Target: 1 Character" with its own body and suffocates it. The target suffers 2d+7 poison magic damage. In addition, the target will not be able to make any vocalizations for 10 seconds (1 round).

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Gale of Ashes/9 (16)/Evasion/Negates
abilities.description:
Warring Ash rushes through the air in a whirlwind, tearing through anything it touches. Within "Range/Area: 1 (20m) / Breakthrough", the targets are dealt 2d+5 Wind magic damage.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

allmonsters.description:
One of many different shapeshifters that fall under the classification "Lycanthrope," a Werewolf is the most common of the beastmen.

When in their Humanoid form, they would easily pass among civilized folk without issue. However, they can turn into a bestial form, growing fur over their body, their face turning to that of a wolf, and sharp claws growing from both hands. They form their own clans, with strict hierarchies based on age, so young Werewolves are beholden to help the elders when necessary.

They cannot reproduce independently, but must kidnap Humans to join them through a special ritual. Therefore, their soulscar is relatively small, and they sometimes blend in with Human society, taking advantage of their Beastification ability. In addition to wolves, there are many other species of Lycanthrope, such as tigers and bears.

abilities.title: ‚óØBeast Power
abilities.description:
The Werewolf receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion on the night of a full moon.

Conversely, they receive a -1 penalty for Accuracy and Evasion while under sunlight.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Twin Strike & Double Attack
abilities.description: A Werewolf can make two Claw attacks each round, though each attack requires its Accuracy check. They may choose to attack different characters with each attack.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Techniques
abilities.description: They may use the [Beetleskin] and [Strong Blood] Techniques.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Beastification
abilities.description:
A Werewolf can turn from a humanoid to a bestial form and back again. The Werewolf can only make Claw attacks while in beast form.

The [‚è©‚ñ≥Beastification] can be released with Minor Action or during Combat Preparation.

allmonsters.description: This is a mutation of the Liger with a white gold mane. With a light step that does not match its huge body, it looks for a gap between the enemies and pounces at once to kill its prey.

abilities.title: ‚óØFast Action
abilities.description: During the first round of combat, if the Liger won the initiative, it may take two Major Actions that round.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Triple Attack
abilities.description: The Liger can bite and attack twice with its claws making 3 attacks per round with Bite and Claws.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫On Guard
abilities.description: The White Gold Liger stays low and prepares to be attacked by the enemy, gaining a +2 bonus to Evasion checks for 10 seconds (1 round). In addition, on its next turn, it gains a +2 bonus to Accuracy.

loottable.loot: White Gold Mane (1,900G / Gold Red S)

allmonsters.description:
A Wight is a vile Undead whose extremities have rotted to the bone. Its signature red eyes and bloated, discolored body are telltale signs of this foul creature.

Originally thought to be the risen bodies of those who died in water, the bony claws of a Wight don't just poison the body but curse the soul of those they rend through. Rumors tell that a powerful Wight's claws may be used as ritual tools, though what rituals are better left unsaid.

abilities.title: ‚óØPoison Claw / 5 (12) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description: If a Claw attack hits and deals at least 1 point of applied damage, it deals an additional 3 Poison magic damage to both the target's HP and MP.

abilities.title: ‚óØWight Curse
abilities.description:
Anyone reduced to 0 HP or below by the Wight's attack is automatically cursed without any Resistance Check.

The victim can recover from its unconscious state only after the curse is lifted. If left attended, one Soulscar will be accumulated for every three days (72 hours) that pass. If the fifth Soulscar is acquired by this fact, the character immediately becomes a Wight.

A Success Value of 14 or more is required to remove this curse by magic or other means. The character does not lose any Soulscars accumulated by this effect when the curse is removed.

allmonsters.description: Will-o'-Wisp is a spherical fairy about 10cm in diameter that emits a misty light. It is weak, but it often surrounds other fairies and fairy tamers as if to protect them. They are usually harmless and rarely fight other than in self- defense.

abilities.title: üó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feat [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚óØLight Protection
abilities.description: A Will-o'-Wisp takes -3 less magic damage, regardless of type.

abilities.title: ‚óØHealing Space
abilities.description: 1 area (3m Radius) around this monster is surrounded by gentle healing light. The character within this space gains an additional 2 HP when being healed

allmonsters.description:
A simple Wolf, often appearing in packs of 3 to 5.

They are often tamed by Bolgs.

abilities.description: None.

allmonsters.description:
A Wraith is a body from which the soul has departed and become animated. It can manifest as a living agglomeration or as a dead rift after the physical body's death, rendering it unresponsive. Wraiths cannot pass through walls but can traverse small spaces. They are immune to physical attacks but can be harmed by silver and magic weapons.

Each Wraith's strength varies depending on the individual before becoming a Wraith. When a Conjurer uses the [Wraith Form] spell, they take on this form. Some individuals become Wraiths by receiving the same effect as magic from magic-powered items or traps. These Wraiths cannot return to their bodies and remain as Wraiths.

Whether the caster is dead or alive makes no difference. However, a dead Wraith can be dispelled by magic or by removing the effect to return to the body, while a live one cannot. The Wraith's body core is cold to the touch, and in rare cases, its magic power can freeze and form a gem.

abilities.title: ‚óØKnowledge = Conjurer Class
abilities.description: Those with Conjurer will automatically sÏ≥Æd in the Monster Knowledge check for this monster. But they still must roll to know its weak point.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: A Wraith can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØFog Body
abilities.description:
Blunt weapons treat the Wraith's Defense as 5 points higher.

In addition, the Throw weapon deals no damage to it.

The Wraith automatically halves the total damage of any incoming Magical damage (or quarters if the spell has "Resistance: Half").

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

allmonsters.description:
Wyverns are an offshoot of dragons, similar in appearance, though their wings have taken the place of their forelimbs. These particular Wyverns are covered in fine black scales that glitter with a dark luster while the Wyvern is in motion. Fully outstretched, the bat-like wings average a span of around 10m, giving the Wyvern a fearsome appearance even in the dark. It is the patagium, or membrane, of these wings that are highly coveted, as they are used as the basis for a number of premium leather products.

Sky Wyverns are a smaller subspecies of this monster.

abilities.title: ‚è©‚ñ≥Techniques
abilities.description: They may use the [Beetleskin], [Cat's Eyes], and [Recovery (5 points)] Techniques.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fire Breath/10 (17)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: With "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/ Shot", spits fire at "Target: 1 area (3m Radius) / 5", dealing 2d+10 Fire magic damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Wyvern receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks. If any Wings fall to 0 HP or lower, this unique skill cannot be used.

The monster can use its tail to attack up to 5 targets in the same skirmish. An Accuracy check is made on all characters at once, and damage is determined individually.

This attack cannot be used in consecutive rounds.

loottable.loot: Lustrous Black Dragon Patagium (5,000G/Gold Red S)

allmonsters.description: This Daemon has the head of an anteater and the torso of a strong human male. Its whole body is reddish gray, and it is covered with feathers, which allow it to fly. It prefers to observe Humanoids and Barbarous who live a hedonistic and momentary life.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó® Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting] and [Metamagic/Targets].

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = +4 ‚Ä¢ None
abilities.description:
Xenu's height hinders enemies from attacking it. Head receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks.

If the Body section has 0 HP or less, this effect is lost.

allmonsters.description: A snow Giant covered in white hair, a Yeti stands tall at over 5m. Often found in cold and snowy areas, Yetis are quite territorial, and will mercilessly defend their territory from any invaders. Their arms are larger than their body, and their devastating claw attacks can rend steel with little effort, so retreat is recommended if accidentally angering one.

abilities.description: If a Yeti successfully hits a target in melee, they may make a second attack against the same target.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Bow
abilities.description:
Yeti‚Äôs height prevents enemies from attacking it. The Upper Body receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks against melee attacks.

When the Lower Body falls to 0 HP or lower, this effect disappears.

allmonsters.description: In Raxia, the name "Yggdrasil" is the name of the great World Tree, the largest tree known to humanity, which has been rooted in Raxia since the beginning of the Divine Civilization. This young tree is but a sapling of another Yggdrasil, resulting from a seed flung far from the original tree that has taken root. Though it is young compared to the original World Tree, the Yggdrasil Sapling is still large enough to scrape the heavens and cannot be accurately measured using current equipment. It is said that the history of Raxia lies engraved in its leaves and branches, and those who can find even a fallen twig of the tree can find themselves with a wealth of knowledge.

abilities.title: ‚óØ3 Actions
abilities.description: The Trunk can perform three Major Actions in one round.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fairy Magic 15 Level/Magic Power 27 (34)
abilities.description: Can use Earth, Water/Ice, Light, and Dark types.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®‚ñ∫Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], [Double Cast], [Rune Master], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: ‚óØBreath of the World Tree
abilities.description:
The Yggdrasil Sapling brings the vitality of nature into its body. At the end of each round, the Trunk sections recover 20 HP and MP.

This effect is lost if the HP of the Trunk section becomes 0 or less.

abilities.title: ‚óØLong Branches
abilities.description: An attack on a branch can be made within "Range/Area: 2 (20m) / Target".

abilities.title: ‚óØBranch Cover
abilities.description:
If the Yggdrasil Sapling's Trunk is attacked by a melee or ranged attack, a spell with "Area: Shot" with "Target: 1 Character", a Branch may move in the way of the attack, taking the damage instead automatically (no Evasion, Fortitude, or Willpower check needed). The branch cannot reduce damage with its defense or other effects.

Each Branch may only do this once per round. This unique skill is automatically used when the trunk is attacked, but GM should decide which Branch will take the hit.

This does not protect the Trunk from "Area: Target" spells or wide-area effects.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Branch Dance/Can't
abilities.description:
The Yggdrasil Sapling deals (2d x (Remaining Branches) + 5) Physical damage to one target in the same skirmish.

This ability cannot be used if even one Branch has completed its Major Action. Also, after using this ability, the Major Actions of all Branches are completed.

allmonsters.description: This is a bright red lower Daemon with bat-like wings and big horns. It is over 3 meters tall and has flaming red eyes. It can fly with its wings on its back and sometimes attacks with fire from the sky. It is often encountered in ruins and is estimated to be one of the most frequently summoned and used Daemons during the Magic Civilization Period.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: A Zalbard receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Flame Breath/9 (16)/Fortitude/Half
abilities.description: A Zalbard breathes a gout of flame with "Range/Area: 1 (10m) / Shot" at "Target: 1 Character", dealing 2d+8 Fire magic damage.

allmonsters.description:
A Lesser Daemon that resembles a knight, clad in full-body armor that shines a deep black, with membranous wings on its back that allow it to fly.

In its right hand, it holds an axe-like weapon, and in its left what appears to be a medium-sized shield, but in reality, everything, including the armor that covers its entire body, is made of the Daemon's hardened skin.

In addition to serving as guardians of ruins, they sometimes seem to be acting as bodyguards to more powerful Daemons.

abilities.title: ‚óØFlight
abilities.description: Receives a +1 bonus to Accuracy and Evasion only for melee attacks.

abilities.title: üó®Raise Shield
abilities.description: Gains +2 Defense for 10 seconds (1 round). This must be declared before performing a Major Action, and once done, the Zang receives -3 damage from attacks.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike I
abilities.description: They can deal an additional +4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

loottable.loot: Piece of Flesh (30G/Red Black B) x 1d

allmonsters.description:
This enormous fairy is approximately 5 meters long and 3 meters tall, resembling a tortoise. Its entire body is composed of swirling sand, and although its carapace has a similar shape, it is not hard.

These fairies are harmless, but they are oblivious to the presence of others and may unintentionally step on something as small as a human without noticing.

abilities.title: ‚óØType: Earth / Magic Power 18 (25)
abilities.description: Only the Body section can cast spells.

abilities.title: ‚óØSand Body
abilities.description: Immune from criticals from bludgeoning weapons. Also, against bludgeoning weapons treat as having 5 Defense points higher.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Targeting], [Metamagic/Targets], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], and [Multi-Action].

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Sandstorm Rush / 20 (27) / Evasion / Negates
abilities.description:
It turns its whole body into a conical mass of sand and charges.

Within "Range / Area: 1 (25m) / Breakthrough", it deals 2d+30 Earth physical damage to a target in the area, causing the target to be knocked prone.

This effect can only be used when all Body and Legs sections are not yet made Major Actions, and when used, all sections will have completed the Major Actions.

This ability cannot be used on consecutive turns.

abilities.title: ‚óØAttack Obstacle = Impossible ‚Ä¢ +4
abilities.description:
Zargand's great size hinders attack.

The Body cannot be attacked in melee. Against any ranged attacks, Body receives a +4 bonus to Evasion checks.

If the HP of either the Leg sections falls to 0 or lower, this unique skill vanishes.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Dust Storm / 18 (25) / Fortitude / Negates
abilities.description:
It turns part of its feet into dust and swirls it around itself.

The targets within "1 area (5m radius) / 15" around itself are blinded by the sand in their eyes.

Target can wipe the sand with Major Action and this effect will disappear

allmonsters.description:
The Zeanemo have the ability to breathe underwater and primarily inhabit the oceanic shallows near the Burlight Region.

At first glance, they resemble Elves, with their slender build, beautiful facial features, long pointed ears, and fair to pale skin. According to tradition, Zeanemo were once Elves who were soulscarred by the god Eiryak, the Sea Snatcher.

The most notable difference from Elves in their appearance is their right eye. A Zeanemo's right eye lacks an eyeball and instead contains an anemone-like tentacle. Normally, they keep this tentacle stored in their eye socket and close their eyelids. However, during fights or when preying on their targets, they fully open their eye, revealing the flexible tentacle. This tentacle can be used as a weapon in addition to their regular attacks. It often exhibits stunning shades of pink and orange, resembling a blooming flower. To conceal their unique eye, Zeanemos sometimes wear an eye patch when their eyes are closed, making them appear more like ordinary Elves.

Zeanemo are capable of briefly venturing onto land for about an hour, but they must return to a water-rich environment or face death. They wear clothing made from plant fibers and are skilled in using various weapons. Occasionally, they don armor crafted from shells and turtle shells.

While they possess intelligence and may initially appear peaceful, their true nature is brutal and cruel, and they have a penchant for plundering. They harbor a strong animosity towards Elves and often raid their settlements, including ships crewed by Elves. Zeanemo are capable of breeding with Elves and occasionally abduct young Elves. They have a lifespan of approximately 500 years and their power increases with age.

abilities.title: ‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles / 5 (12) / Evasion / Negates
abilities.description:
This ability may only be used once per turn, just before a Major Action. Within "Range: Touch" it is used to entangle "Target: 1 Character" with the tentacles within their right eye. If the target fails the Evasion check, the following two effects occur:

* If the monster makes a melee attack against its target immediately afterward, the target's Evasion check is decreased by -2. This effect only applies to that single Evasion check (the tentacles automatically release after the melee attack).

* The target must perform a Fortitude Check with Target Number 10. If the target fails, it is paralyzed for the next 1 minute (6 rounds) and suffers a -1 penalty on Accuracy checks. This effect is Poison type and does not accumulate.

abilities.title: ‚óØBehind the Right Eye
abilities.description:
The character who became the target of the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles] can declare that they will "aim at the right eye" when making a weapon attack against this monster on their turn (regardless of whether the Evasion check was successful or not against the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles]). If the declared attack hits, its physical and/or magic damage is increased by 4 points.

If this action is taken and the increase in damage actually occurs, PCs will no longer receive the loot "Strange Eye" from the targeted monster.

allmonsters.description: Among the Zeanemo, these are particularly large specimens of the soldier class who are specially trained in weapons fighting.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike I
abilities.description: They can deal an additional 4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles / 8 (15) / Evasion / Negates
abilities.description:
This ability may only be used once per turn, just before a Major Action. Within "Range: Touch" it is used to entangle "Target: 1 Character" with the tentacles within their right eye. If the target fails the Evasion check, the following two effects occur:

- If the monster makes a melee attack against its target immediately afterward, the target's Evasion check is decreased by -2. This effect only applies to that single Evasion check (the tentacles automatically release after the melee attack).

- The target must perform a Fortitude Check with Target Number 13. If the target fails, it is paralyzed for the next 1 minute (6 rounds) and suffers a -1 penalty on Accuracy checks. This effect is Poison type and does not accumulate.

abilities.title: ‚óØBehind the Right Eye
abilities.description:
The character who became the target of the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles] can declare that they will "aim at the right eye" when making a weapon attack against this monster on their turn (regardless of whether the Evasion check was successful or not against the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles]). If the declared attack hits, its physical and/or magic damage is increased by 4 points.

If this action is taken and the increase in damage actually occurs, PCs will no longer receive the loot "Blue Strange Eye" from the targeted monster.

allmonsters.description: Extremely powerful, both physically and mentally, these leaders reign supreme in the Zeanemo collective. They are the leader of the Zeanemo and lead the other Zeanemos in battle.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Fairy Magic 9 Level / Magic Power 12 (19)
abilities.description:
Can use Earth, Water/Ice, Light, or Dark types.

It does not change even if the contract pattern (see MA, p. 136) is used.

abilities.title: ‚óØüó®Magic Aptitude
abilities.description: They can use the Combat Feats [Multi-Action], [Targeting], [Magic Convergence], [Magic Control], [Hawk Eye], [Universal Metamagic], and [Wordbreak].

abilities.title: üó®Mana Strike = +12 damage
abilities.description: May deal an additional +12 damage to their next melee attack. At risk, they take a -2 penalty to their Fortitude and Willpower checks.

abilities.title: ‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles / 13 (20) / Evasion / Negates
abilities.description:
This ability may only be used once per turn, just before a Major Action. Within "Range: Touch" it is used to entangle "Target: 1 Character" with the tentacles within their right eye. If the target fails the Evasion check, the following two effects occur:

- If the monster makes a melee attack against its target immediately afterward, the target's Evasion check is decreased by -2. This effect only applies to that single Evasion check (the tentacles automatically release after the melee attack).

- The target must perform a Fortitude Check with Target Number 18. If the target fails, it is paralyzed for the next 1 minute (6 rounds) and suffers a -1 penalty on Accuracy checks. This effect is Poison type and does not accumulate.

abilities.title: ‚óØBehind the Right Eye
abilities.description:
The character who became the target of the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles] can declare that they will "aim at the right eye" when making a weapon attack against this monster on their turn (regardless of whether the Evasion check was successful or not against the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles]). If the declared attack hits, its physical and/or magic damage is increased by 4 points.

If this action is taken and the increase in damage actually occurs, PCs will no longer receive the loot "Strange White Eye" from the targeted monster.

allmonsters.description: These Zeanemo have tamed the Coast Lizards and are now running wild on their back.

abilities.title: ‚óØDismounting
abilities.description:
This monster's Rider section is mounted on the Lizard section. If the Rider is dismounted, all sections suffer a -2 penalty on all Skill Checks and have their damage reduced by -2 points.

See the Rider class and the Riding Rules (see CR III, p. 87) for rules for this monster on how to dismount and mount back at the mount.

The movement speed of the Rider section does not change even when it is unmounted.

abilities.title: ‚ñ∫Trample
abilities.description:
Makes a melee attack against a target within Range/Area: 1 (20m) / Breakthrough. This melee attack can be done by any section of this monster.

After using this ability, all sections have completed their Major Action. This ability cannot be used when the HP of the Lizard section is 0 or less or [‚óØDismounting] occurs.
It makes a Weapon attack against up to 3 characters within the skirmish in which it resides, dealing -3 less damage to each.

abilities.title: ‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles / 11 (18) / Evasion / Negates
abilities.description:
This ability may only be used once per turn, just before a Major Action. Within "Range: Touch" it is used to entangle "Target: 1 Character" with the tentacles within their right eye. If the target fails the Evasion check, the following two effects occur:

- If the monster makes a melee attack against its target immediately afterward, the target's Evasion check is decreased by -2. This effect only applies to that single Evasion check (the tentacles automatically release after the melee attack).

- The target must perform a Fortitude Check with Target Number 16. If the target fails, it is paralyzed for the next 1 minute (6 rounds) and suffers a -1 penalty on Accuracy checks. This effect is Poison type and does not accumulate.

abilities.title: ‚óØBehind the Right Eye
abilities.description:
The character who became the target of the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles] can declare that they will "aim at the right eye" when making a weapon attack against this monster on their turn (regardless of whether the Evasion check was successful or not against the [‚è©Entangling Poisonous Tentacles]). If the declared attack hits, its physical and/or magic damage is increased by 4 points.

If this action is taken and the increase in damage actually occurs, PCs will no longer receive the loot "Strange Red Eye" from the targeted monster.

allmonsters.description: This is a Magitech often found on the Alframe continent. It has a slender Humanoid form, but it carries a launcher on its back, and when attacking, it leans forward and shoots a light projectile. Once used, the light projectile needs to be refilled with mana and cannot be fired in rapid succession. It is also characterized by the use of a special material that is inferior in hardness but superior in resistance to magic.

abilities.description:
It leans forward and shoots a light projectile from its launcher. This ability can only be used with a Limited Move.

It cannot be used in consecutive turns. With "Target: 1 Character" and "Range/Area: 2 (20m)/ Shot", this attack deals 2d+3 Energy magic damage.

abilities.title: ‚óØTargeting
abilities.description: [‚ñ∫Light Bullet] fired into a skirmish cannot stray.

abilities.title: ‚óØLimited Healing
abilities.description:
Effects which can heal Magitech HP are very limited, and mostly come from Spiritualism Magic and some special items.

Healing effects such as Divine Magic, Fairy Magic, and Nature Magic cannot restore a Magitech's HP.

abilities.title: ‚óØCan Be Detected
abilities.description: Magitech can be detected with the [Sense Magic] spell and similar effects.

allmonsters.sections: 4 (Right Body / Left Body / Right Leg / Left Leg)
allmonsters.description:
This prototype results from a project to integrate the Dorn and Zerlay series. Researchers who had been developing each other's products provided their development records to each other.

Integrating different concepts and designs was pretty challenging, but they overcame the difficulties and completed a product with a high level of combat power. Although it can be said that most of the development objectives have been achieved, there is a record that the developers lamented the gap between their actual efforts and project goals.

allmonsters.description:
This is a corpse inhabited by mana and set in motion. It is decomposing but retains its original form. If the eyeballs are dried, they make good quality medicine.

But not every zombie has its eyes in place. Some individuals are missing parts of their bodies due to decomposition, but as long as their arms and legs are normal, their abilities are not affected.

abilities.title: üó®Power Strike I
abilities.description: They can deal an additional 4 damage on their next attack. However, any Evasion Check made by them this turn receives a -2 penalty.

abilities.title: ‚óØUnstable Healing
abilities.description:
Healing effects such as Divine Magic and items like Unicorn's Horn will damage Undead instead.

Magitech, Fairy Magic, Nature Magic, etc. healing has no effect on the Undead.

Spiritualism Magic and a few other healing effects can restore an Undead's HP.

allmonsters.description: These wolves and dogs have been animated with mana. They have lost their natural agility and are smaller than Humanoids, so they are not a serious opponent even for novice adventurers.
